analyzed: harivaṃśaḥ
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_19.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet

original: muniḥ punātu vo vyāsaḥ sadā saṃnihitā sukhe /
analyzed: muniḥ punātu vaḥ vyāsaḥ sadā saṃnihitā sukhe

original: trimārgagā madhumatī yasya śuddhā sarasvatī // Bhmj_19.2 //
analyzed: tri mārga gā madhumatī yasya śuddhā sarasvatī
śaunakena punar pṛṣṭaḥ naimiṣe laumaharṣaṇiḥ
abhyadhāt adbhutam bhūmau saṃbhavam kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ
ākarṇya bhārata kathām prahṛṣṭaḥ janamejayaḥ
apṛcchat vaiṣṇavam vaṃśam vaiśampāyanam ādarāt

original: sa pṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣuvaṃśena pārthivena kathāṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: sa pṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣu vaṃśena pārthivena kathām hareḥ

original: jagāda jagatāṃ hetuṃ praṇamya prayataḥ prabhum // Bhmj_19.5 //
analyzed: jagāda jagatām hetum praṇamya prayataḥ prabhum
apaḥ eva asṛjat pūrvam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ

original: tāsu vīryaṃ narākhyāsu yena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Bhmj_19.6 //
analyzed: tāsu vīryam nara ākhyāsu yena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
tat aṇḍam abhavat vaimam yasmin jātaḥ prajāpatiḥ
asṛjat manu mukhyān ca kardama ādyān prajāpatīn
dakṣam ca sarva bhūtāni yasya dauhitra saṃtatiḥ
pṛthak pṛthak ca rājyāni soma ādinām akalpayat
kadācid atri vaṃśasya sutaḥ ṅgasya prajāpateḥ
mṛtyu putryām sunīthāyām jātaḥ sthiti vilopa kṛt
svarvaḥ nāma abhavat rājā kilbiṣāt kaluṣa āśayaḥ
prajānām vidhi vaimukhyāt mūrtimān iva viplavaḥ
anunītaḥ pi bahuśas sa yadā nā abhavat vaśī
tadā nigṛhya atibalam munayaḥ tam apātayan
mamanthuḥ asya te savyam ūrum krodha anala ākulāḥ

original: tataḥ samudabhūtsvarvo naraḥ kṛṣṇo bhayākulaḥ // Bhmj_19.12 //
analyzed: tatas samudabhūt svarvaḥ naraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhaya ākulaḥ
niṣīda iti atriṇā uktaḥ sau niṣāda janakaḥ bhavat

original: tato mamanthurmunayaḥ pāṇiṃ venasya dakṣiṇam // Bhmj_19.13 //
analyzed: tatas mamanthuḥ munayaḥ pāṇim venasya dakṣiṇam
tāmra aṅguli dalāt pāṇi kamalāt udabhūt tatas
pitāmahaḥ iva śrīmān pṛthuḥ pṛthula locanaḥ
dhanuḥ ājagavam tasya vibibhau hema varṣiṇaḥ
nija jvālā āvalī dhāma dīptasya iva vibhāvasoḥ
tad prasādāt divam yāte vene bhūbhujām
ādyaḥ ratna ākaraiḥ etya svayam
jale śaile ca tasya abhūt abhagna praṇayā gatiḥ
tam tuṣṭuvuḥ nava utpannāḥ sūta māgadha bandinaḥ
prajānām vṛttaye bhūmiḥ tena ādiṣṭā tarasvinā

original: bhītā dudrāva gaurbhūtvā dhanvī tāmādravatsa ca // Bhmj_19.18 //
analyzed: bhītā dudrāva gauḥ bhūtvā dhanvī tām ādravat sa ca
sā lokān brahma loka antān aśeṣān vidrutā javāt
tam eva ātta āyudham paścāt apaśyat valita ānanā
paritrāṇam a paśyantī sā tam ūce kṛtāñjaliḥ

original: kopaṃ jahi mahīpāla yoṣitaṃ parirakṣa mām // Bhmj_19.20 //
analyzed: kopam jahi mahīpāla yoṣitam parirakṣa mām

original: vinā dharitrīṃ tiṣṭhanti prajānātha kathaṃ prajāḥ /
analyzed: vinā dharitrīm tiṣṭhanti prajānātha katham prajāḥ
iti śriti vacaḥ śrutvā vīta kopaḥ bravīt nṛpaḥ
prajā vṛtti nimittaḥ yam samārambhaḥ mama tviyi
bahūnām prāṇa rakṣā artham eka hiṃsā praśasyate
vistārya svayam ātmānam dhārayiṣyāmi aham prajāḥ

original: na cedvitara lokānāṃ vṛttiṃ putrī ca me bhava // Bhmj_19.23 //
analyzed: na ced vitara lokānām vṛttim putrī ca me bhava
iti   ādiṣṭā jagāda jagatī natā

original: ahaṃ vṛtti vidhāsyāmi prajānāṃ tvatsutā satī // Bhmj_19.24 //
analyzed: aham vṛtti vidhāsyāmi prajānām tvad sutā satī
deśān samīkuru vibho śilā kūṭa viśaṅkaṭān

original: sarvasyāpi bhavatyetadyathā kṣīraṃ struṃta māya // Bhmj_19.25 //
analyzed: sarvasya api bhavati etat yathā kṣīram
niśamya etat pṛthu yaśāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu śiloccayān

original: pṛthakcakre dhanuṣkoṭyā suspaṣṭā yena bhūrabhūt // Bhmj_19.26 //
analyzed: pṛthak cakre dhanuṣkoṭyā su spaṣṭā yena bhūḥ abhūt

original: tataḥ sasyāni pṛthivīṃ svanāmāṅkāṃ dudoha saḥ /
analyzed: tatas sasyāni pṛthivīm sva nāma aṅkām dudoha saḥ

original: manuṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā karapuṭodare // Bhmj_19.27 //
analyzed: manum svāyaṃbhuvam vatsam kṛtvā kara puṭa udare

original: śrūyate munibhirdugdhā tapo brahma ca būḥ purā /
analyzed: śrūyate munibhiḥ dugdhā tapaḥ brahma ca būḥ purā

original: vatsaḥ somo gururdegdhā pātramāsīcca kāñcanam // Bhmj_19.28 //
analyzed: vatsaḥ somaḥ guruḥ degdhā pātram āsīt ca kāñcanam
rūpya pātre ca pitṛbhiḥ dugdhā iyam vasudhā sudhām

original: yamaṃ vatsaṃ samādāya tathā dogdhāramantakam // Bhmj_19.29 //
analyzed: yamam vatsam samādāya tathā dogdhāram antakam
alābu pātre nāgaiḥ ca viṣam dugdhā bala pradam

original: dhṛtarāṣraṃ ca dogdhāraṃ kṛtvā vatsaṃ ca takṣakam // Bhmj_19.30 //
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣram ca dogdhāram kṛtvā vatsam ca takṣakam
asuraiḥ āyase pātre māyām dugdhā vasuṃdharā

original: vatsastadābhūtprahlādo dogdhā ca danujo madhuḥ // Bhmj_19.31 //
analyzed: vatsaḥ tadā abhūt prahlādaḥ dogdhā ca danujaḥ madhuḥ

original: yakṣairapi purā dugdhā vatsaṃ kṛtvā dhaneśvaram /
analyzed: yakṣaiḥ api purā dugdhā vatsam kṛtvā dhaneśvaram
antardhāna karam kṣīram āma pātre bhayaṃkaram
rudhiram rākṣasaiḥ dugdhā vatsakena su mālinā
padma pātre śubhān gandhān dugdhā gandharva kiṃnaraiḥ
parvataiḥ merum ādāya dogdhāram śaila bhājane
ratna oṣadhi gaṇān dugdhā vatsam kṛtvā himālayam

original: vṛkṣaiḥ pālāśapātre ca dugdhā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: vṛkṣaiḥ pālāśa pātre ca dugdhā puṣpam phalam tatas
dogdhṛ tvam agamat sālaḥ tadā plakṣaḥ ca vatsa tām
sarvadā sarvadā bhūmiḥ iti evam śāsanāt pṛthoḥ
ādirājasya jayinaḥ karma yasya etat adbhutam
śrutvā iti vainya caritam vismitaḥ janamejayaḥ
munim manvantara kathām apṛcchat saḥ pi abhāṣata
svāyaṃbhuvaḥ manuḥ pūrvam abhūt saptarṣayaḥ tadā
marīci atri pulastya ādyā
devāḥ ca tuṣṭita abhidhāḥ
auttama ākhyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ bhūt manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ tadā
vasiṣṭha putrāḥ tasya āsan ṛbhavaḥ ca divaukasaḥ
tāmasaḥ bhūt manuḥ turyaḥ yasya saptarṣayaḥ ntare
babhūvuḥ pṛthu gārgya ādyāḥ sabhyāḥ ca tridivaukasaḥ
raivataḥ pañcamaḥ pi āsīt manuḥ saptarṣayaḥ tadā
vedabāhu mukhāḥ ca āsanna bhūtarajasaḥ surāḥ
cākṣuṣaḥ tha manuḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ bhṛgu mukhyāḥ yad antare
abhavan sapta munayaḥ lekha saṃjñāḥ tathā amarāḥ
eteṣu bahu putreṣu ṣaṭsu yāteṣu sāṃpratam

original: vartate saptamaḥ śrīmānadya vaivasvato manuḥ // Bhmj_19.44 //
analyzed: vartate saptamaḥ śrīmān adya vaivasvataḥ manuḥ
tris vasiṣṭhaḥ ca bhāradvājaḥ gautamaḥ
kauśikaḥ jamadagniḥ ca sapta ete mahā ṛṣayaḥ
sa aśvi rudrāḥ ca marutaḥ vasu ādityāḥ ca devatāḥ
ikṣvāku pramukhāḥ ca asya manoḥ putrāḥ mahībhujaḥ
sāvarṇaḥ tha manuḥ bhāvī tasya saptarṣayaḥ ntare
rāma vyāsa kṛpa ātreya drauṇi gālava kāśyapāḥ
catvāraḥ merusāvarṇāḥ bhāvinaḥ manavaḥ pare

original: teṣāṃ nava navāścānye te te saptarṣayaḥ kramāt // Bhmj_19.48 //
analyzed: teṣām nava navāḥ ca anye te te saptarṣayaḥ kramāt

original: rocyo nāma manuḥ ṣaṣṭho bhautyākhyaḥ saptamo manuḥ /
analyzed: rocyaḥ nāma manuḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ bhautya ākhyaḥ saptamaḥ manuḥ

original: caturdaśaite manavo yebhyo manvantarāḥ kramāt // Bhmj_19.49 //
analyzed: caturdaśā ete manavaḥ yebhyaḥ manvantarāḥ kramāt
catur yugānām pūrṇānām sāgrāṇām ekasaptatiḥ
manvantarāṇām pratyekam eṣa saṃkhyā kṛtaḥ vadhiḥ
caturdaśasu yāteṣu teṣu manvantareṣu atha
kalpa kṣaye jagat viṣṇoḥ antar sarvam pralīyate
punar ca bhavati iti evam cakra vat parivartate
kalpa saṃkṣaya lakṣāṇām anādinidhanā gatiḥ
sāṃpratasya manoḥ tāvat asmin vaivasvate ntare
harivaṃśa prasaṅgena śrūyatām atha saṃbhavaḥ
ādityaḥ kaśyapāt jātaḥ vivaśvāt mahasām nidhiḥ
ugra rūpaḥ bhavat hora dīpti saṃtāna saṃcayaḥ
diṣṭayā na ayam mṛtaḥ ṇḍa sthaḥ pravṛddhena sva tejasā

original: snehādityuditaḥ pitrā mārtaṇḍa iti viśrutaḥ // Bhmj_19.55 //
analyzed: snehāt iti uditaḥ pitrā mārtaṇḍaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
saṃjñā nāma abhavat tasya lāvaṇyanalinī priyā
bahu kautuka nirmātuḥ putrī tvaṣṭuḥ prajāpateḥ
tasyām ajījanat putram śrāddhadevam manum raviḥ

original: yamaṃ kanyāṃ ca yamunāṃ yamalatvātkṛtābhidhau // Bhmj_19.57 //
analyzed: yamam kanyām ca yamunām yamala tvāt kṛta abhidhau
tīkṣṇāṃśoḥ atha tat rūpam vikṛtam ghora tejasaḥ

original: na sehe dhṛtidhairyāpi saṃjñā kāntikumudvatī // Bhmj_19.58 //
analyzed: na sehe dhṛti dhairyā api saṃjñā kānti kumudvatī
tulya rūpām nija chāyām māyā yoga vinirmitām

original: sā dhṛtvā svapatergūḍhaṃ jagāma janakāntikam // Bhmj_19.59 //
analyzed: sā dhṛtvā sva pateḥ gūḍham jagāma janaka antikam

original: patyuḥ samīpaṃ gaccheti nirastā tena māninā /
analyzed: patyuḥ samīpam gaccha iti nirastā tena māninā
lajjitā vaḍavā bhūtvā prayayau uttarān kurūn
tatas saṃjñā savarṇāyām sāvarṇa ākhyaḥ paraḥ manuḥ
raveḥ ajñāta vṛttasya chāyāyām abhavat sutaḥ
śanaiścaraḥ dvitīyaḥ ca sneham abhyadhikam tayoḥ
chāyā cakāra vātsalyāt na tathā apara putrayoḥ

original: kṣamī jyeṣṭho manuḥ sehe tadyamastu na cakṣame /
analyzed: kṣamī jyeṣṭhaḥ manuḥ sehe tat yamaḥ tu na cakṣame
bālyāt tena āhatā daivāt bālena jananī purā

original: sā taṃ śaśāpa kupitā caraṇāste patantviti /
analyzed: sā tam śaśāpa kupitā caraṇāḥ te patantu iti
tat śrutvā śaṅkitaḥ bhāsvān kopāt tām śaptum udyataḥ
gatvā tvaṣṭuḥ gṛham tūrmam saṃjñā vṛttāntam abhyadhāt

original: tejastavaitadatyugraṃ saṃjñā na sahate satī // Bhmj_19.65 //
analyzed: tejaḥ tava etat ati ugram saṃjñā na sahate satī

original: pracchannaṃ tatra vaḍavā vane carati śādvalam /
analyzed: pracchannam tatra vaḍavā vane carati śādvalam

original: iti tvaṣṭurgirā jñātvā tenaivāropito bhramam // Bhmj_19.66 //
analyzed: iti tvaṣṭuḥ girā jñātvā tena eva āropitaḥ bhramam
aśātayat nijam tejaḥ dayitā darśana utsukaḥ

original: tejasā tena vidadhe tvaṣṭā cakraṃ sudarśanam // Bhmj_19.67 //
analyzed: tejasā tena vidadhe tvaṣṭā cakram sudarśanam
daitya andhakāra saṃhāra sahāyam kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ
tatas kamalinī kāntaḥ kānta rūpaḥ divākaraḥ
gatvā dadarśa vipine vaḍavā rūpiṇīm priyām

original: tatra tena viveṣṭantī hyakrāntā hayarūpiṇā // Bhmj_19.69 //
analyzed: tatra tena viveṣṭantī hi akrāntā haya rūpiṇā
parāvṛtta mukhā eva āsīt para saṃsparśa śaṅkayā

original: tato vivasvato vīryaṃ nāsikāthūtkṛtena sā // Bhmj_19.70 //
analyzed: tatas vivasvataḥ vīryam nāsikā athūtkṛtena sā
tat sasarja yatas jātau nāsatyau aśvinau yamau

original: atha saṃjñā parijñāya saumyaṃ devaṃ divākaram // Bhmj_19.71 //
analyzed: atha saṃjñā parijñāya saumyam devam divākaram
nija rūpavatī prāyāt gṛham tad anuyāyinī
manuḥ prajāpatiḥ sasīt pitṝṇām adhipaḥ yamaḥ
tridaśānām ca bhiṣajau aśvinau yamunā sarit
bhāvī prajāpatiḥ ca anyaḥ savarṇā tanayaḥ manuḥ
grahāṇām saptamaḥ ca āsīt manda cārī śanaiśvaraḥ
ikṣvāku śibi śaryāti nābhāga ādyāḥ sutāḥ manoḥ
teṣu jāteṣu putra arthī mittrāvaruṇayoḥ manuḥ
iṣṭim cakāra tatra asya sutā abhūt lalita dyutiḥ
iḍā nāma sphurat ratna bhūṣaṇa uddyotita ambarā
praṇamya padma vadanā manum tad śāsana anugā
mittrāvaruṇayoḥ vāsam tad aṃśā asmi iti sā yayau
sat ācāra ucitā tābhyām sā putrī iti abhinanditā
tad varam prāpa putraḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi manoḥ iti

original: tataḥ pratinivṛttā sā vrajantī gajagāminī // Bhmj_19.78 //
analyzed: tatas pratinivṛttā sā vrajantī gaja gāminī
dṛṣṭvā hariṇaśāvākṣī budhena śaśisūnunā
tad saṃgamāt samāsādya purūravasam ātmajam
strī rūpam sā samutsṛjya pradyumna ākhyaḥ bhavat nṛpaḥ
utkalaḥ vinatāśvaḥ ca gayaḥ ca iti tad ātmajaḥ
ikṣvākoḥ tumupādaḥ bhūt kakutsthaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ
tad vaṃśe kuvalāśvaḥ bhūt uttaṅka vacasā ca yaḥ
vālukā antargatam ghoram dhundhum nāma mahā asuram

original: jaghāna yasya niḥśvāsaiḥ pṛthivī samadahyata // Bhmj_19.82 //
analyzed: jaghāna yasya niḥśvāsaiḥ pṛthivī samadahyata
kuvalāśvasya nṛpateḥ jātaḥ tvayi āruṇiḥ kule
tena satyavrataḥ nāma paura kanyā apahārataḥ
putraḥ śaptaḥ ntya jātiḥ tvam avāptaḥ vijane vasat

original: atrāntare vinā varṣaṃ kṛcchre dvādaśavārṣike // Bhmj_19.84 //
analyzed: atra antare vinā varṣam kṛcchre dvādaśa vārṣike
tatyāja sa sutām bhāryām viśvāmitraḥ mbudheḥ taṭe

original: sāṃ madhyamaṃ gale baddhvā vikretuṃ prastutā sutam // Bhmj_19.85 //
analyzed: madhyamam gale baddhvā vikretum prastutā sutam
satyavratena kṛpayā vāritā vṛtti dāyinā
viśvāmitra sutaḥ ca abhūt gala bandhaḥ sa gālavaḥ

original: sa tyāgādvāritaḥ kiṃ me na piteti purohite /
analyzed: sa tyāgāt vāritaḥ kim me na pitā iti purohite
satyavrataḥ rāja putraḥ vasiṣṭhe manyumān abhūt
kāmadhenum sa tasya atha carantīm śāpa mohitaḥ
nihatya gādhi putrāṇām ātmanaḥ ca aśanam vyadhāt
kopaka tvāt pituḥ dhenu vadhāt a prokṣita aśanāt
tasya vaśiṣṭhaḥ samapātayat
tasya triśaṅku saṃjñasya viśvāmitraḥ pituḥ padam
da tvā abhūt yājakaḥ yena sa dehaḥ tridivam yayau

original: tasya putro hariścandro rājasūye rarāja yaḥ /
analyzed: tasya putraḥ hariścandraḥ rājasūye rarāja yaḥ

original: sagarastatkule rājā yatsutaiḥ sāgaraḥ kṛtaḥ // Bhmj_19.91 //
analyzed: sagaraḥ tad kule rājā yad sutaiḥ sāgaraḥ kṛtaḥ

original: mātuḥ sapatnīdattena jātaḥ saha gareṇa yaḥ /
analyzed: mātuḥ sapatnī dattena jātaḥ saha gareṇa yaḥ
pratyanta deśān jitvā asau pituḥ pūrva apakāriṇaḥ
niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkārān vidadhe lakṣaṇa aṅkitān
cakāra muṇḍa śirasaḥ kāmboja an vadha rakṣaṇāt
śaśaka ūrdhva śiraḥ muṇḍān muktakeśān ca pāratān
pahlavān yavana ādyān ca śmaśru cihnān akalpayat
vaṃśe tasya dilīpaḥ bhūt tasya sūnuḥ bhagīrathaḥ
duhitṛ tvam agāt yasya bhuvi bhāgīrathī nadī
kule tasya abhavat rājā rāmaḥ daśaratha ātmajaḥ
rājarṣi vaṃśāḥ bahavaḥ babhūvuḥ tad sutāt kuśāt
ikṣvākoḥ iti ayam vaṃśaḥ tad bhrātuḥ tu mariṣyataḥ
śakāḥ babhūvuḥ tanayāḥ nābhāgasya sutaḥ bhavat
ambarīṣaḥ mahīpālaḥ vṛṣṇeḥ putrāḥ ca vṛṣṇayaḥ
raṇa dhṛṣṭāḥ śibeḥ putrāḥ śaryāteḥ abhavat sutā
sukanyā cyavanena ūḍhā putraḥ ca anta bhūpatiḥ

original: ravetī tasya tanayā sa purā sahitastayā // Bhmj_19.99 //
analyzed: ravetī tasya tanayā sa purā sahitaḥ tayā
brahma lokam yayau śrotum gāndharva brahmaṇaḥ ntike

original: tato bahuyuge kāle vyatīte kṣaṇaleśavat // Bhmj_19.100 //
analyzed: tatas bahu yuge kāle vyatīte kṣaṇa leśa vat
apaśyat sva purīm etya dvārakām vṛṣṇibhiḥ vṛtām
a spṛṣṭām kāla kalayā brahma loka nivāsataḥ
pradadau balabhadrāya bālām eva sa revatīm

original: dattvā ca tanayāṃ prāyāttapase merukandaram // Bhmj_19.102 //
analyzed: dattvā ca tanayām prāyāt tapase meru kandaram
ikṣvākoḥ anujaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ riṣṭa ākhyaḥ tasya ca ātmajau
vaiśyau brāhmaṇa tām prāptau tapaḥ yogāt akalmaṣau
karūṣaḥ saptamaḥ yaḥ tu kāruṣāḥ tad sutāḥ nṛpāḥ
pṛthukaḥ ca aṣṭamaḥ śūdraḥ babhūva guru go vadhāt
ete babhūvuḥ ikṣvākoḥ bhrātaraḥ ṣṭau manoḥ sutāḥ

original: ityete śrāddhadevasya bhuvi vaṃśadharā manoḥ // Bhmj_19.105 //
analyzed: iti ete śrāddhadevasya bhuvi vaṃśa dharāḥ manoḥ
manu vaṃśaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ śrāddha prasaṅgena pitṛ kalpam mahībhujā
muniḥ prāha avadat bhīṣmaḥ praśna ante yat yudhiṣṭhiram
pitaraḥ pūjitāḥ śrāddhe tribhiḥ piṇḍaiḥ tri pauruṣaiḥ
devata tvena puṣṇanti jantūn nānā gatiṣu api
śaṃtanoḥ udyate piṇḍe śrāddha kāle mayā pituḥ
uttasthau kaṅkaṇa udāraḥ karaḥ kamala komalaḥ

original: taṃ vilokya mayā piṇḍe kuśeṣveva samarpite /
analyzed: tam vilokya mayā piṇḍe kuśeṣu eva samarpite
śāstra akriyā anuvarti tvāt tad toṣa janakaḥ mama
svacchanda maraṇam tasmāt avāpya aham varam varam
tena upadiṣṭam tad kālam mārkaṇḍeyam upasthitam

original: apṛcchaṃ daivataṃ śrāddhaṃ phalaṃ ca pitṛyājinām /
analyzed: apṛccham daivatam śrāddham phalam ca pitṛ yājinām
saḥ bravīt meru śikhare mayā
sanatkumāre bhagavān prāha etat tejasām nidhiḥ

original: brahmā purā surāndṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā tānātmayājinaḥ // Bhmj_19.112 //
analyzed: brahmā purā surān dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā tān ātma yājinaḥ
katham na ete yajante mām iti śāpāt amohayat

original: te naṣṭasaṃvidaḥ sarve prasādya kamalodbhavam // Bhmj_19.113 //
analyzed: te naṣṭa saṃvidaḥ sarve prasādya kamalodbhavam
prāyaścittam nijān putrān papracchuḥ tasya śāsanāt
prāyaścittaiḥ tatas pūtāḥ kriyā jñāna upadeśataḥ
guru tvāt sva sutaiḥ uktāḥ gamyatām putrakāḥ iti

original: ta ete pitaraḥ pūjyā devānāṃ tanayā api // Bhmj_19.115 //
analyzed: te ete pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ devānām tanayāḥ api

original: yeṣāṃ śrāddhaṃ vinā prāhustridaśā niṣphalāḥ kriyāḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām śrāddham vinā prāhuḥ tridaśāḥ niṣphalāḥ kriyāḥ
tad vihīneṣu yāgeṣu phalam aśnanti rākṣasāḥ
anyonyam pitaraḥ tasmāt devāḥ pitṛ gaṇāḥ api

original: śrāddhenāpyāyate somaḥ sa puṣṇātyakhilāḥ prajāḥ // Bhmj_19.117 //
analyzed: śrāddhena āpyāyate somaḥ sa puṣṇāti akhilāḥ prajāḥ
śrāddhena pitaraḥ prītāḥ nṝṇām pitṛ pitāmahān
āpyāyayanti sarvatra tiryagyoni gatān api
catvāraḥ tad gaṇāḥ mūrtāḥ mūrti hīnāḥ trayaḥ gaṇāḥ

original: sudhābhujo yogajuṣo vairājā iti viśrutāḥ // Bhmj_19.119 //
analyzed: sudhā bhujaḥ yoga juṣaḥ vairājāḥ iti viśrutāḥ

original: menākhyā mānasī teṣāṃ kanyā himagireḥ priyā /
analyzed: menā ākhyā mānasī teṣām kanyā himagireḥ priyā
mainākaḥ yad sutaḥ śrīmān pitā krauñca mahā gireḥ
menāyāḥ tanayāḥ tisraḥ yāḥ ceruḥ duścaram tapaḥ
jyeṣṭhā tāsām apārṇa ākhyā bhavānī bhava vallabhā

original: u meti tapaso mātrā vāritābhūdumeti yā /
analyzed: u mā iti tapasaḥ mātrā vāritā abhūt umā iti yā
devalasya ekaparṇā ākhyā dvitīyā abhūt muneḥ vadhūḥ
jaigīṣavyasya bhāryā abhūt tṛtīyā api ekapāṭalā
putrī marīci putrāṇām pitṝṇām api mānasī
acchoda ākhyā vara sarit prāk acchoda saraḥ snutā

original: aparijñāya pitaraṃ sābhilāṣā vilokya sā // Bhmj_19.124 //
analyzed: a parijñāya pitaram sa abhilāṣā vilokya sā
bhraṣṭā papāta tad śāpāt tad prasāda kṛta avadhiḥ

original: aṣṭāviṃśe dvāpare sā saṃbhūtā matsyayonijā // Bhmj_19.125 //
analyzed: aṣṭāviṃśe dvāpare sā saṃbhūtā matsya yoni jā

original: asūta yā sutaṃ vyāsaṃ gandhakālī parāśarāt /
analyzed: asūta yā sutam vyāsam gandhakālī parāśarāt

original: pulastyaputrāḥ pitaro divi barhiṣadaḥ pare // Bhmj_19.126 //
analyzed: pulastya putrāḥ pitaraḥ divi barhiṣadaḥ pare

original: mānasī kanyakā teṣāṃ pīvarī nāma yoginī /
analyzed: mānasī kanyakā teṣām pīvarī nāma yoginī
janayiṣyati apatyāni yasyām vyāsa sutaḥ śukaḥ

original: putrīṃ ca kṛtvā jananīṃ brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ /
analyzed: putrīm ca kṛtvā jananīm brahmadattasya bhūpateḥ
amūrtāḥ karma saṃnyāsāt ete pitṛ gaṇāḥ trayaḥ
somadevān mānava ādīn pūjitāḥ bhāvayanti ye

original: mūrtāstu somapā nāma pitaro 'nye sudhābhujaḥ // Bhmj_19.129 //
analyzed: mūrtāḥ tu somapāḥ nāma pitaraḥ nye sudhā bhujaḥ

original: teṣāṃ gaurmānasī kanyā yajante brāhmaṇāśca tām /
analyzed: teṣām gauḥ mānasī kanyā yajante brāhmaṇāḥ ca tām

original: anye tvaṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ pitaraḥ śraddhavarjitāḥ // Bhmj_19.130 //
analyzed: anye tu aṅgirasaḥ putrāḥ pitaraḥ śraddha varjitāḥ
yaṣṭāraḥ kṣatriyāḥ teṣām yaśodā ākhyā ca kanyakā
sahasra yājinaḥ mātrā dilīpasya mahīpateḥ
ājyapāḥ pitaraḥ putrāḥ kaśyapasya prajāpateḥ

original: yajante tānsadā vaiśyā kanyā teṣāṃ ca mānasī // Bhmj_19.132 //
analyzed: yajante tān sadā vaiśyā kanyā teṣām ca mānasī
virajāḥ nāma jananī yayāteḥ pṛthivīpateḥ

original: sukālā nāma pitaro vaśiṣṭhasya muneḥ sutāḥ // Bhmj_19.133 //
analyzed: sukālāḥ nāma pitaraḥ vaśiṣṭhasya muneḥ sutāḥ
śūdrāṇām eva te pūjyāḥ tad putrī narmadā sarit
kuru kutsa priyāḥ sutaḥ nṛpaḥ
ete pitṛ gaṇāḥ mūrtāḥ catvāraḥ varṇa daivatam

original: yeṣāṃ yuge yuge pūjāṃ śrāddhadevo 'bhyadhānmanuḥ // Bhmj_19.135 //
analyzed: yeṣām yuge yuge pūjām śrāddhadevaḥ bhyadhāt manuḥ

original: rājataṃ rājatāṅkaṃ vā yātaṃ teṣāṃ svadhābhujām /
analyzed: rājatam rājata aṅkam vā yātam teṣām svadhā bhujām
śastram śrāddhe soma vahni manu pūjā puras sare

original: ta ete pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ krodhahīnāḥ prasādinaḥ /
analyzed: te ete pitaraḥ pūjyāḥ krodha hīnāḥ prasādinaḥ
saṃkalpa kalpa latikā bhaktiḥ yeṣām mahā phalā
dharma apacārāt vibhraṣṭāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ pitṛ pūjayā

original: yathā svapadameṣyanti tatsarvaṃ drakṣyasi kratau // Bhmj_19.138 //
analyzed: yathā sva padam eṣyanti tat sarvam drakṣyasi kratau
śrāddha bhāvam vijānīhi svayam iti abhidhāya saḥ

original: sanatkumāro divyaṃ me cakṣurduttvā tirodadhe // Bhmj_19.139 //
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ divyam me cakṣuḥ duttvā tirodadhe
paśyam kurukṣetre viprān kālena sapta tān

original: vāgduṣṭaḥ krodhano hiṃsraḥ piśunaḥ svasṭamaḥ kaviḥ // Bhmj_19.140 //
analyzed: vāgduṣṭaḥ krodhanaḥ hiṃsraḥ piśunaḥ svasṭamaḥ kaviḥ
pitṛvartī ca iti nāma sadṛśa ākāra sevinaḥ

original: atha kauśikadāyādā gurorgārgyasya te purā // Bhmj_19.141 //
analyzed: atha kauśika dāyādāḥ guroḥ gārgyasya te purā

original: prasthitāḥ pathi gāṃ mūḍhāḥ kṣudhārtā hantumudyayuḥ /
analyzed: prasthitāḥ pathi gām mūḍhāḥ kṣudhā ārtāḥ hantum udyayuḥ

original: yadā nivāryamāṇāste kavinā svasṭamena ca // Bhmj_19.142 //
analyzed: yadā nivāryamāṇāḥ te kavinā svasṭamena ca
na nivṛttāḥ tadā kopāt pitṛvartī jagāda tān
sarvathā etat akāryam vaḥ garhitam sarva jantubhiḥ
śrāddha pūrvaḥ yama ārambhaḥ kriyatām yadi durgrahaḥ

original: etadākarṇya te sarve taduktaṃ cakrire vidhim // Bhmj_19.144 //
analyzed: etat ākarṇya te sarve tat uktam cakrire vidhim
tatas te hiṃsayā kāle śaptāḥ ajāyanta lubdhakāḥ
daśārṇeṣu sva karma sthāḥ satya śīla parāyaṇāḥ

original: janmāntare śrāddhaphalālluptā teṣāṃ na tu smṛtiḥ /
analyzed: janmāntare śrāddha phalāt luptā teṣām na tu smṛtiḥ

original: nirvairī nirvṛtiḥ kṣānto nirmanyurvaidhasaḥ kṛtiḥ // Bhmj_19.146 //
analyzed: nirvairī nirvṛtiḥ kṣāntaḥ nirmanyuḥ vaidhasaḥ kṛtiḥ
mātṛvartī ca te vyādhāḥ pitṛ sevā kṛtakṣaṇāḥ

original: dhanūṃṣi pitroḥ pānīye vihāya vyasavo 'bhavan // Bhmj_19.147 //
analyzed: dhanūṃṣi pitroḥ pānīye vihāya vyasavaḥ bhavan
tatas phulla latā puñja kuñje kālāñjane girau
trāsa āyāsa vivignāḥ te jātāḥ jātismarāḥ mṛgāḥ
unmukhaḥ nitya cakitaḥ stabdha varṇaḥ su locanaḥ

original: ghasmaraḥ piṇḍito nādī ceti ceṣṭocitābhidhāḥ // Bhmj_19.149 //

analyzed: te brahmacāriṇaḥ kṣāntāḥ pūrva vidyā vivāsitāḥ
vihāriṇaḥ meru taṭī gatvā prāṇān paryatyajan
adyāmi meru gāminyaḥ kālāñjana taṭa utthitāḥ
teṣām kanakūṭeṣu dṛśyante pāda paṅktayaḥ
tatas śucisarit dvīpe laharī dhaita saikate
babhūvuḥ cakravākāḥ te taruṇāḥ brahmacāriṇaḥ
nirmamaḥ niḥspṛhaḥ kṣāntaḥ nirvairaḥ niṣpratigrahaḥ
nirvṛtaḥ nibhṛtaḥ ca iti yoginaḥ te vihaṅgamāḥ
jātāḥ tatra ca te haṃsāḥ tapaḥ yoga parāyaṇāḥ
vāla anila ākula utphulla kamala utpala māline
salile vilasanti ete vibhrājam nāma bhūpatim
dadṛśuḥ padma vadanā vṛndaiḥ jita sarovaram
pātum yadṛcchayā āyātam tīra upānta latā vane
śacīpatim iva ālokya tam kanīyān vihaṅgamaḥ
tasya rājya spṛhām cakre tad aiśvarya hṛta āśayaḥ

original: dvau cābhūtāṃ khagau tasya spṛhānugatamānasau // Bhmj_19.157 //
analyzed: dvau ca abhūtām khagau tasya spṛhā anugata mānasau

original: tataḥ kālena te sarve sārasā vyasavo 'bhavan /
analyzed: tatas kālena te sarve sārasāḥ vyasavaḥ bhavan
vivaibhrājam tat vanam abhūt saraḥ ca nṛpa sevitam
vibhrājasya atha putraḥ bhūdaṇuhaḥ nāma bhūpatiḥ

original: tasmai vitṝṇāṃ dauhitrīṃ putrīṃ vyāsasutaḥ śukaḥ // Bhmj_19.159 //
analyzed: tasmai vitṝṇām dauhitrīm putrīm vyāsa sutaḥ śukaḥ
kṛtvīm nāma dadau divya yoginām adhidevatām

original: tasyāḥ sa haṃsaḥ putro 'bhūdyogabhraṣṭo hatasmṛtiḥ // Bhmj_19.160 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ sa haṃsaḥ putraḥ bhūt yoga bhraṣṭaḥ hata smṛtiḥ

original: brahmadatta iti khyātaḥ kāmpilye nagare nṛpaḥ /
analyzed: brahmadattaḥ iti khyātaḥ kāmpilye nagare nṛpaḥ
pāñcālapuka
ṇḍarīka ākhyau tasya āstām sacivau nṛpau
haṃsau spṛhā bhraṣṭa yogau yau tau tad anuga āśayau
jātismarāḥ tu catvāraḥ jātāḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ
brahmadattasya dayitā devalasya ātmajā muneḥ
babhūva saṃnatiḥ nāma māninī madirā avaniḥ
sa kadācid latā lāsya vyālola pavane vane
sevyamānaḥ tayā tantryā vijahāra smara upamaḥ
sarva prāṇi ruta jñaḥ sau tatra praṇaya kopataḥ

original: pipīlakāyāḥ śuśrāva bhartustāṃ tāṃ prasādanām // Bhmj_19.165 //
analyzed: pipīlakāyāḥ śuśrāva bhartuḥ tām tām prasādanām
sa tat śrutvā calat cāru kapola phalakaḥ nṛpaḥ
jahāsa dayitā kaṇṭhe kurvat muktā āvalīm iva
kasmāt akasmāt me nāthaḥ hasati iti vilajjitā
sā abhavat padma vadanā candra udaye iva abjinī
pipīlaka ruta āścarye kathite mahībhujā
prāṇatyāga eka saṃkalpā tat asatyam amanyata
dayitā dīrgha kopena vivignaḥ vasudhādhipaḥ
nirāhāra vrataḥ viṣṇum dadarśa prayata āśayaḥ
kuśalam bhavitā prātar tava iti hari śāsanāt
prabhāte ratham āruhya puram sa sacivaḥ viśat
atrā antare taiḥ caturbhiḥ dvijaiḥ jātismaraiḥ pitā

original: visṛṣṭaḥ śrāvaya nṛpaṃ ślokamityājagāma tam // Bhmj_19.171 //
analyzed: visṛṣṭaḥ śrāvaya nṛpam ślokam iti ājagāma tam

original: sa samāsādya bhūpālaṃ sacivābhyāṃ saha sthitam /
analyzed: sa samāsādya bhūpālam sacivābhyām saha sthitam
idam āśrāvayat vipraḥ kim api utsuka mānasam

original: sapta dāśā daśārṇeṣu girau kālāñjane mṛgāḥ /
analyzed: sapta dāśāḥ daśārṇeṣu girau kālāñjane mṛgāḥ

original: cakravākā nadīdvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase // Bhmj_19.173 //
analyzed: cakravākāḥ nadī dvīpe haṃsāḥ sarasi mānase

original: vayaṃ te 'dya kurukṣetre jātā vedavido dvijāḥ /
analyzed: vayam te dya kurukṣetre jātāḥ veda vidaḥ dvijāḥ
gantāraḥ dūram adhvānam yūyam kim avasādinaḥ
śrutvā etat smṛta yoga ātmā niḥspanda karaṇaḥ nṛpaḥ

original: sacivābhyāṃ saha paraṃ dhāma tacca samāyayau // Bhmj_19.175 //
analyzed: sacivābhyām saha param dhāma tat ca samāyayau
śrāddha prabhāvāt iti etat kṣapayitvā ugra pātakam

original: yātāḥ kauśikadāyādā yoginaḥ paramaṃ padam // Bhmj_19.176 //
analyzed: yātāḥ kauśika dāyādāḥ yoginaḥ paramam padam
śāntanoḥ śāsanāt etat mārkaṇḍeyāt śrutam mayā
brahmadattasya putraḥ bhūt viśvaksenaḥ mahīpatiḥ
daṇḍasenaḥ sutaḥ tasya bhallāṭaḥ ca tad ātmajaḥ

original: yaḥ karṇena purā vīro digjaye vinipātitaḥ // Bhmj_19.178 //
analyzed: yaḥ karṇena purā vīraḥ digjaye vinipātitaḥ
bhallāṭasya abhavat sūnuḥ durnayī janamejayaḥ
ugrāyudhaḥ tha tad putraḥ pāpa ācāraḥ niraṅkuśaḥ

original: tridivaṃ śantanau yāte hartuṃ satyavatīṃ balāt /
analyzed: tridivam śantanau yāte hartum satyavatīm balāt

original: manaścakāra durvṛttastato yadhi mayā hataḥ // Bhmj_19.180 //
analyzed: manaḥ cakāra durvṛttaḥ tatas yadhi mayā hataḥ
iti śrāddha phalam bhīṣmaḥ babhāṣe dharmanandanam

original: śrāddhenāpyāyate somo vṛṣṇayo yasya vaṃśajāḥ // Bhmj_19.181 //
analyzed: śrāddhena āpyāyate somaḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ yasya vaṃśa jāḥ
atriḥ cacāra bhagavān maunī muni varaḥ purā

original: tapo varṣasahasrāṇi divyāni trīṇī niścalaḥ // Bhmj_19.182 //
analyzed: tapaḥ varṣa sahasrāṇi divyāni trīṇi niścalaḥ
tasya atha nirnimeṣasya śarīram brahmacāriṇaḥ
abhūt divya amṛta mayam kāntam dugdha udadheḥ iva
tatas susrāva netrābhyām atreḥ tat daśadhā srutam
amṛtam dikṣu daśasu prabhā saṃpūrita ambaram
vṛtam tat daśabhiḥ garbhe digbhiḥ yatnena duḥsaham

original: somatvamāptaṃ sahasā papāta bhuvi bhāsvaram // Bhmj_19.185 //
analyzed: soma tvam āptam sahasā papāta bhuvi bhāsvaram
tasmin nipatite tūrṇam kampite bhuvanatraye

original: rathe vedamaye brahmā sahasrāśve tamādadhe // Bhmj_19.186 //
analyzed: rathe veda maye brahmā sahasra aśve tam ādadhe
tam ratha stham muni varāḥ devāḥ trailokya bhāvanam
tuṣṭuvuḥ tejasaḥ vṛddhaye sarva jit yena saḥ bhavat
vatsarāṇām cakāra asau pūrṇam padma śatam tapaḥ
utpannāḥ tejasā tasya divya oṣadhi sudhā gaṇāḥ
rājā rājya abhiṣiktaḥ tha brahmaṇā brāhmaṇa adhipaḥ

original: vallabho dakṣaputrīṇāṃ rājasūye rarāja saḥ // Bhmj_19.189 //
analyzed: vallabhaḥ dakṣa putrīṇām rājasūye rarāja saḥ
lokān avinaya utsekāḥ cacāra śrī viśṛṅkhalaḥ

original: jahāra tarasā so 'tha tārāṃ nāma bṛhaspateḥ /
analyzed: jahāra tarasā saḥ tha tārām nāma bṛhaspateḥ
vallabhām vibhava udbhūta bhūtena udbhāvyate na kaḥ

original: tridaśairbodhyamāno 'pi na sa tatyāja tāṃ yadā /
analyzed: tridaśaiḥ bodhyamānaḥ pi na sa tatyāja tām yadā

original: tadā bṛhaspateḥ pakṣaṃ śukro rudrastathāgrahīt // Bhmj_19.192 //
analyzed: tadā bṛhaspateḥ pakṣam śukraḥ rudraḥ tathā agrahīt
tatas pravṛtte samare bhairave tārakā maye
devānām rudra mukhyānām vīreṇa tuhinātviṣā
astram brahmaśiraḥ spṛsṛ
yaśaḥ chedi divaukasām
alpa avaśeṣām akarot bhagna dhvasta hatām camūm
trastaiḥ atha suraiḥ etya yācitaḥ kamalodbhavaḥ

original: nirvāya sāmnā samaraṃ dadau jāyāṃ bṛhaspateḥ // Bhmj_19.195 //
analyzed: nirvāya sāmnā samaram dadau jāyām bṛhaspateḥ
sagarbhām āgātām ūce sa tām īrṣyā viṣa ulbaṇaḥ

original: na dhāryo 'yaṃ tvayā garbho madyonāvityadhomukhīm // Bhmj_19.196 //
analyzed: na dhāryaḥ yam tvayā garbhaḥ mad yonau iti adhomukhīm
tatas tatyāja sā garbham iṣīkā stambha saṃstare
tejasā jāta mātraḥ sau vibudhān ajayat budhaḥ

original: pṛṣṭā tato 'yaṃ kasyeti devairnovāca sā yadā /
analyzed: pṛṣṭā tatas yam kasya iti devaiḥ nā uvāca sā yadā
tadā pṛṣṭāḥ viriñcena candrasya iti avadat laghu
sa putraḥ śaśinaḥ śrīmān pratikūla udayaḥ divi
śiśira vyajanaḥ dhīmān babhau vibudha nandanaḥ
atha kālena śītāṃśuḥ dakṣiṇā kṣīṇa maṇḍalaḥ
para dāra parāmarṣāt taptaḥ śaraṇam yayau
sa tena putra vātsalyāt mantraiḥ kṣapita kilbiṣaḥ

original: rarāja yakṣmaṇā muktaḥ punaryukto nijaśriyā // Bhmj_19.201 //
analyzed: rarāja yakṣmaṇā muktaḥ punar yuktaḥ nija śriyā
soma utpattiḥ
iḍāyām atha putraḥ bhūt budhasya sa purūravāḥ
yasya abhūt bhū vana ślāghyā kāntā kīrtiḥ iva urvaśī
tasya ṣaṭ tanayāḥ tasyām abhavan tridaśālaye
āyuḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ nṛpaḥ teṣām nahuṣaḥ pi āyuṣaḥ sutaḥ
raji prabhṛtayaḥ tasya catvāraḥ pi anujāḥ purā
deva asura raṇe pūrvam sāhāyye vajrapāṇinā
rajiḥ vṛtaḥ sva rājyena paṇena nahuṣānujaḥ
sa hatvā ditijān vīrān sura indra tvam paṇa arjitam
tvad putraḥ smi iti śakreṇa dhūrtena abhihitaḥ tyajat

original: atha kālena jayino rajeḥ putrā mahaujasaḥ // Bhmj_19.206 //
analyzed: atha kālena jayinaḥ rajeḥ putrāḥ mahā ojasaḥ
rājyam tridaśa rājasya jahruḥ pitṛ bala arjitam

original: hṛtarājyaḥ sa śakro 'tha hṛtabhāgaḥ kratuṣvapi // Bhmj_19.207 //
analyzed: hṛta rājyaḥ sa hṛta bhāgaḥ kratuṣu api
yayāce badarī mātram puroḍāśam bṛhaspatim
tena bāla mukha abjena yācitaḥ naṣṭa cetasā
cakāra raji putrāṇām mati moham bṛhaspatiḥ

original: tataste rāgiṇo mattā vibhraṣṭā nyāyavartmanaḥ // Bhmj_19.209 //
analyzed: tatas te rāgiṇaḥ mattāḥ vibhraṣṭāḥ nyāya vartmanaḥ
saṃvṛttāḥ bhṛśam utsekāt naṣṭa vīrya parākramāḥ
tena tān durjayān hatvā vajrī sva padam āptavān
śaphara utphāla caṭulāḥ durvṛttānām hi saṃpadaḥ
nahṛṣasya abhavat putraḥ yayātiḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
divyena yaḥ ratha agryeṇa ṣaṣ rātreṇa ajayat jagat

original: yo 'sau kālena tadvaṃśe śāpānnaṣṭo rathottamaḥ // Bhmj_19.212 //
analyzed: kālena tad vaṃśe śāpāt naṣṭaḥ ratha uttamaḥ
jarāsaṃdhena saṃprāptaḥ hṛtaḥ yaḥ pi asura ariṇā
yayāteḥ śukra kanyāyām devayānyām babhūvatuḥ
yaduḥ caturvasuḥ ca iti tanayau saṃmatau satām
vṛṣaparva sutāyāḥ ca śarmiṣṭhāyāḥ sutāḥ trayaḥ
druhya anupūru nāmānaḥ tasya āsan vaṃśa vardhanāḥ

original: kāle 'tha vipule yāte yayātiḥ pravayāḥ sutān // Bhmj_19.215 //
analyzed: kāle tha vipule yāte yayātiḥ pravayāḥ sutān
yayāce yauvanam kāmī jarayā jagatīpatiḥ
mṛtyu siṃha nakha śreṇīm sukha padma hima āhatim
yadā kaścid na jagrāha jarām puruḥ tadā agrahīt
tasmāt yauvanam āsādya yadu mukhyān atho parān
yayātiḥ aśapat vaṃśyāḥ yena eṣām a nṛpāḥ sadā

original: tato didṛkṣuḥ kāmānāṃ pāraṃ taruṇavigrahaḥ // Bhmj_19.218 //
analyzed: tatas didṛkṣuḥ kāmānām pāram taruṇa vigrahaḥ
viśvasya nāka kāminyāḥ nandane vijahāra saḥ
su ciram sevamānaḥ pi rājā rājīva locanām
yadā pravardhamāna icchaḥ kāmānām na antam āyayau

original: tadā rājyaṃ sutasyaiva purordatvā jarāṃ nijām // Bhmj_19.220 //
analyzed: tadā rājyam sutasya eva puroḥ da tvā jarām nijām
jagrāha jāta vairāgyaḥ jagau ca idam muni vrataḥ
citram bhoga abhilāṣaḥ yam bhoga abhyāsena vardhate
vellat kallola jālena salilena iva vāḍavaḥ
bata visphāra saṃsāra saroruha rajaḥ chaṭā
prītiḥ pratiniśam mugdhān badhnāti madhupān iva
jīryatām api a jīrya ūrṇo
yam naśyatām api naśvaraḥ
kāmaḥ kāmavatām antar ghuṇaḥ kṣitiruhām iva
niṣiddhaḥ niyamena api dhairyeṇa api avadhīritaḥ
rāgaḥ jvalati aho vastreṇa ācchāditaḥ iva anilaḥ

original: iti saṃcintya niyato yayātistapasā yutaḥ // Bhmj_19.225 //
analyzed: iti saṃcintya niyataḥ yayātiḥ tapasā yutaḥ
kula ucitena vidhinā yaśaḥ śeṣa tvam āyayau
pūroḥ yayāti putrasya vaśe su vipule kṣitau
pravartamāne bahudhā kālena abhūt mahīpatiḥ

original: duṣyanto yasya bharataḥ putro bhāratavaṃśakṛt // Bhmj_19.227 //
analyzed: duṣyantaḥ yasya bharataḥ putraḥ bhārata vaṃśa kṛt
avadāte kule yasya jātaḥ si janamejayaḥ

original: ityeṣa pauravo vaṃśaḥ pūrvameva mayoditaḥ // Bhmj_19.228 //
analyzed: iti eṣa pauravaḥ vaṃśaḥ pūrvam eva mayā uditaḥ
pūru vaṃśaḥ
turvasoḥ tu mahān vaṃśaḥ yasmin jātaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ

original: maruttastatsuto yasmai dadau hema maheśvaraḥ // Bhmj_19.229 //
analyzed: maruttaḥ tad sutaḥ yasmai dadau hema maheśvaraḥ
tasya āsan vipule vaṃśe pāṇḍya caulāḥ sa keralāḥ
rājā marutpatiḥ nāma druhya vaṃśe tu ajāyata
kṛcchreṇa dīrghasaṃgrāme yauvanāśvena yaḥ hataḥ
gāndhāraḥ tad sutaḥ yasya vaṃśe jātāḥ turaṅgamāḥ
anoḥ tu vaṃśe dharma ādyāḥ jātāḥ pratyanta bhūmipāḥ

original: yadostu prasṛte vaṃśe kṛtavīryātmajo nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_19.232 //
analyzed: yadoḥ tu prasṛte vaṃśe kṛtavīrya ātmajaḥ nṛpaḥ
kārtavīrya arjunaḥ jātaḥ sahasra bhuja durmadaḥ
hehaya ānartabhoja ādyaḥ tālajaṅghāḥ ca tad kule
kālena jātaḥ tad vaṃśe vṛṣaḥ vṛṣa sutaḥ madhuḥ
vṛṣaṇaḥ tad sutaḥ yasya vaṃśe sāgara vṛṣṇayaḥ
andhakaḥ pi anvaye teṣām abhūt andhaka vaṃśa kṛt

original: bahuśākhe ca tadvaṃśe jāto krūraḥ sahasradaḥ // Bhmj_19.235 //
analyzed: bahuśākhe ca tad vaṃśe jātaḥ krūraḥ sahasra daḥ
tad pitṛvya kule kāle śūraḥ śrīmān ajāyata
vasudevaḥ sutaḥ tasya babhūva ānakadundubhiḥ
yasmin jāte divi mahān abhūt dundubhi niḥsvanaḥ
bhrātā asya devabhāga ākhyaḥ tathā devaśravāḥ paraḥ

original: anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavako vatsaḥ śyāmo vavṛñja saḥ /
analyzed: anādhṛṣṭiḥ kanavakaḥ vatsaḥ śyāmaḥ vavṛñja saḥ

original: pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthākhyā ca śrutadevī śrutaśravāḥ // Bhmj_19.238 //
analyzed: pṛthukīrtiḥ pṛthākhyā ca śrutadevī śrutaśravāḥ
rājādhidevī pañca etāḥ ca anujāḥ
pṛthukīrti sutaḥ rājā dantavakraḥ nṛpa ātmajaḥ
pṛthā sutāḥ dharmarāja bhīmasena dhanaṃjayāḥ
śrutaśravāyāḥ tanayaḥ śiśupālaḥ mahā balaḥ
daitya rājaḥ sau hiraṇyakaśipuḥ purā
pitṛvya vaṃśe śūrasya śaineyaḥ satyakaḥ bhavat
sātyakiḥ tasya tanayaḥ yuyudhāna apara abhidhaḥ
uddhavaḥ vibudha ācāryaḥ śatrudeva mukhāḥ tathā
śatrudevasya naiṣādiḥ ekalavyaḥ bhavat kule
vatsāvate tu aputrāya vasudevaḥ pratāpavān
adbhiḥ dadau sutam vīram śauriḥ kauśikam aurasam
gaṇḍūṣakāya a putrāya cāru doṣṇa ādikān hariḥ

original: dve bhārye vasudevasya rohiṇī devakī tathā /
analyzed: dve bhārye vasudevasya rohiṇī devakī tathā

original: rohiṇītanayo rāmaḥ sāraṇo durdamaḥ subhaḥ // Bhmj_19.245 //

analyzed: śubhra piṇḍāra damanāḥ te mahāvadana ātmajāḥ

original: anujā ca subhadraiṣā mahiṣī savyasācinaḥ // Bhmj_19.246 //
analyzed: anujā ca su bhadrā eṣā mahiṣī savyasācinaḥ
rāmasya niṣadhaḥ nāma revatyām abhavat sutaḥ
vasudevasya ca anyāsu bhāryāsu hi abhavan sutāḥ
bhoja upāsaṅga vijayāḥ vṛṣadevaḥ gadaḥ tathā
pauṇḍraḥ niṣāda nāthaḥ ca iti ugra vīrya parākramāḥ
atra antare gārgya muniḥ dhanu kālāyasa aśanaḥ

original: cacāra dvādaśa samā brahmacārī paraṃ tapaḥ // Bhmj_19.250 //
analyzed: cacāra dvādaśa samāḥ brahmacārī param tapaḥ
trigarta rāja sutayā parīkṣāyai sa vibhramam
na cacāla āyasa prakhyaḥ hriyamāṇa śayaḥ pi yaḥ
sa manyu taptaḥ gopāla kanyāyām rudra śāsanāt
asṛjat kālayavanam kālam sarva mahībhujām
rathe yasya hayāḥ ghorāḥ vṛṣa pūrva ardha vigrahāḥ

original: gṛhīto yavanendreṇa niṣputreṇa sa putrakaḥ // Bhmj_19.253 //
analyzed: gṛhītaḥ yavana indreṇa niṣputreṇa sa putrakaḥ
yuddha arthī darpa saṃmattaḥ papraccha su bhaṭān bhuvi

original: nāradasya girā jñātvā sa vīrānvṛṣṇiyādavān // Bhmj_19.254 //
analyzed: nāradasya girā jñātvā sa vīrān vṛṣṇi yādavān
mathurān ilayān jetum akṣauhiṇyā samādravat
te kālayavana ākrāntāḥ jarāsaṃdhena ca arditāḥ
vṛṣṇayaḥ mathurām tyaktvā dvārakām cakruḥ ambudhau

original: vaṃśaskandheṣu cānyeṣu saṃbhūtā yādavāḥ pare // Bhmj_19.256 //
analyzed: vaṃśa skandheṣu ca anyeṣu saṃbhūtāḥ yādavāḥ pare
sātvatasya abhavat daivaiḥ udgīta caritaḥ kule
yajvā devāvṛdhaḥ rājā babhruḥ tasya ātmajaḥ bhavat
āpagāyām sarva ṛṇāyām jātaḥ koṭi sahasra daḥ
saṃbhūtāḥ tad kule vīrāḥ bhojāḥ te śāntikāvatāḥ
andhakāt kukkuraḥ jātaḥ tad vaṃśyaḥ pyāhukaḥ bhavat
praṇetā vṛṣṇi vaṃśānām rājā kṛta yuga ucitaḥ
devakaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca tad sutau devakasya tu
devavat pramukāḥ putrāḥ devakyāḥ yaḥ ca kanyakāḥ
yāḥ sapta vasudevāya vitīrṇāḥ vīra mātaraḥ
ugrasena sutaḥ kaṃsaḥ nyagrodha pramukha agrajaḥ

original: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tanvī pālī kahvā ca kanyakāḥ /
analyzed: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī tanvī pālī kahvā ca kanyakāḥ
vidūratha kule bhoje babhūva hṛdika abhidhaḥ
kṛtavarma mukhāḥ tasya śatadhanva ādayaḥ sutāḥ
kroṣṭoḥ vaṃśe prasenaḥ bhūt satrājit senajit tathā

original: ityete bahavo vaṃśā viśrutā yādavā yadoḥ // Bhmj_19.263 //
analyzed: iti ete bahavaḥ vaṃśāḥ viśrutāḥ yādavāḥ yadoḥ
yadu vaṃśaḥ
abdheḥ taṭe dvāravatyām niveśe viṣadam maṇim

original: divyaṃ syamantakaṃ nāma prasenaḥ kila labdhavān // Bhmj_19.264 //
analyzed: divyam syamantakam nāma prasenaḥ kila labdhavān
sa maṇiḥ kanaka syandī vyāyi durbhikṣa nāśanaḥ
śaktena api utsukena api na hṛtaḥ tasya śauriṇā
kālena mṛgayā āsaktaḥ prasenaḥ maṇi bhūṣitaḥ

original: siṃhena nihato yuddhe sahasā maṇihāriṇā // Bhmj_19.266 //
analyzed: siṃhena nihataḥ yuddhe sahasā maṇi hāriṇā
yāntam javena tam siṃham ṛkṣa rājaḥ
nihatya maṇim ādāya balavān bilam āviśat
vṛṣṇi andhaka hatam dṛṣṭvā prasenam vijane vane
maṇi lobhāt kṛtam sarvam kṛṣṇena iti śaśaṅkire
viśuddha bhāvaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pi tam anveṣṭum yayau maṇim
mithyā kalaṅkam yaśasām apavādam saheta kaḥ
sa asram prasenam ālokya sa siṃheta vidāritam

original: tasyāvidūre siṃhaṃ ca dadarśa vinipātitam // Bhmj_19.270 //
analyzed: tasya avidūre siṃham ca dadarśa vinipātitam
maṇeḥ alābhe vijñāya padavīm ṛkṣa śaṃsinīm

original: guhāṃ praviśya gambhīraṃ dadarśa vipulaṃ bilam // Bhmj_19.271 //
analyzed: guhām praviśya gambhīram dadarśa vipulam bilam

original: tatra dhātryā sa śuśrāva vacanaṃ bālasāntvane /
analyzed: tatra dhātryā sa śuśrāva vacanam bāla sāntvane

original: tavaivāsau maṇiḥ putra mā rodīḥ sukumāraka // Bhmj_19.272 //
analyzed: tava eva asau maṇiḥ putra mā rodīḥ sukumāraka
śrutvā iti jñāta vṛttāntaḥ jāmbavantam dadarśa saḥ
tena atha yuyudhe kṛṣṇaḥ divasān ekaviṃśatim
daśagrīva ugra saṃgrāma śastra ullikhita vakṣasam

original: jāmbavantaṃ vijityātha dattāṃ tena sutāṃ hariḥ // Bhmj_19.274 //
analyzed: jāmbavantam vijitya atha dattām tena sutām hariḥ

original: bimbādharāṃ jāmbavatīṃ lebhe taṃ ca syamantakam /
analyzed: bimba adharām jāmbavatīm lebhe tam ca syamantakam
tatas dvāravatīm etya syamantakam udāra dhīḥ
sa prasena anujāya eva dadau sattrajite maṇim
satyabhāmā mukhāḥ tisraḥ satrājit muravairiṇaḥ
pradadau kanyakāḥ kāma kumuda ākāra candrikāḥ
satrājitam ghātayitvā bhojena śatadhanvanā
aharat maṇim akrūraḥ mithas sāhāyya saṃvidā

original: satyabhāmā svayaṃ gatvā hate pitari duḥkhitā // Bhmj_19.278 //
analyzed: satyabhāmā svayam gatvā hate pitari duḥkhitā
jatu veśmani dagdheṣu pārtheṣu dhṛtarāṣṭra jaiḥ
śārṅgadhanvānam āsādya vāraṇāvata vāsinam
hatam nyavedayat sa aśruḥ pitaram śatadhanvanā
tatas tūrṇam samabhyetya dvārakām garuḍadhvajaḥ
rāmeṇa sahiti gatvā yuyudhe śatadhanvanā
cakre maṇipradasya api na akrūraḥ sya sahāya tām

original: svārthakāle vyatīte hi dhūrtā no kasyacinnijāḥ /
analyzed: sva artha kāle vyatīte hi dhūrtāḥ no kasyacid nijāḥ
adhiruhya āśu vaḍavām śata yojana gāminīm
vidrutam śatadhanvānam mithilā abhimukham javāt

original: jaghāna kaiṭabhārātirnāsasāda ca taṃ maṇim // Bhmj_19.283 //
analyzed: jaghāna kaiṭabhārātiḥ na āsasāda ca tam maṇim
saḥ pahnutaḥ maṇiḥ iti kruddhaḥ smai lāṅgalī mṛṣā

original: na dvārakāṃ viśāmīti mithilāṃ vimukho yayau // Bhmj_19.284 //
analyzed: na dvārakām viśāmi iti mithilām vimukhaḥ yayau
tatra duryodhanaḥ tasmāt gadā śikṣām avāptavān
tatas kṛṣṇa anugaiḥ etya vṛṣṇi vīraiḥ prasāditaḥ
dvārakām āyayau śrīmān jāta tattvaḥ halāyudhaḥ
akrūraḥ pi maṇi sphītaḥ bahu yajñaḥ bahu pradaḥ
sukham nināya ṣaṣṭi abdīm dīkṣā kavaca rakṣitaḥ

original: vyaktiṃ yāte maṇau kiṃcidbhīte rāmatsakeśavāt // Bhmj_19.287 //
analyzed: vyaktim yāte maṇau kiṃcid bhīte rāmat sa keśavāt
apayāte tatas krūre na avarṣat pākaśāsanaḥ
jñāti bheda bhayāt pūrvam kṛṣṇena upekṣitaḥ ciram
prasādya panar ānītaḥ durbhikṣa ārtaiḥ sa yādavaiḥ
tasmin dānapatau prāpte vavarṣa tridiva veśvaraḥ

original: kālena yācitaḥ sāmnā kṛṣṇena sa dadau maṇim /
analyzed: kālena yācitaḥ sāmnā kṛṣṇena sa dadau maṇim

original: tasmai svasāraṃ cākrūraḥ prītaye cārulocanām // Bhmj_19.290 //
analyzed: tasmai svasāram ca akrūraḥ prītaye cāru locanām
vinaya ārjava tuṣṭaḥ tam keśavaḥ pi maṇim dadau

original: akrūrāyaiva mahatāṃ praṇayānto hi durgrahaḥ // Bhmj_19.291 //
analyzed: akrūrāya eva mahatām praṇaya antaḥ hi durgrahaḥ
syamantaka ālambhaḥ
kula āvalīm yādavānām niśamya janamejayaḥ
vismitaḥ janmanā viṣṇoḥ vaiśampāyanam abravīt
aho nu mahat āścaryam apūrvam pratibhāti me
katham jagannivāsaḥ bhūt carācara guruḥ naraḥ
yat kukṣi koṭare śete kalpa ante bhuvana āvalī
sa katham mānuṣī garbham prapede bhūtabhāvanaḥ
vaiśvarūpyam idam yasya sarva bhūta antarātmanaḥ
icchā mātra samunmeṣa darpaṇe pratibimbitam

original: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā jagāda mudito muniḥ /
analyzed: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā jagāda muditaḥ muniḥ
śrūyatām adbhutam janma viṣṇoḥ janma bhaya chidaḥ
yena yajñavarāheṇa veda yajña mayam vapuḥ
kṛtvā uddhṛtā vasumatī catur arṇava mekhalā
babhau kuvalaya śyāmā daṃṣṭa agre yasya medinī
bāla śevala vallī iva līnā palvala keliṣu
yena kesariṇā śaṅkha śubhrābhiḥ nakha śuktibhiḥ
āyuṣā saha niṣpītam hiraṇyakaśipoḥ yaśaḥ
uraḥ sthala asthi nirgharṣāt nakha krakaca pañjare

original: yasya daityavadhe kopaḥ prāpa kalpāgniketutām // Bhmj_19.300 //
analyzed: yasya daitya vadhe kopaḥ prāpa kalpa agni ketu tām
trailokya kramaṇe yasya vijaya dhvaja tām yayau
pādaḥ gaṅgā jala ullāsa vyālola dhavala aṃśukaḥ
kharvaḥ pūrvam atha prāṃśuḥ aprameyaḥ tatas bhavat

original: yaśca harṣaśca devānāṃ mohaśca tridaśadviṣām // Bhmj_19.302 //
analyzed: yaḥ ca harṣaḥ ca devānām mohaḥ ca tridaśa dviṣām
yasya kuṇḍala tām karṇe raviḥ nābhau saroja tām
prāpa pravardhamānasya gulphe kaṭaka ratna tām
uccais vilokayantīnām tat vapuḥ sura yoṣitām
vali vidhvaṃsa bhītyā iva na adṛśyata vali trayam
dattātreya avatāreṇa dharma ācārasya majjataḥ

original: vedānāṃ ca kṛtaṃ yena sthityai hastāvalambanam // Bhmj_19.305 //
analyzed: vedānām ca kṛtam yena sthityai hasta avalambanam
jāmadagnya vapuḥ bhūtvā kārtavīryasya karmaṭham
mṛṇāla maṇḍalī lāvam dos sahasram lulāva yaḥ
yaḥ kuṭhāre sthi niṣpeṣa khaṇḍanā dantamālikām
kṣatriya kṣaya kālānām babhāra gaṇanām iva
yaḥ pūrva aṅgavatīm cāru madhya deśām payasvinīm
sa puṇḍra kānanām prādāt sa vatsām kaśyapāya gām
yaḥ bhavat bhuvana ābhoga bhūṣaṇam raghunandanaḥ
bhrāntaḥ saptasu lokeṣu sapta abdhi kṣobha saṃbhṛtaḥ
sapta tāla bhidaḥ yasya dhanvinaḥ dhanuṣa dhvaniḥ
adyā api setu saṃghaṭṭa visphuṭat śukti saṃpuṭaḥ
su vyakta muktā daśanaḥ vakti yasya ambudhiḥ yaśaḥ
kirīṭa koṭi viśrāntam yena śubhra yaśaḥ uṃśukaiḥ
unmṛṣṭam lokapālānām indrijit sainya jam rajaḥ
patita utpatitaiḥ yasya daśa āsya vadanaiḥ muhur
babhūva kanduka āmanda vinoda ānanda vibhramaḥ
bhuvaḥ bhāra avatārāya kṛṣṇaḥ vṛṣṇi kule bhavat
yad vakṣasi grāva bhidaḥ śṛṅga bhaṅga parābhavaḥ
asakti viṣama ullekhaiḥ ariṣṭasya api asūcyata
cakre yaḥ caraṇaḥ śubhraiḥ mūrdhni kāliya bhoginaḥ
nakha kānti phaṇā cakraiḥ śeṣa spardhā adhirohaṇam
mūla asthi cheda niṣpeṣa jāta jvālā jaṭā juṣā
bāṇa bāhu vane yasya cakreṇa krakacāyitam
viṣṇuyaśāḥ yaḥ ca bhaviṣyati
tasya āścarya prabhāvasya śrūyatām idam ujjvalam
caritam puṇya pīyūṣaiḥ kilbiṣa kṣālana kṣamam

original: prabhāvaṃ tasya tattvena vaktuṃ ko nu pragalbhate /
analyzed: prabhāvam tasya tattvena vaktum kaḥ nu pragalbhate
yatra vācaspatiḥ mūkaḥ dūre bhogi pateḥ giraḥ
vṛtte vṛtra vadhe pūrvam saṃgrāme tārakā maye
tridaśāḥ śaraṇam jagmuḥ viśvaksenam janārdanam

original: dattaṃ tenābhayaṃ teṣāṃ viṣame daityaje bhaye /
analyzed: dattam tena abhayam teṣām viṣame daitya je bhaye

original: saṃhatā dānavāḥ sarve viviśuḥ samarāṅganam // Bhmj_19.322 //
analyzed: saṃhatāḥ dānavāḥ sarve viviśuḥ samara aṅganam
mayaḥ māyā nidhiḥ teṣām agraṇīḥ ugra vigrahaḥ
babhau haimam samārūḍhaḥ ratham ṛkṣa sahasra gam
tāraḥ krośa adhika āyāmam āyasam ratham āsthitaḥ
yuktam svara sahasreṇa dhūma utthaḥ gniḥ iva ābabhau
hayagrīvaḥ samāruhya ratham haya sahasra gam
mattu kuñjara yuktam ca tvaṣṭā mandara gauravam
vīrāḥ virocana ādyāḥ ca tasthuḥ samara saṃmukhāḥ
kalpānta jalada byūha vipulam tad bala arṇavam
viṣṇunā vihita āśvāsāḥ vīkṣya devāḥ samādravan
airāvaṇa gataḥ teṣām sahasrākṣaḥ puras babhau
indrāyudha sahasrāṇi darśayan vajra raśmibhiḥ
tasthau lamba ambudaḥ nīla śailaḥ nirjharavān iva
rathe rarāja kailāse ratna kūṭaḥ iva udgataḥ
jahāra dhanadaḥ meroḥ sūrya ātapa juṣaḥ śriyam
himaraśmiḥ himaśilā śubhra aśvaḥ tuhināyudhaḥ
tasthau jalada vāhaḥ ca vāyuḥ āyuḥ śarīriṇām
devaḥ ca svayam abhyāyāt bhagavān kaiṭabhāntakaḥ
cakram rarāja tasya ājau dhārā bimbita dānavam
antar praviṣṭa nihata arāti vrātam iva abhitas
praśānte jvalite meruḥ iva asya bhujaga antakaḥ
babhāse bhāsvaraḥ vāhaḥ pravāhaḥ śatru tejasām

original: tasya dīptataraiḥ pakṣairbabhūva pihitaṃ nabhaḥ // Bhmj_19.335 //
analyzed: tasya dīptataraiḥ pakṣaiḥ babhūva pihitam nabhaḥ
antyaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ sūryaiḥ iva eka ghana tām gataiḥ
virarāja tad ārūḍhaḥ hariḥ kaustubha bhūṣitaḥ
vaḍavānala saṃyuktaḥ mainākaḥ iva ratna sūḥ
rudra āditya marut viśva sādhya aśvi vasu cāraṇāḥ
udyayuḥ kṣubdha sainya abdheḥ kallolāḥ iva saṃgatāḥ
atha uddhūta ambudhi dhvāna ḍajīkṛta jagattrayaḥ
rarāsa ghoṣa gambhīraḥ samara ambha dundubhiḥ

original: petuḥ parasparaṃ teṣāṃ dehe tejasvināṃ prabhāḥ // Bhmj_19.339 //
analyzed: petuḥ parasparam teṣām dehe tejasvinām prabhāḥ
pravṛtte samare hema nārāca nicayāḥ iva
sura asura kara utsṛṣṭa śastra astra nikapa utthitāḥ
jvālāḥ cakruḥ dhvaja agreṣu kṣaṇam pīta aṃśuka bhramam
ceruḥ tridaśa mātaṅga danta ullikhita kaṅkaṭāḥ
jāta dhūma analāḥ daityāḥ meghāḥ iva sa vidyutaḥ
teṣām vakṣaḥ taṭe bhugna dantāḥ te divya kuñjarāḥ
sikatā setu niḥsārān amanyanta kula acalān
tatas daitya bhuja uddhūta śastra nirvivirāḥ divi
babhūvuḥ niścalāḥ kṣipram citra nyastāḥ iva amarāḥ
iyam atyanta durvārā daitya māyā mahīyasī
yamaḥ vi niyamena iva baddhaḥ tat nidhaneṣu yat
vāyuḥ paṅguḥ iva kṣipram aprakāśaḥ iva aṃśumān

original: jayastu yudhi daityeṣu vahniḥ śīta ivābhavat /
analyzed: jayaḥ tu yudhi daityeṣu vahniḥ śītaḥ iva abhavat
tatas sahasranayanaḥ vajreṇa unmya daitya jām
māyām maya mukhān vīrān suraiḥ punar ayodhayat
vajri vajra nikṛttānām daityānām patatām bhuvi
gurubhiḥ vigrahaiḥ prāpuḥ aikyam sapta api te bdhayaḥ

original: te gajendra ivāliptā dānavā dānavāribhiḥ // Bhmj_19.348 //
analyzed: te gaja indre iva āliptāḥ dānavāḥ dānava aribhiḥ
tamobhiḥ āvṛtāḥ petuḥ sura indra ima vimohitāḥ
bahu māyaḥ tatas māyām mayaḥ samaya vartinīm
pramayāya eva devānām aurva analavatīm vyadhāt
ūru jaḥ tanayaḥ vahneḥ saṃkalpāt brahmacāriṇaḥ
lokān didhakṣuḥ kāla ātmā vārbhakṣaḥ brahmaṇaḥ varāt
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ pūrvam aurvaḥ bhaktyā vara pradaḥ
jajvāla suresanāsu tasmin samara saṃkaṭe
aurveṇa dahyamānāḥ te jvālā jaṭila vigrahāḥ
ekībhūtāni amanyanta tejāṃsi ca tamāṃsi ca
vivaśāḥ tridaśāḥ sarve tena aurva anala parvaṇā
varuṇam śītaraśmim ca trāṇam eva vyacintayan
atha akhaṇḍala nirdiṣṭaḥ candramāḥ varuṇa agra gaḥ
kṣipan hima śilā saṃghān udyayau yudhi dānavān
tuṣāra vāri pūraiḥ te bhṛśam tābhyām samāhatāḥ
niśceṣṭāḥ dānavāḥ prāpuḥ kāṣṭha pāṣāṇa tulya tām

original: himasya mahatī śaktiḥ sā kāpi dahanātmikā // Bhmj_19.356 //
analyzed: himasya mahatī śaktiḥ sā kā api dahana ātmikā
yayā dānava saṃghānām asthi bhaṅgaḥ mahān abhūt
tuṣāra aśani saṃchannā dānavānām anīkinī
nāsā niḥśvāsa vivaraiḥ nirvibhāgam asūcyata
māyā vinimayam jñātvā mayaḥ sva jana siddhaye
asṛjat pārvatīm māyām druma śastra śilā ghanām
druma śaila niruddhānām sphuṭita āyudha varmaṇām
mohaḥ jajṛmbhe devānām ṛte cakra gadā dharam
tatas kṣaṇāt tad ādiṣṭau tadanu pāṇita ojasā
samam viviśatuḥ senām daityānām agni mārutau
bhasma kūṭa āvalī śeṣān kṛtvā druma śiloccayān
uddhūtān dikṣu vikṣipya tau raṇa agre viceratuḥ
anila ullāsita jvālā jvalita śmaśru bhīṣaṇaḥ
daityānām dahyamānānām dhūmaḥ kālaḥ iva udyayau
mārutasya agni taptasya vahne tā udyatasya ca
abhūt kūta anta huṃkāra ghoraḥ kahakaha ravaḥ
vicaṭat carmaṇām iṣam śam accham iti medasām
sphuṭaḥ sthūla asthi bandhānām kaḥ pi vyatikaraḥ
jayatsu sura saṅgheṣu bhaṅge ditija maṇḍale
kālanemiḥ samuttasthau trijagat grasa lālasaḥ
jṛmbhā vispaṣṭa daṃṣṭa agraiḥ ugra vaktraiḥ bhṛta ambaraḥ
jagat kṣayāya iva rasāt ahaṃpūrvikayā utthitaiḥ
tasya añjana śilā stambha saṃbhāraiḥ bhuja maṇḍalaiḥ
abhavan kakubhaḥ bhīma bogi bhoga vṛtāḥ iva
viṭaṅka mukuṭa prāpta ghṛṣṭa brahmāṇḍa karpare
asṛjat dhūma jālena kṣaya jīmūta ḍambarān

original: śatavaktrasya netrebhyastasya jvālā diśo yayuḥ // Bhmj_19.369 //
analyzed: śatavaktrasya netrebhyaḥ tasya jvālāḥ diśaḥ yayuḥ
tad chāyayā jagat sarvam adṛśyam abhavat kṣaṇāt
aghoraiḥ kālarajanī saṅghaiḥ saṃghaṭṭitaiḥ iva
tasya viśva kṣaya ākṣepa dīkṣā samaya maṇḍalaiḥ
dīpta āyu prabhā cakraiḥ ālokaḥ kakubhām abhūt
ghaṭṭayan sarva tejāṃsi sarva bhūtāni kampayan
jahāra jalada vyūhān kopa niḥśvāsa mārutaiḥ
udymya pavana āskandha saṃghaṭṭa uddhaṭṭanam bhujam
ajīva vat sa ditijān kṣubdha abdhi dhvānayā girā
udāyudhaiḥ pramuditaiḥ dānavaiḥ tad puras saraiḥ
tatas yuyudhire devāḥ kālanemi hata ojasaḥ
tasmin samara saṃghaṭṭe tumule prāṇa hāriṇi
vyavardhata mahān kāyaḥ karālaḥ kālaneminaḥ
tad vaktra kuhara udvānta jvālā valayitāḥ surāḥ
tiryak ūrdhvam pravṛddhaiḥ ca tad bhujaiḥ abhitas hatāḥ
tad śastra vṛṣṭi dalitāḥ tad kara ākṛṣṭa maulayaḥ

original: peturbhraṣṭā vimānebhyaḥ kṣīṇapuṇyā iva kṣitau // Bhmj_19.377 //
analyzed: petuḥ bhraṣṭāḥ vimānebhyaḥ kṣīṇa puṇyāḥ iva kṣitau
bhagne vakra mukhe śakre varuṇe karuṇā āspade
dhanade nidhana āpanne śaśāṅke grāsa śaṅkite
bhagna āyudha dhvaja chattrā chinna syandana kuñjarāḥ
niśceṣṭāḥ tridaśāḥ tasthuḥ dinadīpāḥ iva aprabhāḥ
śītasya vahne kā vārtā taraṇiḥ tāra darpaṇaḥ

original: āsthā kiṃ niścale vāyau kiṃ yamena hataujasā // Bhmj_19.380 //
analyzed: āsthā kim niścale vāyau kim yamena hata ojasā

original: kimete mudritā rudrā vasavo vyasavo nu kim /
analyzed: kim ete mudritāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ vyasavaḥ nu kim
iti bruvāṇāḥ nādena nananduḥ diti nandanāḥ
tatas saṃprāpta vijayaḥ kālanemiḥ kṣata amaraḥ
lokapāla pade tasthau vibhajya anekadhā vapuḥ
jalam bhūtvā abhavat vyāpī vāyuḥ bhūtvā vavau svayam
soma sūrya tanuḥ bhūtvā rātri ahāni cakāra saḥ
jagrāha sarva loka ātmā havyam agni mukhaḥ svayam
sarva deva mayaḥ saḥ bhūt iti viṣṇu jigīṣayā
samasta bhuvana adhīśaḥ sarva deva gaṇaiḥ yutaḥ

original: vedadharmakṛpāsatyaiḥ śriyā ca na samāśritaḥ // Bhmj_19.385 //
analyzed: veda dharma kṛpā satyaiḥ śriyā ca na samāśritaḥ
sa dadarśa atha deva ādim devam garuḍa lāñchanam
upekṣita agra saṃmardam raṇa kautuka līlayā
prabhā dāma abhirāmeṇa kaustubhena vibhūṣitam
sphurat indrāyudha udāram snigdha śyāmam iva ambudam
bhujaiḥ vibhrājitam ratna keyūra dhṛti pallavaiḥ
hāra kānti sudhā siktaiḥ pārijātaiḥ iva aparaiḥ
uhyamānam suparṇena suvarṇa chavi hāriṇā
mandara uddhāra bhītena mūrtena iva sumeruṇā
daitya saṃhāra gaṇanā cihna hema aṅgadām gadām
dhārayantam giri indrāṇām gauravaiḥ iva nirmitām
aruṇaiḥ ūru yugale rala sūrya aṃśubhiḥ vṛtam
madhu kaiṭabha kaṇṭha asṛj chaṭābhiḥ iva carcitam
śaṅkha kānti vitānena ratna mālā taraṅgiṇā
kṣīrodena iva śayana āyāsa trastena sevitam
rāhu kaṇṭha aṭavī cheda procchalat śoṇita aruṇaiḥ
vyāptam cakra prabhā cakraiḥ sūrya āśubhiḥ iva ambaram
aho bata ayam asmākam śatruḥ locana gocaraḥ
nirañjana daśām yena nītāḥ daitya vadhū dṛśaḥ
ghnatā hiraṇyakaśipum su tāraiḥ nakhara aṅkuraiḥ

original: hantā hatānyanenaiva muktābhāni yaśāṃsi naḥ // Bhmj_19.395 //
analyzed: hantā hatāni anena eva mukta ābhāni yaśāṃsi naḥ
nṛsiṃha caraṇa ākrānti rajaḥ digdhām sabhā bhuvam
hatvā imam kṣālayāmi eṣa daitya harṣa aśru vāribhiḥ
iti bruvāṇam sa avajñam līlā smita sita adharaḥ
pātinā darpam adhunā smi iti abhyadhāt vibhuḥ
ghora aṭṭahāsa vikaṭaḥ dānava adhipatiḥ tatas
apātayat śastra vṛṣṭim deva urasi bhujaiḥ ghanaiḥ
akampyata suparṇaḥ pi gadayā caṇḍa vegayā
deva urasi bhujaiḥ yena niṣkampaḥ kampata kṣaṇam
vismitaḥ kopa saṃrambāt atha viṣṇuḥ vyavardhata
sa sudarśanam āsādya viṣadam bhaya dam dviṣām
paryanta tejaḥ prasaraiḥ kirat kāñcanā vālukam
cikṣepa krakaca krūram dānava ānana kānane
tat viṣṇu bhuja nirmuktam pratimānam vivasvataḥ
cakarta agni śikhā udgāram ghoram vaktra śatam dviṣaḥ
nikṛtta bhuja vaktra uttha sarat rudhira nirjharaḥ

original: na papāta ciraṃ daityo manyustabdha iva sthitaḥ // Bhmj_19.404 //
analyzed: na papāta ciram daityaḥ manyu stabdhaḥ iva sthitaḥ
pakṣa vātena tārkṣyasya kṣuṇṇa kṣmā adhara maulinā
sapta abdhayaḥ samutpetuḥ taraṅga āliṅgita ambarāḥ
sarvatas pāṇi pādena sarve sarvatra dānavāḥ
pīḍitāḥ viśvarūpeṇa prayayuḥ smṛtiśeṣa tām
tatas nivṛtte durvṛtte pravṛtte dharma karmaṇi
brahma prabhṛtibhiḥ devaiḥ stūyamānaḥ mahā ṛṣibhiḥ
sva pade śakram ādāya brahmasadma yayau hariḥ
vanditaḥ trijagat vandyaiḥ siddhaiḥ saṃvid maya ātmabhiḥ
tatas nija āśramam gatvā sva prabhā udbhāsitam vibhuḥ
bheje mbudhau
tam śeṣa śāyinam kṛṣṇam sahasra vadanam śanais
nidrā siṣeve matta ali mālā iva kamala ākaram
tasya pīta aṃśuka udāram suptasya vibabhau vapuḥ
nābhe brahma saroja uttha rajaḥ puñjaiḥ iva ācitam
kalayan akṣasūtreṇa laukikīm kāla kalmaṣām
prajāḥ śvāsa āvalī sūtraiḥ saṃjahāra utsasarja ca
tasmin prasupte vidhinā dakṣaiṇāyana kāriṇā
nidrā api nidrayā iva abhūt tamaḥ paṭala mīlitā
jṛmbā ālasya vimoha aṅkā nṛṇām jīva artha hāriṇī
adīrgha pralaye sā iyam pāvanī viṣṇu saṃgamāt

original: tato varṣasahasreṣu yāteṣu ca kṛte kate /
analyzed: tatas varṣa sahasreṣu yāteṣu ca kṛte kate

original: tretāyāṃ vinivṛttāyāṃ dvāpare tanutāṃ gate // Bhmj_19.415 //
analyzed: tretāyām vinivṛttāyām dvāpare tanu tām gate
kamalā keli kamala prānta vāta vibodhitam
pitāmaha mukhāḥ devāḥ sahasrākṣa purāḥsarāḥ
ekībhūtāḥ samabhyetya jagat kārya artham udyatāḥ
tam tuṣṭuvuḥ muni gaṇāḥ phulla padma karāḥ kṣaṇam

original: tvayi deva na jānīmaḥ kartvayaṃ suptasaṃvidā // Bhmj_19.418 //
analyzed: tvayi deva na jānīmaḥ kartu ayam supta saṃvidā
tyaja bhoga parimlānām iva nīlotpala srajam
sphāreṇa dakṣiṇena akṣṇā janma kṣetreṇa bhāsvataḥ
jaganti kamalāni iva vikāsaya jagatpate
savyena indu udaya ānanda viṣyanda amṛta varṣiṇā
bhūtāni sarva bhūta ātman kumudāni iva jīvaya
deva devāḥ pratīkṣante tvad prasāda avalokanam
vijñaptiḥ śrūyatām eṣā jagatām kārya gauravāt
śrutvā iti devarṣi vacaḥ nidrā viṣada locanaḥ
pārśve valita hāra ardha viśrānti kṛta maṇḍalaḥ
āvṛtta kaṃdharaḥ devān avadat daśana aṃśubhiḥ
kurvan vadana padmānām mṛṇālī kāṇḍa maṇḍalam
kim ayam lokapālānām mantra śaṃsī samāgamaḥ

original: api nāma na daityendraiḥ krāntāstridaśabhūmayaḥ // Bhmj_19.425 //
analyzed: api nāma na daitya indraiḥ krāntāḥ tridaśa bhūmayaḥ

original: iyaṃ vo vadanacchāyā na śaṃsati parābhavam // Bhmj_19.426 //
analyzed: iyam vaḥ vadana chāyā na śaṃsati parābhavam
ayam ca svayam āyātaḥ padmajanmā pitāmahaḥ

original: hitaṃ ca jagatāṃ kāryaṃ nālpametadbhaviṣyati // Bhmj_19.427 //
analyzed: hitam ca jagatām kāryam na alpam etat bhaviṣyati
sajjaḥ ham bhavatām arthe kartavyam adhunā ucyatām

original: iti vādini deveśe babhāṣe caturānanaḥ // Bhmj_19.428 //
analyzed: iti vādini deveśe babhāṣe caturānanaḥ
sarvam tvam eva sarvāt sañjānīṣe kāryam ātmanā

original: praśnājñāḥ kiṃtu bhavataḥ pareṇa na vilaṅghyate // Bhmj_19.429 //
analyzed: praśna ājñāḥ kiṃtu bhavataḥ pareṇa na vilaṅghyate

original: sahasraśīrṣaḥ śeṣo 'yaṃ vaktuṃ jānāti te stutim /
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣaḥ śeṣaḥ yam vaktum jānāti te stutim

original: tavaiva bhāratī devī yadi vaiṣā sarasvatī // Bhmj_19.430 //
analyzed: tava eva bhāratī devī yadi vā eṣā sarasvatī
tvad cakra krakara utkṛtta daitya ugra viṣa pādape
dharmasyati jagati asmin a bhagna praṇayaḥ rathaḥ
vivṛddhaḥ sarva bhūpālāḥ sat ācāra anuvartinaḥ
prabhūta bala saṃbhāraiḥ bhāraḥ kiṃtu mahān kṣiteḥ
sā iyam mahīyasī cintā mahīm añjana śaṅkayā
sat vṛttānām narendrāṇām kṣaye yat ayam udyamaḥ
prajāpateḥ iti vacaḥ śrutvā devaḥ prajā hitam
tathā iti uktvā yayau sārdham tridaśaiḥ amarāvatīm
tām kalpa pādapavatīm ratna mandira sundarām
praviśya bheje prodbhūta ratna stambha prabhām samabhām
candrakānta āsane tatra kṣīrārṇave iva apare
stite viṣṇau surāḥ prāpuḥ hema ratna āsanāni atha
brahma vākyāt pratīhāre vetra pāṇau samīraṇe
nivāta supta dugdha abdhi niḥśabdam abhavat sadaḥ
tatas tam sūcita abhikhyā svayam tāmarasa okasā
pāda pīṭhe puras viṣṇoḥ upaviśya ānata ānanā
nānā ratna prabhā bhaṅkena devī rohiṇa bhūbhṛtaḥ
uvāca urvī mukha ambhoja divya gandha adhivāsinī
harantī bāla vallīnām bhṛṅga bhāra kadarthanām
deva tvad caraṇa ambhoja madhya viśrānti lālitā
na kadācana jāne ham jagat bhāra pariśramam

original: lalanā kva nu nāmāhaṃ kva ceme kulabhūdharāḥ /
analyzed: lalanā kva nu nāma aham kva ca ime kula bhūdharāḥ
tat etat tvad avaṣṭambha saṃbhārasya vidṛmbhitam
majjantī salile pūrvam nalinī dala līlayā
tvayā eva ādivarāheṇa daṃṣṭra agreṇa aham uddhṛtā
jagatī ekārṇave pūrvam nirmathya madhu kaiṭabhau

original: tanmedasā ghanībhūtā tvayāhaṃ medinī kṛtā // Bhmj_19.444 //
analyzed: tad medasā ghanībhūtā tvayā aham medinī kṛtā
bhārgaveṇa kṛte kopāt asakṛt kṣattra saṃkṣaye
kālena punar udbhūtāḥ manoḥ vaṃśe nareśvarāḥ
teṣām su bhaṭa saṃghāte gaja vāji samākule
vṛddhyā nirvivarībhūte bhāreṇa asmi nipīḍitā
kriyatām tad kṣaya upāye pi avadhāna lavaḥ kṣaṇam

original: śaraṇyaṃ trideśeśānāṃ tvāmasmi śaraṇaṃ gatā // Bhmj_19.447 //
analyzed: śaraṇyam trideśa īśānām tvām asmi śaraṇam gatā
guruḥ agniḥ suvarṇasya tigmāṃśuḥ ca gavām guruḥ

original: tārakāṇāṃ guruḥ somaḥ sadā mama gururbhavān // Bhmj_19.448 //
analyzed: tārakāṇām guruḥ somaḥ sadā mama guruḥ bhavān
śrutvā iti pṛthivī vākyam viṣṇunā tiryak īkṣitaḥ
tad samīhita tattva jñaḥ devān prāha pitāmahaḥ
aṃśāvatāraḥ kriyatām bhavadbhiḥ bhūtaye bhuvaḥ

original: eṣa viṣṇuḥ kṣitau sākṣādavatāre kṛtakṣaṇaḥ // Bhmj_19.450 //
analyzed: eṣa viṣṇuḥ kṣitau sākṣāt avatāre kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
purā jalanidheḥ tīre kaśyapena saha sthitam
mām gaṅgā anugataḥ śrīmān āyayau bhūṣitaḥ ambudhiḥ
tena aham plāvitaḥ vārbhiḥ dṛptam tam avadam ruṣā
bho rājaveśa bhavat tanuḥ
sa jātaḥ śaṃtanuḥ nāma mad śāpāt vasudhādhipaḥ

original: vasūnāṃ jananī gaṅgā tamevānugatā priyā // Bhmj_19.453 //
analyzed: vasūnām jananī gaṅgā tam eva anugatā priyā
tad vaṃśe pāṇḍuḥ utpannaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca bhūmipau
dharma anila indra aśvi bhāgāḥ pāṇḍoḥ āyānti putra tām
kelaraṃśasya putraḥ stu dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sa anujaḥ

original: anyeṣu rājavaṃśeṣu bhavantu ca surāḥ pare // Bhmj_19.455 //
analyzed: anyeṣu rāja vaṃśeṣu bhavantu ca surāḥ pare
rudraḥ ca śiśirāṃśuḥ ca gandharva uraga arākṣasāḥ
teṣām parasparam ghore vaira araṇim udbhave

original: raṇānale kṣayaṃ yātu ghanaṃ kṣitipakānanam // Bhmj_19.456 //
analyzed: raṇa anale kṣayam yātu ghanam kṣitipa kānanam
tān prajāpatiḥ iti uktvā visasarja vusaṃdharām
tatas ūṃśaiḥ tad samādiṣṭāḥ tridaśāḥ kṣmām avātaran
atrā antare bhagavān nāradaḥ muniḥ
abhyāyāt tejasā kurvan diśaḥ kanaka piṅgalāḥ
nāda śaktim kuṭila tām bhuvana udara saṃkaṭe
mūrtām iva vahan vīṇām svara jñaḥ chandasām nidhiḥ
āvarjita jaṭā bandhaḥ sa viṣṇu praṇataḥ bhyadhāt
bhagavan bhuvi bhūpāla vaṃśeṣu tridaśa īśvarāḥ
avatīrṇāḥ bhavat vākyāt kitu eṣa viphalaḥ śramaḥ
asatām tāvat amarāḥ samuddhata mahā uragāḥ

original: tṛṣṇāñcane 'pi kā śaktistvāṃ vinā parameṣṭhinam // Bhmj_19.462 //
analyzed: kā śaktiḥ tvām vinā parameṣṭhinam

original: dānavā bhuvi saṃbhūtā bhavatā ye hatāḥ purā /
analyzed: dānavāḥ bhuvi saṃbhūtāḥ bhavatā ye hatāḥ purā

original: avatīrya bhavāneva teṣāṃ mūlakṣaye kṣamaḥ // Bhmj_19.463 //
analyzed: avatīrya bhavān eva teṣām mūla kṣaye kṣamaḥ
lavaṇam dānavam hatvā śatrughnaḥ rāghava anujaḥ

original: chittvā madhuvanaṃ cakre yāṃ purīṃ mathurāṃ purā // Bhmj_19.464 //
analyzed: chittvā madhuvanam cakre yām purīm mathurām purā
tasyām adya samutpannaḥ kaṃsaḥ yadu kule nṛpaḥ
yaḥ sau hataḥ tvayā pūrvam kālanemiḥ mahā asuraḥ

original: hayagrīvādayo ye ca daityāḥ pūrvaṃ harāstvayā /
analyzed: hayagrīva ādayaḥ ye ca daityāḥ pūrvam harāḥ tvayā
te keśi dhenuka ariṣṭa pralamba ādyāḥ bhuvi sthitāḥ
teṣām vadhāya bhagavan kriyatām svayam udyamaḥ
nāradena iti abhihite tathā iti ūce jagatpatiḥ
janma dhāma ucitam pṛṣṭaḥ tena brahma vadat tatas

original: śrūyatāṃ bhagavanyaste dhanyaḥ samucitaḥ pitā // Bhmj_19.468 //
analyzed: śrūyatām bhagavan yaḥ te dhanyaḥ samucitaḥ pitā

original: yajñārthe yājñiyāṃ dhenuṃ purā putrasya kaśyapaḥ /
analyzed: yajña arthe yājñiyām dhenum purā putrasya kaśyapaḥ
aditiḥ surabhiḥ ca asya vallabhe jagatīpateḥ
sa yādava kule jātaḥ vasudevaḥ mahā yaśāḥ

original: devakī rohiṇī ceti te tasya dayite ubhe // Bhmj_19.470 //
analyzed: devakī rohiṇī ca iti te tasya dayite ubhe
tasya putra tvam āsādya gopa krīḍā rasa ākulaḥ
ati adbhutāni karmaṇi darśayan jahi dānavān

original: dhanyaḥ sa jagatāṃ vandyaḥ kasya vā na spṛhāpadam /
analyzed: dhanyaḥ sa jagatām vandyaḥ kasya vā na spṛhā padam

original: yaḥ śroṣyati tavāvyaktavarṇaṃ tāteti jalpataḥ // Bhmj_19.472 //
analyzed: yaḥ śroṣyati tava avyakta varṇam tāta iti jalpataḥ
iti padmodbhava girā kṛta abhyupagame harau

original: nāradaḥ prayayau bhedī kautukenārjavena ca // Bhmj_19.473 //
analyzed: nāradaḥ prayayau bhedī kautukena ārjavena ca

original: sa mahīmetya mathurāṃ viveśa viṣadāṃ purīm // Bhmj_19.474 //
analyzed: sa mahīm etya mathurām viveśa viṣadām purīm
kautukānām kula gṛham kaḥ yam sakala saṃpadām

original: udyānaṃ kalpavallīnāṃ vīkṣya tāṃ vismito 'bhavat // Bhmj_19.475 //
analyzed: udyānam kalpa vallīnām vīkṣya tām vismitaḥ bhavat
tatra siṃhāsana āsīnām kaṃsam bhīmam mahībhujām
pratyagram tam dadarśa ugram ugrasena jam agrajaḥ
tad sabhām pūjitaḥ tena ratna siṃhāsana ujjvalām
praviśya kṣaṇam āsīnaḥ tam ūce bala garvitam
loka saṃcāriṇā kaṃsa mayā sura sabhā antare
śrutaḥ tava vadha upāye mantraḥ su cira cintitaḥ

original: pituḥ svasuste devakyā yo garbho bhavitāṣṭamaḥ /
analyzed: pituḥ svasuḥ te devakyāḥ yaḥ garbhaḥ bhavitā aṣṭamaḥ

original: sānugasya sa te mṛtyurvihitaḥ śaṅkitaiḥ suraiḥ // Bhmj_19.479 //
analyzed: sa anugasya sa te mṛtyuḥ vihitaḥ śaṅkitaiḥ suraiḥ
iti udīrya munau yāte śvasan kaṃsaḥ sabhā sthitaḥ
jahāsa kāntim śatrūṇām daṃṣṭrābhiḥ tarjayan iva
saḥ vadat sacivān antar kope pi a vikṛta ānanaḥ
asūyayā iva devānām muhur ālokayan nabhaḥ
aho nu bheda śīlena muninā mūḍha cetasā

original: nākaukasāmaviṣaye kathito mantra eṣa naḥ // Bhmj_19.482 //
analyzed: nākaukasāma viṣaye kathitaḥ mantraḥ eṣa naḥ
nitarām pratikūlaḥ ham devānām adhunā sthitaḥ
keśimukhyāḥ kṣayāya urvyām vicarantu mad āśayā
pralamba lenuka ariṣṭa pūtanā kāliya ādayaḥ
kurvanti yajvanām loke deva dveṣāt parābhavam
devakī garbha nidhane tiṣṭhantu avahitāḥ sadā

original: āptavādena nāryastu puruṣāśca hitā mama // Bhmj_19.485 //
analyzed: āpta vādena nāryaḥ tu puruṣāḥ ca hitāḥ mama
iti uktaḥ sacivān kaṃsaḥ nirvikāraḥ bhavat bahis
antar tu cintā saṃtāpam uvāha viṣa duḥsaham
tasmin avasare kṛṣṇaḥ jagat rakṣā kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
pātālam etya tān garbhān apaśyat kālanemi jān
tapasā ugreṇa te prāpuḥ purā kamala jāt varāt
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca etān aśapat brahma nindakaḥ
mām an ādṛtya yuṣmābhiḥ yasmāt ārādhitaḥ vidhiḥ

original: tasmātpūrvaṃ piturvadhyā yūyaṃ garbhānmṛtā bhuvi // Bhmj_19.489 //
analyzed: tasmāt pūrvam pituḥ vadhyāḥ yūyam garbhāt mṛtāḥ bhuvi
iti tad śāpa vivaśān salila antara niścalān
tān suptān vīkṣya bhagavān nidrām ūce svarūpiṇīm
ṣaṭsu garbheṣu devakyāḥ jīvān etān kṣipa svayam
bhaviṣyati antakaḥ tatra teṣām kaṃsaḥ sva cintayā
saptamaḥ tyājyaḥ vinimayena tu
garbhaḥ tad ante devakyāḥ bhaviṣyāmi aham aṣṭamaḥ
govraje nanda gopasya yaśodā ākhyā kuṭumbinī
mad janma sama kāla tvam tad garbhe vatara svayam
māse ṣṭame navamyām tu kṛṣṇa rātryām mṛga īkṣaṇe
vyatyāsaḥ tatra bhavitā tulye janmani atha āvayoḥ
tatas tvam kaṃsa puruṣaiḥ śilāyām āhatā bhṛśam

original: gamiṣyasi divaṃ devi divyena vapuṣānvitā // Bhmj_19.495 //
analyzed: gamiṣyasi divam devi divyena vapuṣā anvitā

original: tatra tvaṃ śakrabhaginī bhūtvā pūjyā divaukasām /
analyzed: tatra tvam śakra bhaginī bhūtvā pūjyā divaukasām

original: durgā nisumbhasumbhaghnī padaṃ vindhye kariṣyasi // Bhmj_19.496 //
analyzed: durgā nisumbha sumbha ghnī padam vindhye kariṣyasi

original: vyaktāvyaktā parā śaktiḥ kālarātrirjayā dhṛtiḥ // Bhmj_19.497 //
analyzed: vyaktā avyaktā parā śaktiḥ kālarātriḥ jayā dhṛtiḥ
hrīḥ śrīḥ māyā matiḥ puṣṭiḥ devānām adhidevatā

original: jananī vyāpinī kālī pārvatī dharaṇī prabhā // Bhmj_19.498 //

analyzed: sarva kṣaya karī ghorā śivā pīyūṣa varṣiṇī

original: navamī saṃnidhiḥ siddhidāyinī tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi // Bhmj_19.499 //
analyzed: navamī saṃnidhiḥ siddhi dāyinī tvam bhaviṣyasi
iti ādiśya hariḥ nidrām unnidra amburuha īkṣaṇaḥ

original: tatkāryaṃ manasā dhyātvā svadhāma bhagavānyayau // Bhmj_19.500 //
analyzed: tat kāryam manasā dhyātvā sva dhāma bhagavān yayau

original: atha garbheṣu devakyāḥ ṣaṭsu kaṃsasya śāsanāt /
analyzed: atha garbheṣu devakyāḥ ṣaṭsu kaṃsasya śāsanāt

original: hateṣu teṣu kramaśaḥ kiṃkaraiḥ krūrakāribhiḥ // Bhmj_19.501 //
analyzed: hateṣu teṣu kramaśas kiṃkaraiḥ krūra kāribhiḥ
saptame pi samākṛṣya nīte saṃkarṣaṇa abhidhe
vintasta rohiṇī garbha gehe sva jananī dhiyā
aṣṭamam jagatām nātham garbham ādatta devakī
yena prabhāta velā iva sā abhūt āsanna bhāskarā
tatas pūrṇe ṣṭame māsi rātri ardhe bhijitā yute
asūta devakī viṣṇum hutāśanam iva araṇiḥ
tasmin eva kṣaṇe kanyām yaśodā viṣada dyutim
ajījanat prasanneṣu lokeṣu acyuta janmanā
kampite bhuvane deva gaṇe maṅgala bhāṣiṇi

original: puṣpavarṣaiḥ prakāśāsu dikṣu kīrtyā hareriva // Bhmj_19.506 //
analyzed: puṣpa varṣaiḥ prakāśāsu dikṣu kīrtyā hareḥ iva
nidrayā mohite rakṣi jane tad prerita āśayaḥ
vasudevaḥ rahaḥ cakre garbhayoḥ vyatyayam svayam
nanda gopa gṛhe putram vinyasya ādāya tad sutām
devakī garbha śayane tatyāja bhaya śaṅkitaḥ
tatas prabuddhaiḥ kanyā iyam jātā iti adbhuta vādibhiḥ
kaṃsāya darśitā garbha salila ārdrā eva rakṣibhiḥ
tad śāsanāt āhata atha sā taiḥ pṛthu śilā tale
dīpta āyudhā aneka bhujā śikhā iva agneḥ svam āviśat
hāra nakṣatra mālā aṅkā śaśāṅka rucira ānanā
bhūta saṃmoha jananī rajanī iva sa vigrahā
haṃsa ratna prabhā dīpta kuṇḍalābhyām virājitā
dyauḥ iva asta udaya āsakta śaśi mārta aṇḍa maṇḍalā
mayūra barha ābharaṇā māyūra dhvaja bhūṣitā
śyāmā sa śakracāpā iva prāvṛṣ pīna payodharā
mukuṭena tri śṛṅgeṇa nānā ratna aṭṭahāsinā
vibhūṣita kaca ābandhā rohiṇa adrivatī iva bhūḥ
sā bhūta saṃgha anugatā hasantī sa khanam muhur

original: dārayantī tamaḥ kaṃsaṃ tarjayantī samabhyadhāt // Bhmj_19.515 //
analyzed: dārayantī tamaḥ kaṃsam tarjayantī samabhyadhāt
kaṃsa kaṃsa anta kāle haṃ kṛṣyamāṇasya vairiṇā

original: vidārya jīvitaṃ dehe pāsyāmi tava śauṇitam // Bhmj_19.516 //
analyzed: vidārya jīvitam dehe pāsyāmi tava śauṇitam
iti uktvā abhimatam deśam yayau kātyāyanī divaḥ
cakampe viphala udyoga lajjitaḥ ca ugrasena jaḥ

original: sa gatvā devakīṃ mūrdhnā praṇipatya prasādya ca /
analyzed: sa gatvā devakīm mūrdhnā praṇipatya prasādya ca

original: garbhāḥ kālena te mātaḥ kṣapitā ityabhāṣata // Bhmj_19.518 //
analyzed: garbhāḥ kālena te mātar kṣapitāḥ iti abhāṣata
śaṅkitaḥ vasudevaḥ tu rohiṇī sutam atyajat
nanda gopa gṛheṣu eva śītāṃśu subhaga dyutim
nyāsīkṛtya yaśodāyām jyeṣṭham saṃkarṣaṇam śiśum
gūḍhe ca kṛṣṇa vṛttānte tad cintā nirataḥ bhavat
preritaḥ nanda gopaḥ tu tena putra hita eṣiṇā
tyaktvā vṛndāvanam ghoram daitya kaṇṭaka pannagaiḥ
govardhana vana upānte yamunā snigdha pādape
vīta vighne vrajam cakre bahubhiḥ gokulaiḥ vṛtaḥ
gambhīra mantha nirghoṣa ghana ānandita cātake
pāka āvarti ghṛta āmoda saṃpūrita samīraṇe
vana prāpya praticchanna vatsa huṃkāra go gaṇe
kālindī tīra vānīra latā dolāyita arbhake
bhrātrā saha indu śubhreṇa kṛṣṇaḥ marakata dyutiḥ

original: vyavardhata vanodbhedaḥ sa gāṅga iva yāmunaḥ /
analyzed: vyavardhata vana udbhedaḥ sa gāṅgaḥ iva yāmunaḥ
prasuptam śakaṭasya adhas tṛpte stanyena niścalam
kadācid tam samutsṛjya yaśodā yamunām yayau

original: prabuddhaḥ so 'tha śanakaiḥ pāṇipādaṃ kṣipanmuhuḥ // Bhmj_19.527 //
analyzed: prabuddhaḥ saḥ tha śanakais pāṇi pādam kṣipan muhur
ruroda daśana uddyotaiḥ kṣīrapūraiḥ iva aṅkitaḥ
caraṇau ca prasārya ūrdhvam jṛmbhā vikasita ānanaḥ
pādena ekena śakaṭam viparyastam adhas vyadhāt
atrā antare sambhyetya yaśodā prasnuta stanī
śakaṭam bhagnam ālokya cakampe suta vatsalā

original: sā śiśuṃ svasthamādāyetyūce nando viśaṅkitaḥ // Bhmj_19.530 //
analyzed: sā śiśum svastham ādāya iti ūce nandaḥ viśaṅkitaḥ
kena idam śakaṭam bhagnam vinā matta vṛṣa āhatīḥ

original: teneti pṛṣṭāḥ śiśavaḥ kṛṣṇeneti babhāṣire // Bhmj_19.531 //
analyzed: tena iti pṛṣṭāḥ śiśavaḥ kṛṣṇena iti babhāṣire
śakaṭa bhaṅgaḥ

original: tataḥ kṛṣṇotsave loke supte niśi niśācarī /
analyzed: tatas kṛṣṇa utsave loke supte niśi niśācarī

original: āyayau pūtanā nāma māyayā prasnutastanī // Bhmj_19.532 //
analyzed: āyayau pūtanā nāma māyayā prasnuta stanī
sā vadane tasya śiśoḥ nidhana kāṅkṣiṇī

original: stanaṃ prāṇaiḥ sahāsyāśca tamākṛṣyoccakarta saḥ // Bhmj_19.533 //
analyzed: stanam prāṇaiḥ saha āsyāḥ ca tam ākṛṣya uccakarta saḥ
hatāyām vyāghra ghoṣāyām tasyām abhyutthitaḥ bhayāt
sa bhāryaḥ bhūt magna unmagnaḥ iva ambudhau
tatas vidita vṛttāntau vismaya ānanda nirbharau

original: tau dampatī bahiḥ kaṃsabhayānno kaṃsabhayānno kiṃcidūcatuḥ // Bhmj_19.535 //
analyzed: tau dampatī bahis kaṃsa bhayāt no kaṃsa bhayāt no kiṃcid ūcatuḥ
śanakais caraṇa nyāsam akrūraiḥ sagatāgataiḥ
harṣam vavarṣa bandhūnām trailokya ākramaṇa kṣamaḥ
kālena vardhamānau tau kṛṣṇa saṃkarṣaṇau vane
pūryamāṇau madena iva pañcānana kiśorakau
virejatuḥ śiśu krīḍāyām subhūṣita vigrahau
rakṣyamāṇau iva āliṅgya bhuvaḥ bhāra kṣaya kṣamau
kāntau kamala pattra akṣau calat kuṭila kuntalau
smitena cakratuḥ kaṇṭhe sita muktā āvalīḥ iva
tulya lāvaṇya mādhurya dhuryam vapuḥ abhūt tayoḥ
mahatām saṃśraye nūnam eka kārya virodhine
svecchā gopatanau tatra deve trailokya goptari
spṛhā tad saṅga dhanyebhyaḥ gopebhyaḥ būt divaukasām

original: dhartuṃ yadā yaśodā taṃ na śaśāka mahājavam /
analyzed: dhartum yadā yaśodā tam na śaśāka mahā javam

original: ābabandhodare dhīrā dāmnā dāmodaraṃ tadā // Bhmj_19.542 //
analyzed: ābabandha udare dhīrā dāmnā dāmodaram tadā
tarasā sa samākṛṣya dāma baddham ulūkhalam
vicacāra vane keli caturaḥ vigata śramaḥ
vismayam prayayuḥ gopāḥ tasya ulūkhala karṣaṇāt
mandara ādhāra dhairye jagat yasmin na vismitam
vipulau yamunā tīre saṃhātau arjuna drumau
sa prāpya tad madhya gataḥ cakarṣa ulūkhalam balāt
tad bala unmūlitau vegāt petatuḥ atha tau drumau
yena abhūt kṣobha gambhīraḥ saṃrambhaḥ yamunā ambhasaḥ
gopa bālāḥ tat ālokya bhayasmaya tayā ākulāḥ
yaśodām ūcire gatvā saṃbhrama ākulita svarāḥ
ayi pramāda śīle tvam sukha suptena mohitā

original: pūjyau tau tava putrasya patitāvupari drumau // Bhmj_19.548 //
analyzed: pūjyau tau tava putrasya patitau upari drumau
devāt mahā bhayāt muktam gatvā tam paśya dārakam

original: śrutveti svedamagneva yaśodā kampitā yayau // Bhmj_19.549 //
analyzed: śrutvā iti sveda magnā iva yaśodā kampitā yayau
sā vilokya tayoḥ madhye mahā pādapayoḥ sutam

original: saṃtrāsaṃ ca prasādaṃ ca vismayaṃ ca yayau kramāt // Bhmj_19.550 //
analyzed: saṃtrāsam ca prasādam ca vismayam ca yayau kramāt
tatas sarve samabhyetya gopa vṛddhāḥ sa saṃbhramam
avadan kena ghoṣasya daivatau
pātitau imau
na abhavat megha nirghātaḥ vyabhre kā vidyutām kathā

original: neha matto dvipaḥ kasmādakasmāddrumayoḥ kṣayaḥ // Bhmj_19.552 //
analyzed: na iha mattaḥ dvipaḥ kasmāt akasmāt drumayoḥ kṣayaḥ
iti vādini gopāla maṇḍale sutam agrahīt
vimucya nandaḥ sa asūyam yaśodām avalokayan
nindati sva vadhūm yāte nanda gope saha anuge
gṛhe gṛhe druma bhaṅga kathā smayaḥ
druma nipātaḥ
kiṃcid unmukta bālyau tau atha saṃkarṣaṇa acyutau
nīla pīta ambarau kākapakṣa aṅkau ceratuḥ vane
uttaṃsa kusuma āpīḍaiḥ phala vibhrama kāriṇau
rakṣā tilaka ratna agrau iva nāga kumārakau
mayūra pakṣa ābharaṇa prabhā pallava śālinau
lāvaṇya amṛta nisyandau pārijāta ātmajau iva
hrasva veṇu kala kvāṇa svabhāva madhura svanau
prāṃśu śaila śilā āsīnau iva kinnara dārakau
utpatat kanduka udāra gulikā catura bhramau
vicitra mālya lalitau vidyādhara sutau iva
pāṇau dadhānau bāṇa aṅka keli kodaṇḍaṇḍikām
punar vanam iva āyātau vīrau rāghava lakṣmaṇau
viharantau mada udārau tau rājīva vilocanau
rejatuḥ kiṃcid āsanna nava yauvana vibhrāmau
cira bhoga parimlāna virala oṣadhi pādape
na araṃsta keśavaḥ tatra nava kānana kautukī
sa kṛtvā vraja saṃtrāsam gūḍham māyā mayaiḥ vṛkaiḥ
rantum vṛndāvana upāntam kālindī sundaram yayau
niviṣṭe gokule tatra nirbhaye sevya saṃśraye
nava kānana saṃbhogaḥ kaḥ pi gopa kule
adṛśyata tatas śyāmā nava udgata payodharā
vadhūḥ navā iva kṛṣṇasya prāvṛṣ vihita kautukā
nava vāridharaiḥ vyomni calat kalabha vibhramaiḥ
jayinaḥ smararājasya vījayan vyajanaiḥ iva
tatas virahiṇī cintā niḥśvāsa prasabhaḥ nilaḥ
bhuvi kāntā smita sitāḥ babhuḥ ketaka sūcayaḥ
megha āmarda viśīrṇasya śiśirāṃśoḥ kalāḥ iva
balākā valayāḥ ceruḥ guru garjaratāḥ divi
matta megha gaja indrāṇām danta kānti cayāḥ iva
ghanānām śakra cāpena vanānām śikhi tāṇḍavaiḥ
paraspara prabhā puñja spardhā iva samajāyata
varṣā kṣālita sat chāya tamāla kadalī bharāḥ
snigdha snātā iva yuvatiḥ virarāja vasuṃdharā
tu aṅgat turaṅga bhrū bhaṅgā phena kūṭa āhva aṭṭahāsinī
mattā iva yauvanavatī babhrāma yamunā vane
babhau saudāminī dāma kāntiḥ kā api payomucām
meru śekhara lagnā iva tapta jāmbūnada chaṭā
nīla abhra cakitāḥ kvāpi rājahaṃsa gaṇāḥ yayuḥ
ciram naṣṭam iva anveṣṭum śaśāṅkam kumuda ākarāḥ
tasmin kadamba kuṭaja āmoda pramuda nirbhare

original: kāle virahiṇāṃ kāle kṛṣṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇo 'bravīt // Bhmj_19.575 //
analyzed: kāle virahiṇām kāle kṛṣṇam saṃkarṣaṇaḥ bravīt
pūritam parisarpadbhiḥ balākā phena hāsibhiḥ

original: paśya kṛṣṇa ghanairvyoma yāmunairiva vāribhiḥ // Bhmj_19.576 //
analyzed: paśya kṛṣṇa ghanaiḥ vyoma yāmunaiḥ iva vāribhiḥ
taḍit pīta ambara juṣām vanamālā avalambinām

original: vibhāti vārivāhānāṃ taveva śyāmalaṃ vapuḥ // Bhmj_19.577 //
analyzed: vibhāti vārivāhānām tava iva śyāmalam vapuḥ
iti agraja vacaḥ śrutvā praṇaya ābharaṇam hariḥ
lalāsa līlā ābharaṇaḥ madhūra ābharaṇe vane
varṣa cheda prakāśe navībhūte iva akhile
kadācid viharan kṛṣṇaḥ kānane bhrātaram vinā
nyagrodham prāpa vipulam vṛtaḥ gopa kumārakaiḥ
pravṛddha bhuja saṃbhāraiḥ nabhaḥ mātum iva udgatam
vidyādhara sanādhāni tridaśa adhyuṣitāni ca
kula adri śikharāṇi iva kautukāt draṣṭum utthitam
sarva āśā pūraṇa udāra sacchāyam bhūṣaṇam bhuvaḥ

original: prāsādaṃ vandevīnāṃ bhāṇḍīraṃ nāma pādapam // Bhmj_19.582 //
analyzed: prāsādam vandevīnām bhāṇḍīram nāma pādapam
tam dṛṣṭvā snigdham ānanda bandhum śauriḥ nirantaram
hṛṣṭaḥ cacāra tad mūle gīta vādya vinoda kṛt
tatas dadarśa kālindīm jagat dvipa mada chaṭām
tu aṅgat taraṅga kuṭilām dīrgha veṇīm iva avaneḥ
phena budbuda nakṣatra mālām puṇya jana ucitām
yātām tāpiccha sat cāyām dravatām iva śarvarīm
visphāra śaphara utphāla sphurat sphīta phaṇa aṅkitām
senām iva bhujaṅgānām taraṅga ābhoga bhaṅgurām
unnidra padma vadanām vikaca utpala locanām
cakravāka kuca ābhogām śyāmām haṃsa sita smitām
caṇḍa aṃśu tāpa vigalat maṇi parvata kandarām
saṃpravṛttām iva āvarta sphūrjat marakata dravām
kvacid suptām iva aspandām kvacid mattām iva uddhatām
mūrchitām viṣa vegena kvacid daṣṭām iva ahinā
kvacid bhītām iva channām kvacid vyāgram iva ākulām
amanda vibhrama ālolām kvacid mānavatīm iva
majjat gopa aṅganā tuṅga kuca kumbha unnata udakām

original: nananda kṛṣṇastāṃ dṛṣṭvā taruṇīmiva hāriṇīm // Bhmj_19.591 //
analyzed: nananda kṛṣṇaḥ tām dṛṣṭvā taruṇīm iva hāriṇīm
tatas dadarśa pātāla tala gambhīra bhīṣaṇam
karāla kāla bhrū bhaṅga bhaṅgura ūrmi śata ākulam
tamaḥ malinam ati ugram akāraṇa bhaya pradam
dūrāt parihṛtam sarvaiḥ khalam naram iva īśvaram
adyā api na jagat grastam mayā iti jvalita āśayam
dhūma udgamāyitaiḥ toyaiḥ niḥśvasantam iva aniśam
vyāptam āśīrviṣaiḥ ghoraiḥ tīra koṭara śāyibhiḥ
vīta candra arka nakṣatram svam iva ātaṅka dam hradam
dūra akṣobhyam kṣaṇam hariḥ acintayat

original: asminsa kāliyo nāma kālakūṭotkaṭaḥ phaṇī // Bhmj_19.596 //
analyzed: asmin sa kāliyaḥ nāma kālakūṭa utkaṭaḥ phaṇī
sarva prāṇi bhayaṃkaraḥ
yena iyam viṣa niḥśvāsaiḥ dūṣitā yamunā taṭī
saḥ yam ti darpeṇa mattaḥ nāśam iha arhati

original: saṃbhavo 'yaṃ mama prāyo vināśāya durātmanām // Bhmj_19.598 //
analyzed: saṃbhavaḥ yam mama prāyas vināśāya durātmanām
vicintya iti hrada upāntā kadamba taru putrakam
baddha kakṣyaḥ samāruhya papāta nabhasaḥ mbhasi
garjatā kṛṣṇa meghena sā vegam avapātinā
udyayau kṣobhitām vāri vikarāla ūrmi śekharam
dūra utpatita śaila ābha kallola vinipāta jaḥ
tat abhūt hora saṃghaṭṭa ṭāṅkāraḥ ghaṭṭita ambaraḥ
tatas sa dahana udgāra viṣa phūlkāra bhīṣaṇaḥ
pañca āsyaḥ rakta nayanaḥ kāliyaḥ samadṛśyata
añjana acala tulyena tasya bhogena sarvatas

original: vardhamānena saṃruddhaṃ jalaṃ vyoma vyagāhata // Bhmj_19.603 //
analyzed: vardhamānena saṃruddham jalam vyoma vyagāhata
tad kopa jvalana jvālā valaye kṣipram ambhasām
apara aurva anala bhrānti janakaḥ
danta niṣpeṣa jāḥ tasya viṣa anala paramparāḥ
bhasmasāt sahasā tīra taru mālām pracakrire
bhogena āveṣṭyamānaḥ tha kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇena bhoginā

original: babhau valayito vārbhistamāla iva yāmunaiḥ // Bhmj_19.606 //
analyzed: babhau valayitaḥ vārbhiḥ tamālaḥ iva yāmunaiḥ
sa anugena uraga indreṇa govindam gopa dārakāḥ
daṃṣṭrā koṭi viṣa ulkabhiḥ vyāptam vīkṣya samantataḥ
saṃtrastāḥ vrajam abhyetya cakranduḥ srasta kandukāḥ

original: eṣa dāmodaro ghore patitaḥ kāliyāmbhasi // Bhmj_19.608 //
analyzed: eṣa dāmodaraḥ ghore patitaḥ kāliya ambhasi
veṣṭitaḥ kāla kalpena bhoginā atha viṣet kaṭam

original: vacaḥ śrutvā yayuḥ sarve nandagopamukhā hradam // Bhmj_19.609 //
analyzed: vacaḥ śrutvā yayuḥ sarve nanda gopa mukhāḥ hradam
pratyagra āyāsa niḥspande saṃdeha ādolita āśaye
nanda gope phaṇi vyāpta putra vaktra avalokini
tāra pralāpa mukhare yaśodā duḥsva dārite
strī jane tīva saṃtapte rāga viṣaiḥ iva
tīram saṃkarṣaṇena etya saṃjñayā eva vibodhitaḥ
bhujābhyām bhīṣaṇa ābhogam bhogam āsphālya bhoginaḥ
caraṇābhyām samākramya hariḥ bandhāt vinirgataḥ
avanāmya phaṇā cakram sa ratnam jvalana ulbaṇam
āruroha śiraḥ sphāram madhyamam madhusūdanaḥ
tatas sa sarva jagatām carācara guruḥ guruḥ
unmamarda padanyāsaiḥ nṛtyan iva sa vibhramam
srasta darpaḥ galat dhairyaḥ prodvānta ugra viṣaḥ tatas
sa kṛṣṇam rudhira udgāra galita akṣaram abhyadhāt
bhītaḥ saṃrakṣaṇīyaḥ ham nasraḥ sarva ātmanā tvayā
añjali vyañjanam dainyam jīva puṇyam idam mama
dāmodaraḥ niśamya etat jagāda bhujaga adhipam
hradaḥ yama śiva ācāra sevyaḥ astu bhavatā vinā
tatas tvam ambudhim gaccha yadi vāñchasi jīvitam

original: tatra matpādamudrā te tārkṣyarakṣā bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_19.618 //
analyzed: tatra mad pāda mudrā te tārkṣya rakṣā bhaviṣyati
iti tad śāsanāt yāte sa anuge bhujage kṣaṇāt

original: yayuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praśaṃsanto gopāḥ sānandavismayāḥ // Bhmj_19.619 //
analyzed: yayuḥ kṛṣṇam praśaṃsantaḥ gopāḥ sa ānanda vismayāḥ
tatas viviśatuḥ keli kalau haladhara acyutau
viśāla tāla hintāla tamāla śyāmalam vanam
ceratuḥ tatra tau ḍimba krīḍā āḍambara tatparau
athā āyayau dhenuka ākhyaḥ daityaḥ tāla vana āśrayaḥ
tasya anugaiḥ mahā kāyaiḥ gardabhaiḥ abhitas vṛtam
udabhūt tāla gahanam vyāptam dhūma udgataiḥ iva
bhṛśam kopāt rudhira aruṇa locanaḥ
svuraiḥ nirdārayan bhūmim rāma kṛṣṇa vadha īpsayā
āhvānam iva daityānām kurvan pātāla vāsinām
ghaṭṭayan iva heṣābhiḥ vajra ugra daśana āyudhaḥ
abhyadhāvat samudbhrānta pucchaḥ saṃkarṣaṇam javāt
vāta avadhūta eka śikhaḥ candram meghaḥ iva ākulaḥ
daśanaiḥ saḥ tha rauhiṇeyam asaṃbhramam
babhūva paścima mukhaḥ prahārāya parāṅmukhaḥ
tābhyām eva samādāya tam khurābhyām prahāriṇam
cikṣepa tāla śikhare phala arthī iva halāyudhaḥ
sa bhagna ūru taru skandha sruṭyat kaṭhina kīkasaḥ
papāta niṣla ārambhaḥ saha tāla phalaiḥ bhuvi
sa anuge hate tasmin hate khara parākrame
vīta vighnam abhūt sevyam tat tāla vanam āyatam
dhenuka vadhaḥ
bhūyas bhāṇḍīra vipinam tau gatvā keli śālinau
dvandva upatana līlābhiḥ gopa putraiḥ vijahratuḥ
atha tau āyayau vanya kusuma uttaṃsa bhūṣaṇaḥ
gopa veṣa chala cannaḥ pralambaḥ nāma dānavaḥ
krīḍābhiḥ āśaya grāhī toṣayitvā sa tau muhur
jahāra skandham ārūḍham kadācid keśava agrajam
sa tam hṛtvā dru tatiḥ nija rūpam adarśayat
tamaḥ paṭa āvṛtāḥ yena bhītyā iva kakubhaḥ bhavan
tasya añjana adri śikhara ākāre mūrdhni parisphuran
dāva anala śikhā puñja piṅgaḥ cūḍāmaṇiḥ babhau
tasya ābabhau mukha udgīrṇā sa dhūma dahana āvalī
nīla pītā patākā iva daṃṣṭrā toraṇa lambinī
nīlaśaila śilā kūṭa vikaṭe rohiṇīsutaḥ
babhāra dānava skandhe śarad ambhoda vibhramam
sa tena āśu mānuṣam bhāvam āśritaḥ
saṃmitam keśavena ārāt purāṇam smāritaḥ vapuḥ
yat tat parataram dhāma vāgīśam viśvatomukham
sarva deva mayam satyam anantam ajam avyayam
nijam vipulām āsthāya balam bhūmi dhṛti kṣamam

original: jaghāna muṣṭinā mūrdhni pralambaṃ dhenukāntakaḥ // Bhmj_19.640 //
analyzed: jaghāna muṣṭinā mūrdhni pralambam dhenu kāntakaḥ
muṣṭi pātāt vighaṭita sphuṭat lālāṭa karparam

original: kāye viveśa daityasya kīrmaraktacchaṭaṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_19.641 //
analyzed: kāye viveśa daityasya kīrma rakta chaṭam śiraḥ
skandhāt avasrute rāme giri sphāram kalevaram
nipapāta pralambasya lambamāna bhuja dvayam
balinā baladevena pralambe vinipātite
prayāte vārṣike tatra śanais māsa catuṣṭaye
pratyāsanne nava autsukya nirbhara ānanda dāyini
kratu utsave samārambhaḥ babhūva vana vāsinām
tatas saptacchada āmoda mālinī haṃsa nūpurā
viṣada indu mukhī phulla nīlotpala vilocanā
nimantritā iva pramadā tasmin vraja mahā utsave
adṛśyata sita ambhoda bhakti smera ambarā śarad

original: tatra gopagirā jñātvā yāgaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ marutpateḥ /
