analyzed: tatra gopa girā jñātvā yāgam kṛṣṇam marutpateḥ
ūce smita sita ālokaiḥ pāñcajanyam iva a sṛjan

original: aho nu hāsyajananī mugdheyaṃ bhavatāṃ matiḥ /
analyzed: aho nu hāsya jananī mugdha iyam bhavatām matiḥ

original: yāgaḥ śakrāya nārhe 'yaṃ gopā hi giridaivatāḥ // Bhmj_19.648 //
analyzed: yāgaḥ śakrāya na arhe yam gopāḥ hi giri daivatāḥ
iti tad vacasā gopaiḥ giri yajñe pravartate
vihitāḥ bhakṣya girayaḥ ghṛta kṣīra uru nirjharāḥ
govardhana gireḥ yajñe tasmin bahu anna saṃbhṛte
pāyasaiḥ sa dadhi channaiḥ hima channā iva bhūḥ abhūt
mayūra pattra ābharaṇāḥ kusama uttaṃsa śekharāḥ
tasmin yāge babhuḥ gopāḥ gāvaḥ ca su vibhūṣitāḥ
giri mūrdhani viśvātmā pareṇa giri varṣmaṇā
vapuṣā bubhuje kṛṣṇaḥ tat sarvam taiḥ niveditam
tad praharṣa smita udāram nijam divyam mahat vapuḥ

original: praṇanāma svayaṃ kṛṣṇo gopaiḥ saha giriprabham // Bhmj_19.653 //
analyzed: praṇanāma svayam kṛṣṇaḥ gopaiḥ saha giri prabham
giri yajñaḥ
vṛtte mahā utsave tasmin śatamanyuḥ krudhā jvalan
ādideśa vraja ucchittyai ghorān saṃvartaka ambudān
tena te preritāḥ kṣipram nīla śaila śilā ghanāḥ
ghanāḥ cakruḥ jagat vyāptam kālarātri śataiḥ iva
bhinnāñjana ghana chāyaiḥ jīmūtaiḥ garjita ūrjitaiḥ

original: grastā ivoddhataiḥ kṣipraṃ nādṛśyanta diśo daśa // Bhmj_19.656 //
analyzed: grastāḥ iva uddhataiḥ kṣipram na adṛśyanta diśaḥ daśa
tatas kari kara ākārāḥ stambha saṃrambha vibhramāḥ

original: peturdharādhare dhārāḥ parihārā dhṛteḥ param // Bhmj_19.657 //
analyzed: petuḥ dharādhare dhārāḥ parihārāḥ dhṛteḥ param
kāla aṭṭahāsa vikaṭāḥ jala udgārāḥ prapātinaḥ
virejuḥ kāla meghānām girīṇām iva nirjharāḥ
saḥ bhavat bhīṣaṇa ābhoga megha saṃghāta nirmitaḥ
ullasat sthūla kallola lolaḥ salila viplavaḥ
vidyut piśaṅga keśānām garjatām megha rakṣasām

original: bhayeneva yayau kvāpī jagatī jalasaṃstutā // Bhmj_19.660 //
analyzed: bhayena iva yayau kvāpī jagatī jala saṃstutā
te śakra adhiṣṭitāḥ ghorāḥ dīptā śakra āyudha aṅkitāḥ
varṣa aśani nipātena cakrire kadanam gavām
vartma vinyasta netrāṇām patantīnām itas tatas
trāsa śīta parītānām ghoraḥ tasām abhūt kṣayaḥ
ayam sa pralaya ārambhaḥ puṣkarāvarta bhīṣaṇaḥ
saṃprāptaḥ iti bhītānām gopānām abhavat bhavaḥ
tat dṛṣṭvā vaiśasam ghoram nāśāya upasthitam gavām

original: govindo jagatāṃ goptā rakṣāṃ kṣaṇamacintayat // Bhmj_19.664 //
analyzed: govindaḥ jagatām goptā rakṣām kṣaṇam acintayat
imam utpāṭya śaila indra maham govardhanam balāt
chattrīkaromi upastānām saṃśrayam vipulam gavām

original: iti dhyātvā dhiyaṃ dhīro nidadhe bhūdhare dṛśam /
analyzed: iti dhyātvā dhiyam dhīraḥ nidadhe bhūdhare dṛśam
utpāṭana kṣaṇa kṣāntyai phulla padma āvalīm iva
tatas sapadi viśvātmā balena mahatā anvitaḥ
ujjahāra girim dorbhyām sphuṭat mūla śikhā talam
mūla avalambinaḥ kṣipram pātālam iva nirgatāḥ

original: uddhṛtasya gireḥ sarpāḥ snāyujālatulāṃ yayuḥ // Bhmj_19.668 //
analyzed: uddhṛtasya gireḥ sarpāḥ snāyu jāla tulām yayuḥ
saṃpīḍita śilā pīḍā nibaḍikṛta nirjharaiḥ
babhuḥ palita kallola dukūla valitāḥ diśaḥ
haritāla rajaḥ puñjaiḥ pavana āvarta nartitaiḥ
babhau tad pātitaiḥ vyāptaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pīta aṃśukaiḥ iva
vyādhūtāḥ tasya pārśveṣu kṣaṇam utpatataḥ ghanāḥ
kṣmābhṛtaḥ pakṣa vikṣepa bhrāntim cakruḥ sva cāriṇām
tasmin govinda dos daṇḍa chattrībhūte mahībhṛti
phulla mālā āvalī srastā cakre sragdāma vibhramam
sva cāriṇaḥ dya su cirāt ime te girayaḥ vayam
jātāḥ vajradhara kṣmābhṛt pakṣa cheda madam tyaja
iti trāsa utpatantīnām vidyādhara mṛgī dṛśām
raśanā nūpura ārāvaiḥ sa jagāda iva bhūdharaḥ
paryasta prasara stobha kṣubhyat kesari garjitaiḥ
sa ghora ghana saṃghātān atarjayat iva ūrjitān
sa samunmūlana āyāsa saṃbhrānta dvipa yūthapaiḥ
babhau khe śekhara ullekha pātitaiḥ iva vāridaiḥ
ghūrṇamāna mahā śākhi kusuma utkara reṇubhiḥ

original: sa rakṣāmaṇḍalānīva dhenūnāṃ vidadhe muhuḥ // Bhmj_19.677 //
analyzed: sa rakṣā maṇḍalāni iva dhenūnām vidadhe muhur
trāsa apatat siddha vadhū tāra hāraiḥ taraṅgibhiḥ
adhas sthān gagana sthaḥ driḥ jahāsa iva mahīdharān

original: taṃ dṛṣṭvā khecarāḥ prāhuḥ kimayaṃ girirutthitaḥ /
analyzed: tam dṛṣṭvā khecarāḥ prāhuḥ kim ayam giriḥ utthitaḥ

original: yadi na pralayārambho yadi nākālaviplavaḥ // Bhmj_19.679 //
analyzed: yadi na pralaya ārambhaḥ yadi na akāla viplavaḥ
tatas kṛṣṇa girā gopāḥ śaila utpāṭana bhūgṛham

original: vipulaṃ viviśuḥ śāntyai nikhilaiḥ saha godhanaiḥ // Bhmj_19.680 //
analyzed: vipulam viviśuḥ śāntyai nikhilaiḥ saha go dhanaiḥ
nivāte nirjale tasmin su viśāle gireḥ taṭe
tasthuḥ jagān nivāsena gāvaḥ gopāḥ ca rabhitāḥ
vṛṣṭi channe prayāte saptarātre marutpatiḥ
jagāma viphala udyoga lajjitaḥ jaladaiḥ saha
tatas tam vipula ābhoga tuṅga śṛṅgam gurum girim
nyaveśayat nija pade līlayā eva jagadguruḥ
govardhana uddharaṇam
sapta rātram dhṛte tasmin girau garuḍa lakṣmaṇāḥ
tam draṣṭum āyayau sākṣāt sahasrākṣaḥ ti vismitaḥ
jaṅgamāt iva kailāsāt saḥ vatīrya suradvipāt
govardhana śilā āsīnam dadarśa madhusūdanam
antarhitena tārkṣyeṇa pakṣaiḥ ācchādita ātapam
asatya a kalitena eva tejasā āpūrita ambaram
mayūra kaṇṭha sacchāyam tapta hema prabhā aṃśukam
indranīla gireḥ śṛṅgam taptam bāla ātapaiḥ iva
tam vīkṣya kamalā kāntam gopa veṣa dharam harim
sahasranetram ātmānam manasā praśaśaṃsa saḥ
mauli kuṇḍala keyūra sphāra ratna aṃśu saṃcayaiḥ
indrāyudha sahasrāṇi muhur dikṣu kṣipan iva
abhyetya keśavam śakraḥ babhāṣe praṇaya ucitam

original: dantatviṣā daśa diśaḥ sudhayā pūrayanniva // Bhmj_19.690 //
analyzed: danta tviṣā daśa diśaḥ sudhayā pūrayan iva
atidaivam idam karma tava kṛṣṇa kim adbhutam
śaktiḥ alpīyasī yasya samagra jagatām gatiḥ
sarva loka upari param vartante kāmadhenavaḥ
tāsām tridaśa pūjyānām brahmaṇaḥ ca asmi śāsanāt
prāptaḥ bhiṣektum govinda rājye tvām īpsitam gavām

original: ityuktvā ratnakumbhena mūrdhni tasya dadau payaḥ // Bhmj_19.693 //
analyzed: iti uktvā ratna kumbhena mūrdhni tasya dadau payaḥ
upendram abhiṣicya indraḥ prasādya ca punar punar

original: pālyastvayā sakhā bandhuḥ svasreyo janakasya yaḥ // Bhmj_19.694 //
analyzed: pālyaḥ tvayā sakhā bandhuḥ svasreyaḥ janakasya yaḥ
tvayā daitya chidā kṛṣṇa keśi kaṃsa vadhe kṛte

original: bhavatsahāyaḥ pṛthivīṃ sa jeṣyati dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_19.695 //
analyzed: bhavat sahāyaḥ pṛthivīm sa jeṣyati dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: iti praṇayino vācaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ śrutvā śacīpateḥ /
analyzed: iti praṇayinaḥ vācam kṛṣṇaḥ śrutvā śacīpateḥ
jānan bhārata vṛttāntam tathā iti pratyapadyata
evam rahaḥ samābhāṣya jambhahā surasūdanam
airāvaṇa kara ālūna meghena nabhasā yayau
gopa veṣa dharam gopāḥ devam matvā tam adbhutam

original: mudritā iva tacchaktyā mugdhā no kiṃcidūcire // Bhmj_19.698 //
analyzed: mudritāḥ iva tad śaktyā mugdhāḥ no kiṃcid ūcire
tatas tam padma pattra akṣam nivṛtta aśeṣa śauśavam
janāḥ nirbhara tāruṇya lāvaṇyam nayanaiḥ papuḥ
śarad niśāsu saṃpūrṇa candra smita sitāsu saḥ
hariṇī hāri netrābhiḥ vijahāra ratipriyaḥ
sa rāga vṛṣa yuddheṣu niyuddheṣu ca kautukī
vīra śṛṅgāra rabhasaḥ sa babhūva manoharaḥ
cheka uktiṣu kṛta abhyāsāḥ veśa karmasu sādarāḥ

original: babhustā vismito lāpā vibhrameṣu kṛtakṣaṇāḥ // Bhmj_19.702 //
analyzed: babhuḥ tāḥ vismitaḥ lāpāḥ vibhrameṣu kṛtakṣaṇāḥ
tad līlā anukṛtau yatnaḥ tad kathā śravaṇe rasaḥ
tad svaira bhāṣaṇe harṣaḥ kaḥ pi abhūt gopa yoṣitām
tāsām akṛtaka smera sphurita adhara pallavam

original: mugdhānāṃ vadanaṃ prītyai babhūvābhyadhikaṃ hareḥ // Bhmj_19.704 //
analyzed: mugdhānām vadanam prītyai babhūva abhyadhikam hareḥ
yat gurūṇām anāyatta āyattāḥ tyakta gṛhakriyāḥ
dveṣiṇyaḥ sva jane yat ca tat kṛṣṇa āsya vijṛmbhitam
sa lajjāḥ api māninyaḥ prakaṭa smara vikriyāḥ
tanvyaḥ pi tanu tām prāpuḥ tāḥ tad arpita mānasāḥ
kampa svedavatī kasmāt akasmāt sakhi mūrchitā

original: api kṛṣṇabhujaṅgena na daṣṭāsi pramādinī // Bhmj_19.707 //
analyzed: api kṛṣṇa bhujaṅgena na daṣṭā asi pramādinī

original: nāyaṃ tava gṛhe mārgo mārgo 'yaṃ vijane vane /
analyzed: na ayam tava gṛhe mārgaḥ mārgaḥ yam vijane vane
yamunā tīra vānīra vallarī keli veśmanaḥ
amuṣmin kusumārāme kṛṣṇa ṣaṭcaraṇena kim
kṛta vraṇā tvam adhare yena asi vinata ānanā
gāyanti yadi kṛṣṇasya caritam gopa kanyakāḥ

original: tvaṃ na smarasi kiṃ mūḍhe srastaṃ śīlamivāṃśukam // Bhmj_19.710 //
analyzed: tvam na smarasi kim mūḍhe srastam śīlam iva aṃśukam
dāmodara matā asmi iti mada andhe kim na pasyasi
sa kāntā śata saṃketa saktaḥ hi bahu vallabhaḥ

original: kiṃ nu nāma stanau tanvi sotkampau vinigūhase /
analyzed: kim nu nāma stanau tanvi sa utkampau vinigūhase
pulaka aṅka kapolasya vadanasya karoṣi kim
iyam indīvara śyāmā śyāmā kusuma hāsinī
kṛṣṇaḥ ca gūḍha saṃcārī carasi ekākinī katham
iti gopa aṅganāḥ sa īrṣyam saṃbhoga subhagāḥ mithas

original: vyāharanti sma sāsūyaṃ svairaṃ smaraśarāturāḥ // Bhmj_19.714 //
analyzed: vyāharanti sma sa asūyam svairam smara śara āturāḥ
kāntā kararuha ālūna bāla vañjula pallavam
rati śayyā rase vilalam vanam
tasya kāntataram kāntāḥ sa madāḥ saṃmada ākulam
vadanam vadana udārāḥ ghūrṇamāna īkṣaṇāḥ papuḥ
tāsām abhisarantīnām avaśam keśavam prati

original: petuḥ śaśāṅke sāsūyā dṛśo darśanaśaṅkayā // Bhmj_19.717 //
analyzed: petuḥ śaśāṅke sa asūyāḥ dṛśaḥ darśana śaṅkayā

original: saphalaṃ dhanyamātmānaṃ manye mene manobhavaḥ // Bhmj_19.718 //
analyzed: saphalam dhanyam ātmānam manye mene manobhavaḥ

original: aho nu jayinī śaktiḥ samarasya smayakāriṇī /
analyzed: aho nu jayinī śaktiḥ samarasya smaya kāriṇī
prajāpati gurau yasyāḥ saṃpūrṇa praṇayā gatiḥ
tatas kadācid lalanā keli śālini keśave
adṛśyata pradoṣa ante daityaḥ matta vṛṣa ākṛtiḥ
ariṣṭaḥ duṣṭa caritaḥ tīkṣṇa śṛṅgaḥ ruṇa īkṣaṇaḥ
puñjīkṛtaḥ śaśi karaiḥ tamaḥ kūṭaḥ iva asitaḥ
bhāyayan vṛṣabhān bhīmaḥ bherī gambhīra niḥsvanaḥ
prahāra abhimukham kṛṣṇa kukṣi nikṣipta cakṣuṣaḥ
tasya śṛṅga yugam lebhe kāla toraṇa tulya tām
prahāriṇam mada udagram jagrāha ugram tam acyutaḥ

original: khalaṃ mūrkhaṃ navaiśvaryaṃ priyavādīva vañcakaḥ // Bhmj_19.724 //
analyzed: khalam mūrkham nava aiśvaryam priya vādī iva vañcakaḥ
gṛhītaḥ tena balinā baladeva anujena saḥ
babhūva udbhrānta sa āvega puccha uddhuta rajaḥ paṭaḥ
tasya āndoli vaktrasya ghora huṃkāra kāriṇaḥ
vyāla ghnā saṅkha mālā iva sphāra phena āvalī gale

original: tataḥ kaṇṭhaṃ nipīḍyāsya dhṛtvā mūrdhni padaṃ javāt /
analyzed: tatas kaṇṭham nipīḍya asya dhṛtvā mūrdhni padam javāt

original: śṛṅgamekaṃ samutpāṭya jaghāna vadane hariḥ // Bhmj_19.727 //
analyzed: śṛṅgam ekam samutpāṭya jaghāna vadane hariḥ
sa tīkṣṇa śṛṅga abhihataḥ papāta bhuvi dānavaḥ
ariṣṭe nihate tasmin ariṣṭe tridivaukasām
prabhāvaḥ paprathe śaireḥ mathurā adhipateḥ puras
sa vṛṣṇi vṛddhān vibudhān vasudeva purogamam
ugrasenam ca pitaram dārdikya akrūra sātyakān
niścayam naya kovidān
niḥśabda jana saṃcāre niśīthe vyasta sevakaḥ
pradīpa pratibimba aṅka ratna ābharaṇa tejasā
gūḍha cintā anala jvālam bahis prakaṭayan iva
saḥ bravīt kṣaṇam ālokya vadanāni abhimāninām
dīrgha ucchvāsena kathayan navam vairi parābhavam
iyam prathita sārāṇām viduṣām sattva śālinām
sūcyate bhavatām agre māna glāni kadarthanā
pramādāt avalepāt vā vismṛtena alpakena naḥ
cūḍāmaṇiṣu vinyastam caraṇa prabhavam rajaḥ
na sahante suraguroḥ ye sāmyam guru kovidāḥ

original: spardhayā bata lajjante yudhi vajrāyudhena ye // Bhmj_19.736 //
analyzed: spardhayā bata lajjante yudhi vajrāyudhena ye
te yūyam yasya sacivaḥ saciva āropita śriyaḥ

original: tasya kā nāma gaṇanā gaṇanāthe 'pi jāyate // Bhmj_19.737 //
analyzed: tasya kā nāma gaṇanā gaṇanāthe pi jāyate
avajñā upekṣitasya ayam vipākaḥ śatru janmanaḥ
vayam api adhunā yena yātāḥ cintā vidheya tām
śrūyate nanda gopasya pravṛddha caritaḥ śiśuḥ
daityānām api yaḥ śaṅke śaṅka taṅka guruḥ navaḥ
vinyasya caraṇam yena mūrdhni

original: svarvīkṛtāni śūrāṇāṃ śirāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi ca // Bhmj_19.740 //
analyzed: svarvīkṛtāni śūrāṇām śirāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi ca
sāgrajena hatāḥ tena pralamba ariṣṭa dhenukāḥ
avajñā āspadam evā abhūt yeṣām saṃgare
giriḥ govardhanaḥ nāma sapta aham pāṇinā dhṛtaḥ

original: smayāya durnimittāya nāśāya ca na kasya saḥ // Bhmj_19.742 //
analyzed: smayāya durnimittāya nāśāya ca na kasya saḥ

original: na jānīmaḥ sa kiṃ tāvadbhūtamatyadbhutaṃ kṣitau /
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ sa kim tāvat bhūtam ati adbhutam kṣitau

original: samudbhūtamadho yena nīyate naḥ parākramaḥ // Bhmj_19.743 //
analyzed: samudbhūtam adhas yena nīyate naḥ parākramaḥ
tasmāt manīṣibhiḥ vīraiḥ bhavadbhiḥ
yaśaḥ kusuma vallīnām paraśuḥ vyasana udayaḥ
uktam ca nāradena etat punar etya purā svayam
vasudeva sutaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ nanda gopa gṛhe sthitaḥ
nanda gopa sutā ca asau śilāyām āhatā tvayā
sā gatvā vindhya gahanam pulinda śabara arcitā
niśumbha śumbhau ditijau jaghāna ghana vikramau
vihitaḥ vasudevena garbhayoḥ vyatyayaḥ tayoḥ

original: kṛṣṇaḥ sa te bhayasthānamityuktvā nārado yayau /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ sa te bhaya sthānam iti uktvā nāradaḥ yayau

original: so 'yaṃ bandhuḥ kṛtaghno me vasudevaḥ sthito 'ntike // Bhmj_19.748 //
analyzed: saḥ yam bandhuḥ kṛtaghnaḥ me vasudevaḥ sthitaḥ ntike
yena naḥ kṣaya saṃdeha tulām āropitam yaśaḥ
naraka āvarta kalilāḥ yasya kilbiṣa vipruṣaḥ
sa kṛtaghnaḥ dhamaḥ kena pātakena upamīyate
ghora hālāhala āpūrṇaḥ kuṭilaḥ yam mayā svayam

original: dhṛtaḥ sarpo nijagṛhe yenāptaḥ satkule kaliḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ sarpaḥ nija gṛhe yena āptaḥ sat kule kaliḥ

original: mithyā dhavalakūrco 'yaṃ bandhucchadmā jaḍo ripuḥ // Bhmj_19.751 //
analyzed: mithyā dhavala kūrcaḥ yam bandhu chadmā jaḍaḥ ripuḥ
vasudevaḥ sadā jihmaḥ vadha arhe pi eṣa rakṣitaḥ
sarva abhiśaṅkitā rājñām su naya jñaiḥ udāhṛtā

original: ataḥ saṃcintyate ḍimbo na tu me gaṇanāspadam /
analyzed: atas saṃcintyate ḍimbaḥ na tu me gaṇanā āspadam
jagadgrasa gariṣṭhasya sat pratāpa havirbhujaḥ
na bhavati eva śiśuḥ gopa pataṅgakaḥ
athavā vartate sādhuḥ yadi asmān prati sāgrajaḥ
kā kṣatiḥ bhoga bhāgī me bandhu madhye bhaviṣyati

original: akrūro madgirā yātu vrajaṃ dānapatiḥ svayam // Bhmj_19.755 //
analyzed: akrūraḥ mad girā yātu vrajam dānapatiḥ svayam
etena tau samāhūtau draṣṭum icchāmi dārakau
nanda gopa prabhṛtayaḥ kara dāḥ mama śāsanāt
dhanuḥ makhe samāyāntu prastuta adhika dāyinaḥ

original: vīrāṇāṃ harṣajananau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇau ca tau // Bhmj_19.757 //
analyzed: vīrāṇām harṣa jananau kṛṣṇa saṃkarṣaṇau ca tau

original: mallābhyāṃ yudhyamānau me raṅge prītatiṃ kariṣyataḥ /
analyzed: mallābhyām yudhyamānau me raṅge prītatim kariṣyataḥ

original: iti divyadṛśākrūraḥ śrutvā kaṃsena bhāṣitam // Bhmj_19.758 //
analyzed: iti divya dṛśā akrūraḥ śrutvā kaṃsena bhāṣitam
yayau yādava śārdūlaḥ śauri darsana lālasaḥ

original: akrūre govrajaṃ yāte vṛddhāste vṛṣṇipuṃgavāḥ // Bhmj_19.759 //
analyzed: akrūre govrajam yāte vṛddhāḥ te vṛṣṇi puṃgavāḥ
nindayā vusudevasya kruddhāḥ tasthuḥ adhomukhāḥ

original: tataḥ pitāmahaḥ kaṃsaṃ pitāmaha ivāparaḥ // Bhmj_19.760 //
analyzed: tatas pitāmahaḥ kaṃsam pitāmahaḥ iva aparaḥ
abhyadhāt andhakaḥ pīmān durjayaḥ pratibandhakaḥ

original: vandhyāḥ kule 'pi satataṃ mayanye dhanyatarāḥ striyaḥ // Bhmj_19.761 //
analyzed: vandhyāḥ kule satatam dhanyatarāḥ striyaḥ

original: na kulaghnaḥ suto yāsāṃ kadācidapi jāyate /
analyzed: na kula ghnaḥ sutaḥ yāsām kadācid api jāyate

original: na jātu vajrajihveṣu tīkṣṇeṣu krūrakāriṣu // Bhmj_19.762 //
analyzed: na jātu vajra jihveṣu tīkṣṇeṣu krūra kāriṣu
sudhā ālayā tiṣṭhati śrīḥ kamala aṅkura komalā
aho nu śocya tām yātāḥ cirāt yādava vṛṣṇayaḥ
vṛddha avamāna kṛt bālaḥ yeṣām kaṃsa tvam agraṇīḥ

original: ka evaṃ nāma jaḍadhīranunmattaḥ prabhāṣate // Bhmj_19.764 //
analyzed: kaḥ evam nāma jaḍa dhīḥ an unmattaḥ prabhāṣate
rakṣitaḥ vasudevena pitrā putraḥ kim api aho
na iha putrāt priyataram kiṃcid asti śarīriṇām
putra sva janakam pṛccha putra snehasya gauravam
para loka paritrāṇām pitrā ced rakṣitaḥ sutaḥ

original: tasyāsya vācyatā keyaṃ yūyaṃ sarve 'pi putriṇaḥ /
analyzed: tasya asya vācya tā kā iyam yūyam sarve pi putriṇaḥ
bandhu buddhyā praṇayinā saṃdheyaḥ sarvathā tvayā

original: hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca me mohānna kariṣyasi cedvacaḥ // Bhmj_19.768 //
analyzed: hitam pathyam ca me mohāt na kariṣyasi ced vacaḥ
tad aiśvarya prabhāvaḥ saṃpūrṇa avadhiḥ eṣa te
dṛśyante kṣaya saṃsinyaḥ durnimitta paramparāḥ
anyatra kṛṣṇa saṃdhānāt tāsu śāntiḥ na te parā
iti andhaka vacaḥ śrutvā niḥśvasan bhrakuṭī mukhaḥ

original: nirjagāma tataḥ kaṃsaḥ parāṅmukha iva śriyaḥ /
analyzed: nirjagāma tatas kaṃsaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ iva śriyaḥ
na ayam asti iti vṛddheṣu bhāṣamāṇeṣu vṛṣṇiṣu
ādideśa āśu śvetāṅgam kaṃsaḥ keśi turaṅgamam
sa kṛṣṇa nidhanāya ugraḥ preritaḥ tena dānavaḥ
jagāma govrajam ghora saṃdhyā asṛj saṃplute hani
sa kopāt rudhireṇa iva pūrita akṣaḥ śvasan muhur
uraḥ sthala milat prothaḥ kuñcita ūru śirodharaḥ
visphāra kesara saṭā karāla skandha kandharaḥ

original: ghaṭṭayanniva heṣābhiḥ pibanniva diśo daśa // Bhmj_19.775 //
analyzed: ghaṭṭayan iva heṣābhiḥ piban iva diśaḥ daśa
nirmāṃsa carvaṇa āsvāda prasravat sṛkvi śoṇitaḥ
kṛtānta cāmara ākāra valita uddhūta valadhiḥ
vivṛtta ānana vispaṣṭa niryat danta aṃśu maṇḍalaḥ
dikṣu mānuṣa māṃsa ādaḥ kṣipan asthi cayān iva
saḥ bhidudrāva vegena kṛṣṇam āpāṇḍura chaviḥ
pavana āprerita sphāraḥ śarad meghaḥ iva acalam
samutkṣipta agra caraṇam keśavaḥ keśinam puras
dṛṣṭvā nivāryamāṇaḥ gaupaiḥ krodhāt tam ādravat
khurābhyām kṛta śalyābhyām balāt vakṣasi tāḍitaḥ
ghora heṣā rava ugreṇa tena na akampata acyutaḥ
kesara ādhūnana uddhūta rajasaḥ tasya valgitaiḥ
babhūvuḥ kakubhaḥ channāḥ dhūmaketu śataiḥ iva
tasya prahārataḥ vaktra kuhare vivare hariḥ
dāruṇe dāruṇāya iva dviguṇam bhujam ādade
keśi danta antara āsaktaḥ sa rarāja hareḥ bhujaḥ
phena āvalī parikṣiptaḥ pārijātaḥ iva arṇave
keśī śaila śilā stambha dṛḍhe doṣṇi muradviṣaḥ
bhagna dantaḥ ciram cakre vaktra añjana kadarthanāḥ
prasravat sa veda salilaḥ srotaḥ proddhānta śoṇitaḥ
vyāvṛtta nayanaḥ keśī niḥśvasan niścalaḥ bhavat
sphārite doṣṇi kṛṣṇena gaṇḍakūṭa taṭa antare
sphuṭa sthūla asthi ṭāṅkāram tat vaktram abhavat dvidhā
sa dāmodara durvāra dos daṇḍa dalita ākṛtiḥ
papāta rudhira udgāra ghoraḥ turaga dānavaḥ
keśi vadhaḥ

original: hate keśini kaṃsasya priye suhṛdi dānave /
analyzed: hate keśini kaṃsasya priye suhṛdi dānave
bhuvaneṣu abhavat kaḥ pi harṣa utsāha mahā utsavaḥ
antarhitaḥ muniḥ prītyā nāradaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt

original: sādhu mādhava niḥśalyaṃ tvāyā kṛtmidaṃ jagat // Bhmj_19.789 //
analyzed: sādhu mādhava niḥśalyam jagat
keśi nirdāraṇāt sva yātaḥ keśavaḥ tvam bhaviṣyasi
iti uktvā prayayau harṣāt nāradaḥ bhimatām diśam
prādurāsīt tatas śaureḥ nimitta nicayaḥ śubhaḥ

original: bandhunā pitṛtulyena yaḥ śaṃsati samāgamam // Bhmj_19.791 //
analyzed: bandhunā pitṛ tulyena yaḥ śaṃsati samāgamam
meru pārśva antaram prāyāt dina ante vāsareśvaraḥ
kṛṣṇakeśi vadha āścarya kathām vaktum iva ādarāt
tatas pīta aṃśuka udāra dāmodara manoharam
babhūva sahaja śyāmam saṃdhyā aṃśu śabalam nabhaḥ
śanais saṃghaṭṭitāḥ śyāmāḥ tamobhiḥ abhavat diśaḥ
tārakā aṃśu sruta kṣīrāḥ gopālaiḥ iva dhenavaḥ
niśānāthaḥ samudyayau
śaśāṅka kara sāreṇa vihāreṇa sura śriyaḥ

original: tamasaḥ parihāreṇa hāraiṇaiva nabho babhau // Bhmj_19.796 //
analyzed: tamasaḥ parihāreṇa hāraiṇa eva nabhaḥ babhau
netra premṇi sudhā sīmni sitimni vyomni gāḍha tām
yaśasi iva āśrite śaureḥ niśākara kara chalāt
praharṣayan nīlakaṇṭhān rathena ghana nādinā
śekharaḥ vṛṣṇi vīrāṇām aktūraḥ pratyapadyata
nanda gopasya sadanam sa samāsādya gokule
dadarśa śatapattra akṣam kṛṣṇam keśinisūdanam
ayam sa kaiṭabhārātiḥ bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
bhuvaḥ bhāra avatārāya jātaḥ yādava nandanaḥ
śrīvatsa lakṣaṇaḥ vakṣaḥ bibhrāṇaḥ kustubha ucitam
niḥspanda āliṅgane yogyam kamalā kuca kumbhayoḥ
megha śyāmena vapuṣā nayana amṛta varṣiṇā
dhatte saudāminī dāma ramyam pīta aṃśuka dvayam
anena nṛtyati manaḥ sphāram prasarataḥ dṛśau
etad āliṅganāya iva bhujau me paridhāvataḥ
ehi mādhava kṛṣṇa iti vyāharan prīti nirbharaḥ

original: pūjito nandagopena kṛṣṇena ca viveśa saḥ // Bhmj_19.804 //
analyzed: pūjitaḥ nanda gopena kṛṣṇena ca viveśa saḥ
prāpta pūjā āsanaḥ saḥ tha sa saṃkarṣaṇam acyutam
uvāca puṇḍarīkākṣam āpiban iva cakṣuṣā
iyam te dhīra gambhīrā harṣa pīyūṣa varṣiṇī
prayāti nā puṇyavatām mūrtiḥ locana gocaram
mohāt tvad bhakti vimukhaḥ tvām dṛṣṭvā prātar āgatam
vāñchitaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhavitā mathurā īśvaraḥ
draṣṭum icchati kaṃsaḥ tvām prātar gantāsi tad purīm

original: tvadvapuḥ pūrṇapūṇyena dhanyāḥ paśyantu yādavāḥ // Bhmj_19.808 //
analyzed: tvad vapuḥ pūrṇapūṇyena dhanyāḥ paśyantu yādavāḥ
tatra kaṃsasya saṃbhāra dhana ādhāmni dhanuḥ mahīm

original: upatiṣṭhantu dhaninaḥ sarve gopāḥ karapradāḥ // Bhmj_19.809 //
analyzed: upatiṣṭhantu dhaninaḥ sarve gopāḥ kara pradāḥ
etāvat eva pracuram mama āgamana kāraṇam
idam tu bāndhava snohāt yat kiṃcid abhidhīyate

original: vṛddhaḥ sa sukṛtī tatra putra putravatāṃ varaḥ /
analyzed: vṛddhaḥ sa su kṛtī tatra putra putravatām varaḥ

original: vilokya vasudevastvāṃ phalaṃ prāpnotu janmanaḥ // Bhmj_19.811 //
analyzed: vilokya vasudevaḥ tvām phalam prāpnotu janmanaḥ
tvad kṛte satatam yasya kaṃsa vākya śarāḥ svarāḥ
tvām avāpnotu māhātmyam rohaṇa adri vasuṃdharā
api kaṃsa bhayāt putraiḥ a saṃpīta payodharā

original: kṛṣṇeti nāmnā satataṃ sīdati prasnustanī // Bhmj_19.813 //
analyzed: kṛṣṇā iti nāmnā satatam sīdati prasnu stanī
gūḍha cintā viniḥśvāsa dhūsara adhara pallavā
dūrīkṛta suta sneha vaiklavya āpta vipallavām
rahitām iva rāmeṇa kausalyām kula maulinā
darśana amṛta varṣeṇa nirvāpaya sametya tām
aho tṛṣṇā iva sahaja acchāyā iva sahacāriṇī
vāsanā iva a parikṣīṇā sarvathā bhavitavya tā
tava api janma sa vudhā cintayā yat praśuṣyati
kaṃsa nirbhartsana ānamraḥ tvām prāpya janakaḥ cirāt

original: vahatu trijagatpūjya putra mānonnataṃ śiraḥ // Bhmj_19.818 //
analyzed: vahatu trijagat pūjya putra māna unnatam śiraḥ
akrūra saṃdeśaḥ
iti ukte dānapatinā sneha vātsalya śālinā
sarvam karomi iti vadan nirvikāra ānanaḥ bhavat
gantum kṛta abhyupagame kṛṣṇe gopa mṛgī dṛśām
cintā saṃtapta niḥśvāsaiḥ iva induḥ mlāna tām yayau
dugdhā jyotsnā pūra payasvinī
prātardyaiḥ sāṃdhya rāgeṇa kapilā gauḥ iva ābabhau
atha udayācala śiraḥ ratna tām āgate ravau
udyat pradīpta cakrasya śobhām lebhe hareḥ nabhaḥ
kara upanaya saṃpūrṇaiḥ śakaṭaiḥ atha bhūribhiḥ
gantum abhyudyayuḥ gopa patayaḥ kaṃsa śāsanāt
rathaiḥ prayayuḥ akrūra rauhiṇeya acyuta ādayaḥ
arghyamānāḥ iva uttāla gopālī locana utpalaiḥ
avāpya yamunā tīram akrūraḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt

original: asminhrade bhogivṛte kṛṣṇa śeṣaṃ phaṇīśvaram // Bhmj_19.825 //
analyzed: asmin hrade bhogi vṛte kṛṣṇa śeṣam phaṇi īśvaram
nimajjya bhagavat mantraiḥ pūjayāmi amṛta aśanaḥ
iti uktvā kṛṣṇa nikṣipta rathaḥ tatra mamajja saḥ
nimagnaḥ saḥ tha pātālam divya khastika lāñchanam
śeṣam sahasramūrdhānam dadarśa āsīnam īśvaram
hema abja mālā ābharaṇam sarva ratna ābhūṣitam
sahasra śikhara sphāra tuṣāra giri vibhramam
āsevyamānam praṇataiḥ nikhilaiḥ kula bhogibhiḥ
nīlāmbaram nālaketum halinam musalāyudham

original: utsaṅge tasya kṛṣṇaṃ ca śītāṃśoriva lāñchanam /
analyzed: utsaṅge tasya kṛṣṇam ca śītāṃśoḥ iva lāñchanam
niṣaṇṇam paśyan japan brahya sanātanam
rauhiṇeya acyutau matvā tau eva unmajjaya sa tvaraḥ

original: dṛṣṭvā rathasthau tāveva mamajja punarādarāt // Bhmj_19.831 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ratha sthau tau eva mamajja punar ādarāt
punar tathā eva tau dṛṣṭvā samunmajjya āsta saṃśayaḥ

original: tvameva sarvamityūce pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇena sasmitam // Bhmj_19.832 //
analyzed: tvam eva sarvam iti ūce pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇena sa smitam
hrada darśanam
dina ante prāpya mathurām akrūraḥ sva gṛha antare
svairam jagāda govindam kaṃsa durnaya śaṅkitaḥ
vasudeva gṛham tāta na gantavyam tvayā adhunā

original: na ca rāmeṇa nitarāṃ kaṃsādāpnoti bhartsanām // Bhmj_19.834 //
analyzed: na ca rāmeṇa nitarām kaṃsāt āpnoti bhartsanām
iti ukte dānapatinā kṛṣṇaḥ sa smitam abravīt

original: satyaṃ tatra na gacchāvaḥ paśyāvaḥ kautukātpurīm // Bhmj_19.835 //
analyzed: satyam tatra na gacchāvaḥ paśyāvaḥ kautukāt purīm
iti ābhāṣya mada udārau rāma kṛṣṇau viceratuḥ
avatīrṇau vimānābhyām vīrau vidyādharau iva
tau rāja rajakam prāpya yayācāte mahā bhujau

original: vāsāṃsi rucirābhāṃsi na dadāvadhamaśca saḥ // Bhmj_19.837 //
analyzed: vāsāṃsi rucira ābhāṃsi na dadau adhamaḥ ca saḥ
krodha darpa avaliptam tam rajakam krūra vādinam

original: hatvā jahāra vāsāṃsi baladevānujo balāt // Bhmj_19.838 //
analyzed: hatvā jahāra vāsāṃsi baladeva anujaḥ balāt
svayam mālya upanayanam mālā kārī valīmatī
śrīpateḥ śrī pradam prādāt prītyā praṇaya vādinī
krameṇa līlayā kṛṣṇaḥ su spaṣṭa avayavām kṣaṇāt
tām cakre yauvana udyāna pūrṇa lāvaṇya vallarīm
tatas prāpya āyudhāgāram pūjitam daitya dānavaiḥ
utsāha arham śilā stambha sāram dadṛśatuḥ dhanuḥ
dāmodaraḥ tat ādāya dorbhyām ākṛṣya durdharam
babhañja sphāri ṭāṅkāram mṛṇālī nāla līlayā
tena śabdena pavana skandha saṃghaṭṭa kāriṇā

original: rarāsa dāriteva dyauścakampe ca vasuṃdharā // Bhmj_19.843 //
analyzed: rarāsa dāritā iva dyauḥ cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
āyudhāgārikā pi āśu dhanuḥ bhaṅgam nyavedayat
kaṃsāya a kampita manāḥ cakre darpāt sa ca aśrutam

original: bhagnaṃ kenāpi mallena śrutvā cāpaṃ nareśvaraḥ /
analyzed: bhagnam kena api mallena śrutvā cāpam nareśvaraḥ
dideśa sarva mallānām yuddha prekṣā mahā utsavam
svairam tatas samāhūya mallau cāṇūram auṣṭikau
cira saṃdhāritau cakre vadha sajjau muradviṣaḥ
gaja śālā adhipam kaṃsaḥ saṃgrāma sacivam rahaḥ
ūce mohe pi saṃprāpta sukṛtaḥ śauri cintayā
prātar dhanuḥ mahī raṅgam āgantā vasudeva jaḥ

original: sāgrajo darpasaṃmatto mattaḥ sa vadharmahati // Bhmj_19.848 //
analyzed: sa agrajaḥ darpa saṃmattaḥ mattaḥ sa vadharmahati
raṅga dvāri tvayā ca asau nirghātī vyāla kuñjaraḥ
kāryaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ krodhāt tad nidhana udyataḥ
hata putram karomi eva vasudevam niraṃśakam
bandhu chadma praticchannān nṛpān ca andhaka yādavān
purā mama ārtavavatī jananī nava kautukāt
priya āsana ādi kaṭake cacāra kusuma ujjvale
tatra vāla anila ullāsa vellita aśoka pallave
sphūrjat bakula kiñjalka piñjarīkṛta ṣaṭpade
puñjīkṛta latā kuñja mañju guñjat vihaṅgame
rati rāga rasa udāra smara saṃjīvane vane
dadarśa tām saura patiḥ drumilaḥ dānava īśvaraḥ
latām stana stabakinīm kāma kalpataroḥ iva

original: mayo yogīśvaraḥ so 'tha rūpaṃ kṛtvā piturmama /
analyzed: mayaḥ yogi īśvaraḥ saḥ tha rūpam kṛtvā pituḥ mama

original: bheje tāṃ manmathāviṣṭaḥ satīṃ premanirargalām // Bhmj_19.855 //
analyzed: bheje tām manmatha āviṣṭaḥ satīm prema nirargalām

original: tataḥ sā vṛttakartavyā śaṅkitā vīkṣya dānavam /
analyzed: tatas sā vṛtta kartavyā śaṅkitā vīkṣya dānavam

original: pāpaṃ śaśāpa kupitā dūṣitāsmīti duḥkhitā // Bhmj_19.856 //
analyzed: pāpam śaśāpa kupitā dūṣitā asmi iti duḥkhitā
vadham prāpsyasi durvṛtta mad bhartṛ kula jāt yudhi

original: ayaṃ ca mama garbhe 'dya tvayā yastanayo dhṛtaḥ // Bhmj_19.857 //
analyzed: ayam ca mama garbhe dya tvayā yaḥ tanayaḥ dhṛtaḥ
iti uktvā śanakais prāyāt iti mām āha nāradaḥ
tasmāt aham daitya pateḥ drumilasya ātmajaḥ mataḥ

original: suto 'haṃ nograsenasya yādavā me na bāndhavāḥ /
analyzed: sutaḥ ham nā ugrasenasya yādavāḥ me na bāndhavāḥ

original: te hir ve mamocchedyāḥ kṛṣṇotsāhapratīkṣiṇaḥ // Bhmj_19.859 //
analyzed: te hiḥ ve mama ucchedyāḥ kṛṣṇa utsāha pratīkṣiṇaḥ
saṃdiśya iti mahā amātyam saṃkḷptam ape hani
saṃgata prekṣakam raṅgam viveśa viṣada aṃśukaḥ
valabhī tuṅga ratna aṃśuṃtaraṅga āliṅgita ambare
saṃgata ananta sāmanta samāgama nirantera
bhoja vṛṣṇi andhakaiḥ tatra vīraiḥ parivṛtaḥ babhau
hema siṃhāsana āsīnaḥ pīna aṃsaḥ kaṃsa bhūpatiḥ
kāntābhiḥ cāmara prānta kampita uṣṇīṣa pallavaḥ
nānā deśa āgatāḥ tasya śāsanāt atha durmadāḥ
samutpetuḥ mahā mallāḥ bhuja āsphālana śālinaḥ
saṃkarṣaṇa acyutau vīrau nīla pīta ambarau tatas
sita asita ghana chāyau raṅga dvāram avāpatuḥ
gātraiḥ kuvālayā pīḍā kāriṇam tatra gauravāt
punar kuvalayīpīḍam sajjam dadṛśatuḥ gajam
bhogi indra ābhoga saṃbhrānti karam kajjala mecakam
kālakūṭa chaṭā āṭopa nirdagdham iva mandiram
ādhoraṇena durvāra darpa prerita mojasā
tam yuddha saṃmukham dṛṣṭvā danta āghāta kṣata acalam
punar kuṇḍalita uddaṇḍa ghora śuṇḍāla maṇḍalam
trailokya kavalīkāra vikarālam iva antakam
maṇḍalāni caran kṛṣṇaḥ savya dakṣiṇa pārśavayoḥ
sva sa hasta ālambanam kurvan vegena tam amohayat
vivalat parvata ākṛtiḥ
pravṛdda śrama śūtkāra śīkara āpurita ambaraḥ
danta abhighā vaiphalyāt jānubhyām avanim gataḥ
sahasā utthāya govindam laghu citra parākramam
carantam kara danta agra caraṇa abhyantare pi saḥ

original: na prāpa kṛtayatno 'pi bhāgyahīna ivopsitam // Bhmj_19.873 //
analyzed: na prāpa kṛta yatnaḥ u pi bhāgya hīnaḥ iva upsitam
hariḥ dadat su kaṭakam da tvā asya caraṇam mukhe
saṃgrāma toraṇa stambham pāṇibhyām dantam agrahīt
kaṃsa śrī nalinī mūlam iva utpāṭya dvipa ānanāt

original: tīkṣṇāgraṃ dantamusalaṃ tenaiva nijaghāna tam // Bhmj_19.875 //
analyzed: tīkṣṇa agram danta musalam tena eva nijaghāna tam
nija danta prahāreṇa rakta udgārī vidāritaḥ
hastī sruta śakṛt mūtraḥ cacāla acala saṃnibhaḥ
ākṛṣṭa pṛcchaḥ rāmeṇa hata ārohaḥ sa śauriṇā
danta nirdārita kaṭaḥ papāta vikaṭaḥ kṣitau
kuvalayāpīḍa vadhaḥ
hatvā kuvalayāpīḍam jagat pīḍā kṣaya udyataḥ
raṅgam viveśa govindaḥ kāminī kautuka pradaḥ
gaja rakta chaṭā aṅkasya līlā valgita vāsasaḥ

original: rūpaṃ tasya babhau raṅge meghasyeva savidyutaḥ // Bhmj_19.879 //
analyzed: rūpam tasya babhau raṅge meghasya iva sa vidyutaḥ
danti dantaḥ sa śuśubhe kare kāliya vidviṣaḥ
aṣṭamī śītakiraṇaḥ prabhā dīptaḥ iva ambare
tatas kaṃsa ājñayā mallaḥ balavān andhra deśa jaḥ
cāṇūraḥ parvata ākāraḥ tatra kṛṣṇam ayodhayat
tayoḥ jānu bhuja ābandhaiḥ preraṇa ākarṣaṇāt canaiḥ
pīḍana āsphālana āghātaiḥ pṛthivī samakampataḥ
putraḥ pīyūṣa varṣī iti harṣa bāṣpa ārdra cakṣuṣā

original: sakampaṃ vasudevena mātrā ca jayasaṃśraye // Bhmj_19.883 //
analyzed: sa kampam vasudevena mātrā ca jaya saṃśraye
śrīkāntaḥ iti apsarobhiḥ daityacchedī iti khecaraiḥ
bandhuḥ iti ādarāt gopaiḥ pravīraḥ iti yādavaiḥ
mallaḥ varākaḥ sya kiyān iti saṃkarṣaṇena ca

original: tarasvī vīkṣyamāṇo 'sau mallānāṃ vismayaṃ vyadhāt // Bhmj_19.885 //
analyzed: tarasvī vīkṣyamāṇaḥ sau mallānām vismayam vyadhāt
tatas kopa ākulaḥ kaṃsaḥ kṛṣṇa utsāha vivardhanam
bhujam udyamya vipulam tūrya svanam avārayat
utsāha vādye kaṃsena kṛṣṇa dveṣāt nivārite
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ tāra tūrya ravaiḥ divi
mallam kṛṣṇa jahi iti āśu saptarṣibhiḥ udīrite
papāta uddyotita ākāśaḥ kaṃsasya mukuṭāt maṇiḥ
atha daitya avatārasya mallasya adbhuta vikramaḥ
muṣṭi prahāreṇa śiraḥ cakāra dalita indriyam
tasya sphuṭat lalāṭasya locane dīpa saṃnibhe
nipetatuḥ kṣiti tale tārā yugala śobhane
tatas nipatita aśeṣa malle malle nipātite
abhūt kṣubdha abdhi gambhīraḥ raṅga kṣobha bhavaḥ svanaḥ
saṃkarṣaṇaḥ pi jagrāha mallam maṇḍala kovidaḥ

original: mauṣṭikaṃ nāma vikaṭaṃ tāmarākhyaṃ ca keśavaḥ // Bhmj_19.892 //
analyzed: mauṣṭikam nāma vikaṭam tāmara ākhyam ca keśavaḥ
janma āvartam paribhrāmya tomalam kāliya antakaḥ

original: papāta bhuvi niṣpiṣya mauṣṭikaṃ ca halāyudhaḥ // Bhmj_19.893 //
analyzed: papāta bhuvi niṣpiṣya mauṣṭikam ca halāyudhaḥ
hateṣu teṣu malleṣu śalyeṣu tridivaukasām
vismite yādava kule lulite raṅga maṇḍale
sudhā sāraiḥ iva āsikte vasudeva vadhū sakhe
cukopa bhrukuṭī bhīṣmaḥ kaṃsaḥ kampita mānasaḥ
sa āvegaiḥ tasya niḥśvāsaiḥ iva pralaya tām gate
kopa agnau sarva bhūtānām ghoram āvirabhūt bhayam
tasya gaṇḍa taṭe spaṣṭam kheda bindu latā babhau
laḍat kuṇḍala saktā iva bimbitā mauktika āvalī
bhrū bhaṅgena nivārya eva raṅga kolāhala svanam
vetri protsārita janaḥ jagāda jagatīpatiḥ

original: iyaṃ saralatā jātu jātā sārakṣayāya naḥ /
analyzed: iyam sarala tā jātu jātā sāra kṣayāya naḥ

original: kathaṃ prathitasārāṇāṃ madhye gopaḥ pradṛśyate // Bhmj_19.899 //
analyzed: katham prathita sārāṇām madhye gopaḥ pradṛśyate

original: jambukena hatāḥ siṃhā yadi tatkriyate 'tra kim /
analyzed: jambukena hatāḥ siṃhāḥ yadi tat kriyate kim
niṣkāsyantām itas gopāḥ nanda gopaḥ ca badhyatām
bāndhava vyasanaḥ ca ayam vasudevaḥ kula adhamaḥ

original: nidhīyatāṃ kṣayamukhe svapakṣaiḥ saha yādavaiḥ // Bhmj_19.901 //
analyzed: nidhīyatām kṣaya mukhe sva pakṣaiḥ saha yādavaiḥ
ugrasena sutasya iti śāsanāt ugra vikramaḥ
samudyayuḥ yathā ādiṣṭam kartum tat mati vartinaḥ
tatas trāsa ākulān vīkṣya gopān goptā divaukasām
devīm ca devakīm putra sneha vaiklavya viklavām
hema saṃhāsana upāntam abhipatya trivikramaḥ

original: jagrāha lolamālyeṣu kaṃsaṃ keśeṣu keśavaḥ // Bhmj_19.904 //
analyzed: jagrāha lola mālyeṣu kaṃsam keśeṣu keśavaḥ
agre digbhiḥ iva nyastam avatīrṇam iva ambarāt

original: sahasā patitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kaṃsaḥ kālamamanyata // Bhmj_19.905 //
analyzed: sahasā patitam kṛṣṇam kaṃsaḥ kālam amanyata
kṛṣṇena ākṛṣyamāṇeṣu mālyavatsu mahīpateḥ
keśeṣu vilalāpa iva rāja śrīḥ bhaṅga śiñjitaiḥ
nāmyamāna ānanaḥ kaṃsaḥ śauriṇā bhāra pīḍitām
vadhe nimitta tām yātām āluloke mahīm iva
mauliḥ tasya apatat srasta muktā sru kaṇa saṃtatiḥ
tam ākṛṣya sphuṭat muktā hāra keyūra kuṇḍalam
sphāra aiśvaryāt iva mahā hema siṃhāsanāt cyutam
rakta kuṭṭima nirghṛṣṭa gātra prasruta śoṇitam
utsasarja viśīrṇa asum kaṃsam dūre hariḥ vyasum
ajitam sarva bhūpālaiḥ abhagnam vajri saṃgare
tam vīkṣya sarva bhūtānām avaśyam śauriṇā hatam
raṅge samudabhūt ha uraḥ kṣaṇam halahala āravaḥ
tasmin vīra kula uttaṃse hate kaṃse murāriṇā
kaṃsa anujam sunāmānam nijaghāna halāyudhaḥ
devaḥ tha devakī sūnuḥ vavande deva vanditaḥ
vasudevasya pāda abja ubje
mātuḥ ca ānanda nirbharaḥ
sahasā hatam ākarṇya kaṃsam kaṃsa vadhū janaḥ
akāṇḍa vajra pātena nirdāritaḥ iva āyayau
tam pāṃsu rūṣitam bhūmau siṃha āhatam iva dvipam
saṃvīkṣya unmathitam vegāt vātena iva mahā drumam
krośantyaḥ tāra karuṇam chinna hāra vibūṣaṇāḥ
viveṣṭantyaḥ kṣiti tale jagaduḥ tum mṛgī dṛśaḥ
hā nātha lalanā keli kalanā kusuma āyudha
yudhi pracaṇḍa dos daṇḍa khaṇḍita arāti maṇḍala
katham priyāsu vimukhaḥ prema praṇaya bhūmiṣu
bhūmim āliṅgya suptaḥ si vismṛta ādaraḥ
jarāsaṃdhitaḥ vārinātha ratna apahāriṇaḥ

original: kṣatayakṣasya te vīraḥ vadhaḥ kathamanāyudhaḥ // Bhmj_19.919 //
analyzed: kṣata yakṣasya te vīraḥ vadhaḥ katham anāyudhaḥ
airāvaṇa viṣāṇa agra viṣama ullikhita urasaḥ

original: vadhe tavāpi bhūpāla kathaṃ na kṣubhitaṃ jagat // Bhmj_19.920 //
analyzed: vadhe tava api bhūpāla katham na kṣubhitam jagat
akṣauhiṇīnām nāthasya rājarājasya te katham

original: nijaḥ paro vā saṃgrāme naiko 'pi nihataḥ puraḥ // Bhmj_19.921 //
analyzed: nijaḥ paraḥ vā saṃgrāme na ekaḥ nihataḥ puras
udañcaya dṛśam deva vilokaya vadhū janam

original: iyaṃ kṛtakanidrā vā kopaḥ praṇayinīṣu vā // Bhmj_19.922 //
analyzed: iyam kṛtaka nidrā vā kopaḥ praṇayinīṣu vā
ayam niṣkaruṇaḥ kaḥ pi puṃsām paryanta yātrikaḥ

original: panthāḥ pratīkṣyate kṣipraṃ na yatra dayito janaḥ // Bhmj_19.923 //
analyzed: panthāḥ pratīkṣyate kṣipram na yatra dayitaḥ janaḥ
iti antaḥpura nārīṣu vilapantīṣu kampitā
āyayau kaṃsa jananī sahasā śoka viklavā

original: utsaṅge sā śiraḥ kṛtvā putrasya kṣitiśāyinaḥ /
analyzed: utsaṅge sā śiraḥ kṛtvā putrasya kṣiti śāyinaḥ
bāṣpam durdharam ādāya śuśoca ārta pralāpinī

original: aho nu tvāṃ nṛśaṃsena putra kālena nighnatā /
analyzed: aho nu tvām nṛśaṃsena putra kālena nighnatā
chinnaḥ pituḥ te vṛddhasya jalāñjali manorathaḥ
ekākī pāṃśu śayane mahārha śayana ucitaḥ

original: kathaṃ pṛthagjana iva sthito 'si pṛthivīpate // Bhmj_19.927 //
analyzed: katham pṛthagjanaḥ iva sthitaḥ si pṛthivīpate

original: jñātibhyo duḥsahaṃ puṃsāṃ jāyate nānyato bhayam /
analyzed: jñātibhyaḥ duḥsaham puṃsām jāyate na anyatas bhayam

original: iti rakṣaḥ sabhāsīnaḥ satyamūce daśānanaḥ // Bhmj_19.928 //
analyzed: iti rakṣaḥ sabhā āsīnaḥ satyam ūce daśānanaḥ
sva bhuja upārjitā yena bandhu sādhāraṇīkṛtā

original: lakṣmīḥ sa tvaṃ hataḥ putra jñātinā jñātivatsalaḥ // Bhmj_19.929 //
analyzed: lakṣmīḥ sa tvam hataḥ putra jñātinā jñāti vatsalaḥ
iti uktvā nṛpatim vṛddham ugrasenam uvāca sā
bhartāram putra śokena viṣeṇa iva ati mūrchitam
ayam te tanayaḥ rājan bāndhavaiḥ parivarjitaḥ

original: hataścaura ivaikākī saṃskāraṃ yācatāṃ harim // Bhmj_19.931 //
analyzed: hataḥ cauraḥ iva ekākī saṃskāram yācatām harim
rājye pravīraḥ smin athavā mādhavaḥ vibhuḥ
iyam śrīḥ satatam rājan vīra vaktra avalokinī
gaccha vijñāpaya vibho kṛṣṇam yādava saṃsadi
kaṃsaḥ yam pṛthivīpālaḥ tyajyatām airdhvadaihike

original: kasya nāma hate vairaṃ prāṇaiḥ saṃśodhitāgasi /
analyzed: kasya nāma hate vairam prāṇaiḥ saṃśodhita āgasi

original: tyaktvā prayātaḥ sarvasvaṃ nottiṣṭhiti hataḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_19.934 //
analyzed: tyaktvā prayātaḥ sarva svam na uttiṣṭhiti hataḥ punar
ugrasenaḥ niśamya iti saṃdhyā rakta aṃśumān iva
vasudeva ālayam prāyāt gale daṣṭaḥ iva ahinā
sa bandhu sahitaḥ kṛṣṇam dadarśa avanata ānanaḥ
sva bandhu nidhana dhyāna paścāttāpa ākula āśayam
tam abravīt ugrasenaḥ kriyatām ucitam tvayā
a parimlāna sat vṛttān paripālaya yādavān
tvad ājñayā karomi eṣa kriyām kaṃsasya paścimām

original: datvā jalāñjaliṃ cāsya bhavāmi vipine muniḥ // Bhmj_19.938 //
analyzed: da tvā jala añjalim ca asya bhavāmi vipine muniḥ
prāpte vidheḥ niyogena viyoge yoginaḥ naye

original: kānane kānane teṣāṃ bāṣpamātrocite prabhā // Bhmj_19.939 //
analyzed: kānane kānane teṣām bāṣpa mātra ucite prabhā
tat śrutvā uvāca kaṃsāriḥ sa katyam etat kula ucitam

original: sadṛśaṃ tava bhūpāla śrutasya caritasya ca // Bhmj_19.940 //
analyzed: sadṛśam tava bhūpāla śrutasya caritasya ca
bhava abhava pariccheda rekhā iyam bhavitavya tā
jantoḥ lalāṭa pāṣāṇa likhitā iva a vināśinī
mā kṛthāḥ śokam adhunā vṛtte smin anivartini

original: kāle kalitakālāgrā na hi muhyanti dhīdhanāḥ // Bhmj_19.942 //
analyzed: kāle kalita kālāgrāḥ na hi muhyanti dhī dhanāḥ

original: satkriyāṃ bhajatāṃ kaṃso rājyaṃ ca bhajatāṃ bhavān /
analyzed: satkriyām bhajatām kaṃsaḥ rājyam ca bhajatām bhavān

original: rājyārthino na hi vayaṃ na kaṃsastatkṛte hataḥ // Bhmj_19.943 //
analyzed: rājya arthinaḥ na hi vayam na kaṃsaḥ tad kṛte hataḥ
jagat kārya kṛte smāsu prasannam yadi te manaḥ
tat rājyam aparityājyam nijam nirvyāja kāriṇaḥ
iti uktvā adhomukhaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yadu vaṃśa vibhūṣaṇaḥ
vṛddham aiśvarya vimukham balāt nṛpa pade vyadhāt

original: tataḥ kaṃsasya rājārhe satkārye bandhubhiḥ kṛte /
analyzed: tatas kaṃsasya rāja arhe satkārye bandhubhiḥ kṛte
uvāsa sa anujaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tatra vṛṣṇibhiḥ arcitaḥ
kam sa satkriyā
tatas saṃdīpaneḥ gatvā kaśyapasya anta vāsinaḥ
tau guroḥ vrata saṃpannau sarva vidyā vidheḥ gṛham
divya astreṣu sa śabdeṣu vedeṣu vidita ātmasu
niravadyāsu vidyāsu kalāsu avikalāsu ca
avāpatuḥ param pāram pratibhā maṇi darpaṇau

original: pūjayantau śivaṃ sākṣāttau parvasu visaṃbhramam // Bhmj_19.949 //
analyzed: pūjayantau śivam sākṣāt tau parvasu visaṃbhramam
uktaḥ tatas guruḥ tābhyām dakṣiṇā gṛhyatām iti
uvāca prāptum icchāmi

original: putraṃ prabhāsayātrāyāṃ samudre timinā hṛtam // Bhmj_19.950 //
analyzed: putram prabhāsa yātrāyām samudre timinā hṛtam
guroḥ iti girā kṛṣṇaḥ saṃkarṣaṇa mate sthitaḥ

original: gatvā jalanidhiṃ ghoraṃ mamajja mahasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_19.951 //
analyzed: gatvā jalanidhim ghoram mamajja mahasām nidhiḥ
guroḥ mama sutaḥ kva asau iti vādinam āśu tam
kṛtāñjaliḥ jalanidhiḥ jagāda jagatām patim

original: iha pañcajano nāma daityo vasati duḥsahaḥ /
analyzed: iha pañcajanaḥ nāma daityaḥ vasati duḥsahaḥ

original: timirūpeṇa tenāsau hṛtaḥ sāṃdīpaneḥ sutaḥ // Bhmj_19.953 //
analyzed: timi rūpeṇa tena asau hṛtaḥ sāṃdīpaneḥ sutaḥ
iti ambudhi girā vīraḥ hatvā pañcajanam hariḥ

original: avāpa pāñcajanyākhyaṃ śaṅkhaṃ na tu guroḥ sutam // Bhmj_19.954 //
analyzed: avāpa pāñcajanya ākhyam śaṅkham na tu guroḥ sutam
tatas vaivasvatam jitvā guroḥ preta purāt api

original: saśarīraṃ samādāya dadau dāmodaraḥ sutam // Bhmj_19.955 //
analyzed: sa śarīram samādāya dadau dāmodaraḥ sutam
mathurām atha saṃprāpya kṛtāstraḥ sarva yādavān
rāmeṇa sārdham vidadhe vismaya ānanda nirbharān
atrā antare kaṃsa vadha armarṣa dīpta anala ākulaḥ

original: svasute vidhave dṛṣṭvā duḥkhitaḥ kaṃsavallabhe // Bhmj_19.957 //
analyzed: sva sute vidhave dṛṣṭvā duḥkhitaḥ kaṃsa vallabhe
samabhyāyāt jarāsaṃdhaḥ magadha adhipatiḥ balī
rājyam yad saṃśrayāt kaṃsaḥ baddhvā pitaram āptavān
vīrāḥ tad anugāḥ ca anye bhūmipālāḥ samāyayuḥ
kārīṣaḥ dantavakra ākhyaḥ śiśupālaḥ ca cedipaḥ

original: kaliṅgaḥ kauśikaḥ pauṇḍraḥ krātho rukmī sabhīṣmakaḥ /
analyzed: kaliṅgaḥ kauśikaḥ pauṇḍraḥ krāthaḥ rukmī sa bhīṣmakaḥ
aṃśumān āhṛtaḥ sālva veṇu dāri samudragāḥ
traigartaḥ suhya sauvīra śaibya pāṇḍya videhapāḥ
kāśya kausalya gāndhāra kāśmīra yavana ādayaḥ
daśārma bhagadatta ādyāḥ te nṛpāḥ bala śālinaḥ
rundhānāḥ mathurām cakruḥ jagniḥ vivaram gajaiḥ
tad chattra cāmara sphāra phenān kṣitipa sāgarān

original: vīkṣya tānsamayaṃ mene prāptaṃ kāliyasūdanaḥ // Bhmj_19.963 //
analyzed: vīkṣya tān samayam mene prāptam kāliya sūdanaḥ
akṣauhiṇīnām viṃśatyā māgadhena tarasvinā
mathurāyām niruddhāyām niryayuḥ vṛṣṇi yādavāḥ
tatas pravṛtte samare lāṅgalī musala āyudhaḥ
śārṅgapāṇiḥ sa kaṃsāriḥ vahan kaumodakī gadām
tāla tārkṣya dhvaja agrābhyām rathābhyām hema kaṅkaṭām
vīrau viviśatuḥ vairi senām raṇa samākulām
tasmin ākṛṣṭa deheṣu piṣṭeṣu masulena ca
rāmeṇa kuñjara indreṣu nipatatsu ratheṣu ca
vṛṣṇibhiḥ yudhyamāneṣu śaurya śāliṣu rājasu
śabdena ākṛṣyamāṇasya śārṅgasya muravairiṇaḥ
daitya ātamanām narendrāṇām hṛdayāni cakampire
jarāsaṃdha śara āsāraiḥ virathau rāma keśavau
padbhyām viceratuḥ vīrau kurvāṇau su bhaṭa kṣayam
saṃkarṣaṇena gadayā niṣpiṣṭa syandanaḥ yudhi
gadā pāṇiḥ jarāsaṃdhaḥ svayam kopāt tam ādravat
tayoḥ ghora gadā yuddhe suśikṣā bala śālinoḥ
babhūva kautuka āyāta sura niḥ vivaram nabhaḥ
tayoḥ prāharaiḥ sa āvegaiḥ giri saṃcūrṇana ucitaiḥ

original: dhairyatulyāni gātrāṇi dṛḍhāni ca cakampire // Bhmj_19.972 //
analyzed: dhairya tulyāni gātrāṇi dṛḍhāni ca cakampire
tatas samudyate ghore prahāre jīva hāriṇi

original: jarāsaṃdhāya rāmeṇa proccacāra vaco divaḥ // Bhmj_19.973 //
analyzed: jarāsaṃdhāya rāmeṇa proccacāra vacaḥ divaḥ
alam mithyā prayāsena yudhi dhenuka sūdanaḥ

original: nāyaṃ vadhyastvayā rājā prājāto 'syāntakaḥ paraḥ // Bhmj_19.974 //
analyzed: na ayam vadhyaḥ tvayā rājā sya antakaḥ paraḥ
śrutvā etat virate rāme yāti ca astam divākare
balayoḥ avahāraḥ
jarāsaṃdha yuddham
yāte jite jarāsaṃdhe vīta vighneṣu vṛṣṇiṣu
bāla krīḍāḥ smaran rāmaḥ kadācid govrajam yayau
prahṛṣṭaḥ pūjitaḥ tatra gopaiḥ govinda pūrvajaḥ
vijahāra vanānteṣu kānteṣu kusuma śriyā
sa kadamba taroḥ mūle niṣaṇṇaḥ puṣpa hāsinaḥ
vilola pallavaiḥ tena vyajanaiḥ iva vījitaḥ
hṛṣṭaḥ pāna utsukaḥ śubhraḥ kadamba udara nirgatām

original: papau kādambarīṃ divyāṃ puṣpāmṛtamayīṃ surām // Bhmj_19.979 //
analyzed: papau kādambarīm divyām puṣpa amṛta mayīm surām
mada tāmra kapola agram saṃdhyā aruṇa śaśi prabham
śuśubhe vadanam tasya līlā andota kuṇḍalam
tatas kādambarī devī divya ambara vibhūṣaṇā
vyālola kamala ākāra mada āghūrṇita locanā

original: siṣeve rūpiṇī rāmaṃ ramamāṃṇaṃ manoramam // Bhmj_19.982 //
analyzed: siṣeve rūpiṇī rāmam ramamāṃṇam manoramam
kāntā mukha upamānasya kāntiḥ ca tuhina dyuteḥ
priyābhiḥ gīrbhiḥ abhyetya prahṛṣṭā tam atoṣayat
śrīḥ ca vigrahiṇī tasmai dadau hema ambuja srajam

original: kuṇḍalaṃ kiraṇodāraṃ hāraṃ ca hariṇekṣaṇā // Bhmj_19.984 //
analyzed: kuṇḍalam kiraṇa udāram hāram ca hariṇa īkṣaṇā
nīla ambaraḥ sa vibabhau hema mālā vibhūṣitaḥ
kailāsaḥ iva saṃsakta vidyut dyotita toyadaḥ
rarāja rājasaḥ tasya hāraḥ tarjita tārakaḥ
dugdha abdheḥ iva phena eghaḥ candrasya iva amṛta dravaḥ
tatas sa majjana krīḍā jāta utkaṇṭhaḥ mada alasaḥ
ehi iti dūrāt yamunām uvāca ssvalita akṣaram
sā tad vākyam an ādṛśya kiṃcid nā uvāca nimnagā

original: yadā tadā ruṣā rāmaḥ samutthāyādahe halam // Bhmj_19.988 //
analyzed: yadā tadā ruṣā rāmaḥ samutthāya ādahe halam
tām lola nīla salilām hala agreṇa ācakarṣa saḥ
saṃrambha srasta kabarīm māninīm kupitām iva
kṣobha ākulita haṃsa ālī mekhalā mukharāḥ muhur
saṃlakṣya pulaka śreṇī kvacid a srasta jala aṃśukā
kvacid taraṅga bhrū bhaṅga parivṛtti parāṅmukhī
chinna phena āvalī hāra ākīrṇa śīkara mauktikā
kvicid salila kallola dukūla grahaṇa ākulā
kvicid vīcī kara ācchanna cakravāka unnata stanī
trāsa ākulita vācāla vihaṅga valayā kvacid
āvarta nartita utphulla nīlābja cakita īkṣaṇā
kvacid vāri kuhū utkā rasa niḥśvāsa pralāpinī
sa āvega gamana āyāsa viṣa skhalitā kvacid
halena ākṛṣyamāṇā sā samudbhrāntā abhavat nadī

original: madhye bṛndāvanaṃ nītā tataḥ pratyakṣarūpiṇī // Bhmj_19.995 //
analyzed: madhye bṛndāvanam nītā tatas pratyakṣa rūpiṇī
uvāca rāmam yamunā kampamānā kṛtāñjaliḥ
visrasta vāri vasanā kampaṇī ākula gāminī
phenaiḥ mām prahasiṣyanti saritaḥ sāgara antike
sva rūpam prāptum icchāmi prasanne tvayi mānada

original: mahātmanāṃ nikāre 'pi mānanīyā hi yoṣitaḥ // Bhmj_19.997 //
analyzed: mahātmanām nikāre mānanīyāḥ hi yoṣitaḥ
iti prasāditaḥ rāmaḥ tayā bāla mṛgī dṛśā
virarāma adbhuta ākrāntaiḥ citaḥ vraja vāsibhiḥ

original: tataḥ prāptaḥ sa mathurāṃ pūjitaḥ kāliyadviṣā /
analyzed: tatas prāptaḥ sa mathurām pūjitaḥ kāliya dviṣā
divya mālā ambaraḥ śrīmān yādava ānanda kṛt babhau
vicintya atha jarāsaṃdham gatam bhagna manoratham
tam duḥsaha mahā anīkam punarāgamana utsukam
ati alpām mathurām vīkṣya vardhamānān ca yādavān
ugrasena ādibhiḥ vṛddhaiḥ amantryata keśavaḥ
saḥ bravīt ayam atyanta praṇaya upacitaḥ kramaḥ
gurūṇām bhavatām agre yat asmābhiḥ iha ucyate
iyam naya vidām kā api prakhyāta abhimatā matiḥ
tiṣṭhaḥ tu cintyate nītiḥ yat vīreṣu mahatsu api
jarāsaṃdhena naḥ tāvat prajātaḥ bala śālinā
viraktāḥ pṛthivīpālāḥ te te tad anuyāyinaḥ

original: jarāsaṃdhena sahitā ye na jeyāḥ surairapi // Bhmj_19.1005 //
analyzed: jarāsaṃdhena sahitāḥ ye na jeyāḥ suraiḥ api
sa kālayavanaḥ mleccha darad cīna śaka agra gaḥ

original: tathā balanirodhena purīṃ naḥ samapīḍayat // Bhmj_19.1006 //
analyzed: tathā bala nirodhena purīm naḥ samapīḍayat
sa gārgyasya ugra tapasā saṃjātaḥ trijagat jayī
avadhyaḥ sarva bhūtānām varāt vīraḥ pinākinaḥ
iyam asmad purībandhe tasya aśvākṛt udbhavā
sarit aśva śakṛt saṃjñā loke khyātā prasarpati

original: krameṇa vinipātānāṃ bhayaṃ te mahatāṃ dviṣām /
analyzed: krameṇa vinipātānām bhayam te mahatām dviṣām

original: nagaryāṃ prāpa durgāyāṃ kāladeśodayena na // Bhmj_19.1009 //
analyzed: nagaryām prāpa durgāyām kāla deśa udayena na
tasmāt dvāravatīm durgām parikhā aṭṭala mālinīm
niveśayitum icchāmi paścima abdhau kuśasthalīm
iti ukte śauriṇā prāhuḥ tathā iti yadu puṃgavāḥ
śraddhā hi hita vākyeṣu bhāvi kalyāṇa saṃpadām

original: kṛṣṇasarpaḥ tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kumbhe prakṣipya mudrite /
analyzed: kṛṣṇa sarpaḥ tatas kṛṣṇaḥ kumbhe prakṣipya mudrite
prāhiṇot yavana indrāya duḥsahaḥ smi iti udāharan
tam dṛṣṭvā kālayavanaḥ prahasya ugraiḥ pipīlakaiḥ

original: bhakṣitaṃ preṣayāmāsa sarpaṃ senāḍhyatāṃ vadan // Bhmj_19.1013 //
analyzed: bhakṣitam preṣayāmāsa sarpam senā āḍhya tām vadan
tatas kṛṣmena sahitāḥ purīm jaladhi mekhalām
prayayuḥ mathurām tyaktvā sarve yādava vṛṣṇayaḥ
tatas parivṛtā vīraiḥ bhrājamānā suraiḥ iva
purī kṛṣṇena śuśubhe śakreṇa iva amarāvatī
tatas kadācid ekākī pāda cārī janārdanaḥ
ākraṣṭum kālayavanam prayayau naya kovidaḥ
govindam āgatam dṛṣṭvā prahṛṣṭaḥ yavana adhipaḥ
abhyādravat mahā kāyaḥ kālaḥ kālaḥ iva utkaṭaḥ
manojavam jagat vairī sa jighṛkṣuḥ janārdanam
vega abhisārī vidadhe kampa kṣubhā ākulāḥ diśaḥ
sva māyām iva gambhīrām dhīraḥ giri guhām tatas
viveśa vipulāyām ām acintya gatiḥ acyutaḥ
māndhātuḥ tanayaḥ tatra mucukundaḥ kṣitīśvaraḥ
deva asura raṇe kṛtvā śakrasya ripu saṃkṣayam

original: śrānto nidrāṃ varātprāpya vidadhe saṃvidaṃ suraiḥ /
analyzed: śrāntaḥ nidrām varāt prāpya vidadhe saṃvidam suraiḥ

original: nidrākṣayaṃ me yaḥ kuryātsa gacchedbhasmasāditi // Bhmj_19.1021 //
analyzed: nidrā kṣayam me yaḥ kuryāt sa gacchet bhasmasāt iti
su ciram ratna paryaṅke śayānasya atha tasya saḥ

original: rājño guhāyāṃ govindaḥ śīrṣante samupāviśat // Bhmj_19.1022 //
analyzed: rājñaḥ guhāyām govindaḥ śīrṣa ante samupāviśat
tatas praviśya sa āvegam kopa prajvalitaḥ śvasan

original: suptaṃ dadarśa rājarṣiṃ yavanaḥ parvatākṛtim // Bhmj_19.1023 //
analyzed: suptam dadarśa rājarṣim yavanaḥ parvata ākṛtim
pihita ānanam ālokya tam kālayavanaḥ krudhā

original: kṛṣmo 'yamiti saṃcintya padā pasparśa bhūmipam // Bhmj_19.1024 //
analyzed: kṛṣmaḥ yam iti saṃcintya padā pasparśa bhūmipam
sahasā mucukunda nṛpaḥ padā
spṛśantam duḥka haruṣā cakṣuṣā bhasmasāt vyadhāt
nirdagdhe kālayavane parivṛtta ānanaḥ nṛpaḥ
nidrā kaṣāya nayanaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣam aikṣata
sa dṛṣṭvā mandara ākāraḥ kṛṣṇam ati alpa vigraham
vipulam kāla saṃjñā āsīt atītam jagatīpatiḥ
kaḥ bhavān iti pṛṣṭaḥ mucukundena keśavaḥ
nyavedayat sva vṛttāntam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
yuga trayam gatam jñātvā nidrāyāḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
gulpha pramāṇāḥ dṛṣṭvā ca prajāḥ hrasva tvam āgatāḥ

original: na cakāra matiṃ rājye virase vigataspṛhaḥ // Bhmj_19.1029 //
analyzed: na cakāra matim rājye virase vigata spṛhaḥ
samāneṣu vyatīteṣu śūnyāsu prema bhūmiṣu

original: jīrṇe jagati vicchāye sajane kā ratiḥ satām // Bhmj_19.1030 //
analyzed: jīrṇe jagati vicchāye sa jane kā ratiḥ satām
sa gatvā tapase dhīmān kandaram himabhūbhṛtaḥ

original: āruroha nṛpaḥ svargaṃ svārohaṃ puṇyasaṃpadām // Bhmj_19.1031 //
analyzed: āruroha nṛpaḥ svargam su āroham puṇya saṃpadām
kālayavana vadhaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ tha dvārakām gatvā vihitām viśvakarmaṇā
hema pratolī prākārām ratna gopura toraṇām
sphāra sphaṭika harmya aṃśu mālā racita candrikām
amṛta udgāriṇīm kṣīrasāgarāt iva nirmitām
maṇi bhittiṣu saṃkrānta kāntā vadana mālikām
vijajya bahudhā ātmānam śaśāṅkena iva sevitām
viveśa viṣada uddyotām sa anugām
sa sainya dhanam ādāya nikhilam yavana arjitam

original: tasyāṃ porajanaṃ sarvaṃ śaṅkho nāma nidhīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: tasyām pora janam sarvam śaṅkhaḥ nāma nidhi īśvaraḥ
kṛṣṇasya śāsanāt tūrṇam hema ratnaiḥ apūrayat
visṛjya pavanam sākṣāt tridivam devakī sutaḥ

original: ānināya sudharmākhyāṃ divyāṃ devasabhāṃ vibhuḥ // Bhmj_19.1037 //
analyzed: ānināya sudharma ākhyām divyām deva sabhām vibhuḥ
sā purī su bhaṭaiḥ guptā vṛṣṇi sātvata yādavaiḥ
meroḥ iva guhā siṃhaiḥ śuśubhe kānti nirbharā
dattā iva kāle vipule samudreṇa hareḥ girā
aneka yojana āyāmā purī sā abhūt garīyasī
atrā antare bhīṣmakasya dākṣiṇātyasya bhūpateḥ

original: śuśrāva rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣmaḥ kanyāṃ rūpema viśrutām // Bhmj_19.1040 //
analyzed: śuśrāva rukmiṇīm kṛṣmaḥ kanyām rūpema viśrutām
sā api śuśrāva kaṃsārim kṛṣṇam kamala locanam
abhilāṣa rasa udāram kim api āsīt manaḥ tayoḥ
bhīṣmakasya ātmajaḥ rukmī bhuja śālī raṇa utkaṭaḥ

original: vīro bibharti yaḥ spardhāṃ bhuvi bhārgavabhīṣmayoḥ // Bhmj_19.1042 //
analyzed: vīraḥ bibharti yaḥ spardhām bhuvi bhārgava bhīṣmayoḥ

original: anujāṃ rukmiṇīṃ dṛptaḥ sa kṛṣmenārthitāṃ sadā /
analyzed: anujām rukmiṇīm dṛptaḥ sa kṛṣmena arthitām sadā
na dadau kaṃsa dāsaḥ yam iti dveṣāt udāharan
tatas jarāsaṃdha girā śiśupālāya bhūbhuje

original: tāṃ dātumudyayau putrīṃ bhīṣmakaḥ putrasaṃmate // Bhmj_19.1044 //
analyzed: tām dātum udyayau putrīm bhīṣmakaḥ putra saṃmate
vasudeva svasuḥ putraḥ tad purīm
kṛṣṇa ādibhiḥ vṛṣṇi vīraiḥ vārayātrā abhimantritaiḥ
dantavakra jarāsaṃdha mukhyaiḥ ca saha rājabhiḥ
sa vivāha utsave prāyāt bhīṣmakena abhipūjitaḥ
indrāṇī pūjana vyagrām tatra locana candrikām
dadarśa rukmiṇīm kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇa śāra āyata īkṣaṇām
su mukhīm kānti lalitām ātāmra adhara pallavām
lakṣmīm iva saha utpannām candra amṛta suradrumaiḥ
tīm vīkṣya padma vadanām madana udyāna mādhavīm
mādhavaḥ madhu saṃsiktaḥ iva kṣaṇam acintayat
iyam śubhra aṃśuka utphulla phenā kānti taraṅgiṇī
hara huṃkāra dagdhasya jīvatī puṣpadhanvanaḥ
lajjā eva jalaja spardhā prabhā iyam śaśinaḥ kutas

original: upamānaṃ sukhasyāsyāḥ svamukhaṃ darpaṇe yadi // Bhmj_19.1051 //
analyzed: upamānam sukhasya asyāḥ sva mukham darpaṇe yadi
cintayan iti vaikuṇṭhaḥ sa utkaṇṭham manmatha ākulaḥ

original: jahāra saṃmate bhrātuḥ sahasā bhīṣmakātmajām // Bhmj_19.1052 //
analyzed: jahāra saṃmate bhrātuḥ sahasā bhīṣmaka ātmajām
rathena rathinā tena hṛtāyām vāta raṃhasā
udabūt su bhaṭa kṣobha gambhīraḥ bhūbhujām ravaḥ

original: iyaṃ kṛṣṇena kṛṣṇena kanyā kanyā hṛtā hṛtā /
analyzed: iyam kṛṣṇena kṛṣṇena kanyā kanyā hṛtā hṛtā

original: iti vyāharatāmeva rājñāṃ moha ivābhavat // Bhmj_19.1054 //
analyzed: iti vyāharatām eva rājñām mohaḥ iva abhavat
vṛṣṇīnām rāma mukhyānām bhāram vinyasya duḥsaham

original: tārkṣyaketau drutaṃ yāte ghoraṃ yuddhamavartata // Bhmj_19.1055 //
analyzed: tārkṣyaketau drutam yāte ghoram yuddham avartata
rāma sātyaki hārdikya gada akrūra vidūrathaiḥ
vakra deva sunakṣatra sāraṇa ādyaiḥ ca yādavaiḥ
śiśupāla jarāsaṃdha mukhyānām bhūbhujām raṇe
akāla rajanī iva abhūt kṣaṇam nirvivaraiḥ śaraiḥ
balinā baladevena vadhyamāneṣu vairiṣu
śiśupālena ca anyeṣu saṃkṣayaḥ sainyayoḥ abhūt

original: atrāntare puro rājñāṃ skmī krodhāgninā jvalan /
analyzed: atrā antare puras rājñām skmī krodha agninā jvalan
pituḥ ca uvāca saṃnaddhaḥ śvasan nāgaḥ iva āhataḥ
na a hatvā malina ācāram kṛṣṇam durnaya kāriṇam
sva puram samupeṣyāmi vīra vrata paricyutaḥ
iti uktvā ratham āruhya vīraiḥ anugataḥ nṛpaiḥ
java uddhūta patākā agraḥ sa yayau nādayan diśaḥ
dūrāt āyāntam ālokya ratha sthaḥ rukmiṇīsakhaḥ
tasthau hariḥ parāvṛtya karṇa anta ākṛṣṭa kārmukaḥ
tatas śreṇīkṛtaiḥ kṣipram ghanaiḥ kṛṣṇa śilīmukhaiḥ
ācchādyamānāḥ vibabhuḥ bhūpāla kamala ākarāḥ
śauriḥ āpūryamāṇaḥ tha rukmi cāpa cyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
hema puṅkhaiḥ abhūt vyāptaḥ sūrya aṃśubhiḥ iva acalaḥ
akṣayām kṣitipaiḥ kṣiptām dīpta śastra parasparām
bhindānaḥ sāyakaiḥ tūrṇam babhau nṛtyan iva acyutaḥ
tatas kṛṣṇa śaraiḥ kṣipram chinna chatra ratha dhvajāḥ
babhūvuḥ kṛtta kodaṇḍāḥ te khaṇḍita manorathāḥ
divya astra varṣiṇaḥ śauriḥ chitvā sarva āyudhāni atha
rukmiṇaḥ tīvra nārācaiḥ vivyādha hṛdayam tribhiḥ
mūrcchite patite tasmin vidrute rāja maṇḍale
rarakṣa śauriḥ dayayā rukmiṇam rukmiṇī girā
yāte dvāravatīm kṛṣṇe vinivṛtteṣu vṛṣṇiṣu

original: kuṇḍinākhyaṃ puraṃ rukmī praviveśa na lajjayā // Bhmj_19.1069 //
analyzed: kuṇḍina ākhyam puram rukmī praviveśa na lajjayā
pratijñayā parityakta puraḥ sa vidadhe param

original: puraṃ bhojakaṭaṃ nāma mānabhaṅgaṃ vicintayan // Bhmj_19.1070 //
analyzed: puram bhojakaṭam nāma māna bhaṅgam vicintayan
rukmiṇīharaṇam
jaya śriyam iva ādāya śriyam mūrti antara āgatam
bheje vivāha vidhinā rukmiṇīm rukmiṇī priyaḥ
sa tayā puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ phulla undīvaca takṣuṣā
vijahāra sudhā sāra paripūrita mānasaḥ
tasya amajījanat putrān daśa tridaśa saṃnibhān
pradyumna cārudoṣṇā ādyān kanyām cārumatīm tathā
tatas prāpa priyāḥ prema praṇaya udyāna vallarīḥ

original: anyā jagatpatiḥ patnīrmūrtā iva diśo daśa // Bhmj_19.1074 //
analyzed: anyāḥ jagatpatiḥ patnīḥ mūrtāḥ iva diśaḥ daśa

original: kālindī satyabhāmā ca satyā jāmbavatī tathā /
analyzed: kālindī satyabhāmā ca satyā jāmbavatī tathā

original: mitravindā suśīlā ca lakṣmaṇā jālavāsinī // Bhmj_19.1075 //
analyzed: mitravindā suśīlā ca lakṣmaṇā jālavāsinī
sudantā rohiṇī ca iti tāḥ candra vadanāḥ sadā

original: śyāmāḥ śyāmā iva prītyā bhejire śeṣaśāyinam // Bhmj_19.1076 //
analyzed: śyāmāḥ śyāmāḥ iva prītyā bhejire śeṣa śāyinam
sa ṣoḍaśa sahasrāṇi divyānām hariṇīdṛśām
svairam kandarpa līlāsu viśvarūpam siṣevire
tāsu viśvasṛjaḥ tasya lakṣa saṃkhyaḥ bhavat vibhoḥ
nārāyaṇīm candrasenām vaidarbhīm kṛṣṇa nandanaḥ
lebhe svayaṃvare kanyām pradyumnaḥ cāru locanaḥ
tena ajani sutaḥ tasyām aniruddhaḥ smaradyutiḥ
rūpam yasya āyata akṣīṇām dṛś vaśīkaraṇa añjanam
kālena rukmiṇaḥ pautrīm aniruddhaḥ su locanām

original: prāptuṃ yayau rukmavatīṃ saha yādavavṛṣṇibhiḥ // Bhmj_19.1081 //
analyzed: prāptum yayau rukmavatīm saha yādava vṛṣṇibhiḥ
halāyudha pradhāneṣu teṣu tatra sthiteṣu atha
chadma dyūte matiḥ abhūt dākṣiṇātya mahībhujām
te saṃmantrya sabhā āsīnāḥ ratna āsana juṣaḥ nṛpāḥ
kitave cakruḥ āhvānam saṃhatāḥ tālalakṣmaṇaḥ
tasya taiḥ saṃpravṛtte tha dyūte kalaha dohade
paṇeṣu vartamāneṣu mithas kanaka koṭibhiḥ
kṣadraiḥ nikṛtyā anirvyājaḥ rāmaḥ eva sakṛt
tam uvāca ajitaḥ rukmī vihasya akṣān pratolayan
avidyaḥ durbalaḥ ca ayam aho bahu dhanaḥ jitaḥ
tat śrutvā manyu saṃtaptaḥ śvasan kṛṣṇa agrajaḥ vadat
daśa koṭi sahasrāṇi hiraṇyasya paṇaḥ mama

original: ityukto halinā rukmī na kiṃcitpratyuvāca tam // Bhmj_19.1087 //
analyzed: iti uktaḥ halinā rukmī na kiṃcid pratyuvāca tam
nipātiteṣu atha akṣeṣu jitaḥ kṛṣṇa agrajena saḥ
mauna kṛt na jitaḥ smi iti jagāda vyājam āśritaḥ
tena asya jihva vacasā kupite musalāyudhe
uccacāra sphuṭā vāṇī gaganāt aśarīriṇī
rāmeṇa vijitaḥ rukmī kṛtvā abhyupagamaḥ dhiyā

original: pramāṇaṃ hi manovṛttiḥ sarvakāryeṣu dehinām // Bhmj_19.1090 //
analyzed: pramāṇam hi manaḥ vṛttiḥ sarva kāryeṣu dehinām

original: tacchrutvā na jito 'smīti vādinaṃ punareva tam /
analyzed: tat śrutvā na jitaḥ smi iti vādinam punar eva tam
aṣṭāpadena sa āvegam avadhīt musalāyudhaḥ
dantān kaliṅga rājasya nipātya samadaḥ balaḥ
utpāṭya kalabha stambham ādravat kratha kaiśikān
kāla anala dviṣaḥ tasya trāsāt yāteṣu rājasu

original: rukmiṇi kṣmābhṛtāṃ nāthe hate śakraparākrame // Bhmj_19.1093 //
analyzed: rukmiṇi kṣmābhṛtām nāthe hate śakra parākrame
yāteṣu vṛṣṇi vīreṣu śanais sa anuśayeṣu iva
vṛttam nyavedayat sarvam acyutāya acyutāgrajaḥ
tatas vilāpa mukharām rukmiṇīm madhusūdanaḥ
parisāntvya ānata mukham kiṃcid noce halāyudham
rukmi vadhaḥ
evam bhārgava tulyaḥ saḥ avadhyaḥ tridaśaiḥ api

original: hataḥ śeṣāvatāreṇa sa rukmī tālaketunā // Bhmj_19.1096 //
analyzed: hataḥ śeṣa avatāreṇa sa rukmī tālaketunā

original: sāmbo nāma kadācittu jāmbavatyāṃ hareḥ sutaḥ /
analyzed: sāmbaḥ nāma kadācid tu jāmbavatyām hareḥ sutaḥ
duryodhana sutām hartum prayayau hastināpuram
kanyā haraṇa kopena tasmin rāja svayaṃvare
saṃruddhaḥ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa māninā mādhava ātmajaḥ
kruddhaḥ tha tad vimokṣāya svayam etya halāyudha
puram kaurava rājasya tarasā bhaṅktum udyataḥ
prākāra vapre vidadhe halam gaṅgā taṭa unmukham

original: cacāla yena nikhila sahasāṃ hastināpuram // Bhmj_19.1100 //
analyzed: cacāla yena sahasām hastināpuram
puram sa gopura aṭṭālam hala ākarṣaṇa ghūrṇitam

original: gaṅgāyāmudyataṃ kṣeptuṃ jñātvā kruddhaṃ halāyudham // Bhmj_19.1101 //
analyzed: gaṅgāyām udyatam kṣeptum jñātvā kruddham halāyudham

original: duryodhanaḥ svaṃya gatvā praṇipatya prasādya ca /
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ gatvā praṇipatya prasādya ca

original: sāmbaṃ muktvā gadāyuddhe prayayau tasya śiṣyatām // Bhmj_19.1102 //
analyzed: sāmbam muktvā gadā yuddhe prayayau tasya śiṣya tām
iti evam baladevasya balam ati adbhutam vibhoḥ

original: yena nāgāyutaprāṇo bhīmo dorbhyāṃ parājitaḥ // Bhmj_19.1103 //
analyzed: yena nāga ayuta prāṇaḥ bhīmaḥ dorbhyām parājitaḥ
atrā antare bhuvaḥ sūnuḥ narakaḥ nāma dānavaḥ
jahāra sarva ratnāni striyaḥ ca tridivaukasām
aditeḥ kuṇḍala āhārī bhaya dīkṣām cakāra yaḥ

original: yudhi sehe na taṃ kaścitpravṛddhaṃ lokakaṇṭakam // Bhmj_19.1105 //
analyzed: yudhi sehe na tam kaścid pravṛddham lokakaṇṭakam
tatas kadācid vaiḍūrya stambha bhūri prabhām sabhām

original: āsīne vṛṣmibhiḥ sārdhaṃ kṛṣṇe ratnāsanojjvalām // Bhmj_19.1106 //
analyzed: āsīne vṛṣmibhiḥ sārdham kṛṣṇe ratna āsana ujjvalām
adṛśyata sphurat tejaḥ puñjaiḥ piñjaritam nabhaḥ
ravi vāji khura kṣuṇṇa meru hema rajaḥ prabhaiḥ
tad madhye śanakais śrīmān sura indraḥ sphuṭam ābabhau
saḥ vatīrya divaḥ candra dhavala chattra cāmaraḥ
bhūṣaṇa aṃśu vanaiḥ vyāptaḥ śakra cāpa cayaiḥ iva
sahasā abhyutthitaiḥ harṣa vismaya ādara śālibhiḥ
pūjitaḥ vṛṣmibhiḥ kṛṣṇa baladeva āhvaka ādibhiḥ
avatīrya gaja atūrṇam alaṃkṛta mahā āsanaḥ
prītyā vilokayan viṣṇum sahasrākṣaḥ samabhyadhāt
aho su carita ślāghnāḥ dhanyāḥ mādhava vṛṣṇayaḥ

original: udite dṛśyasai yaistvaṃ raviḥ padmākarairiva // Bhmj_19.1112 //
analyzed: udite dṛśyasai yaiḥ tvam raviḥ padma ākaraiḥ iva
kartāram loka kāryāṇām hartāram sura vidviṣām
trailokya upaplava chittyai tvām aham samupāgataḥ

original: jaganti jagatāṃ nātha narako nāma bhūmijaḥ /
analyzed: jaganti jagatām nātha narakaḥ nāma bhūmi jaḥ

original: bādhate kāmagaṃ yasya puraṃ prāgjyotiṣaṃ divi // Bhmj_19.1114 //
analyzed: bādhate kāma gam yasya puram prāgjyotiṣam divi
devyāḥ divaukasām mātuḥ aditeḥ divya kuṇḍale

original: jahāra tarasā dīpte sa mahādityatejasā // Bhmj_19.1115 //
analyzed: jahāra tarasā dīpte sa mahā āditya tejasā
daityā sura hayagrīva nisunda ākhyāḥ tad āśrayāḥ

original: kṣapayantyakṣayā bhāṃsi mahāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi naḥ // Bhmj_19.1116 //
analyzed: kṣapayanti akṣayāḥ bhāṃsi mahāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi naḥ
tasya andhatamasasya iva nidhane dharaṇībhuvaḥ
kṣamaḥ tvam eva proccaṇḍa cakra sūrya udaya acalaḥ
manorathaḥ iva asmākam ayam tvām pataga īśvaraḥ
prāpayiṣyati yatra asau daityaḥ sva pura saṃśrayaḥ
iti uktvā virate śakre tathā iti ukte murāriṇā
vidyut puñje iva ākāśe garuḍaḥ pratyapadyata
cakra āyudhaḥ samāruhya satyabhāmā sakhaḥ kṣaṇāt
airāvaṇam sura indraḥ ca vyoma mārgeṇa jagmatuḥ

original: nākaṃ nākapatau yāte hariḥ prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram /
analyzed: nākam nākapatau yāte hariḥ prāgjyotiṣam puram
vrajan pāśa sahasrāṇi ṣaḍ chittvā asura mandire
sa bhṛtya amātya tanayam muram hatvā sa bāndhavam
nisundam ca śilā saṃghān vidārya aśani saṃhātān

original: hayagrīvaṃ ca yo varṣasahasraṃ yuyudhe suraiḥ /
analyzed: hayagrīvam ca yaḥ varṣa sahasram yuyudhe suraiḥ
virūpākṣam ca pāpmānam alakāyām sahānugam
madhye lohitagaṅgasya tāram pañcakaram tathā
hatvā prāgjyotiṣa puram samāsādya manojavam

original: aṣṭau lakṣāṇi daityānāṃ niṃjaghāna ghanaujasām // Bhmj_19.1124 //
analyzed: aṣṭau lakṣāṇi daityānām niṃjaghāna ghana ojasām
tatas yuddham abhūt horam
madhuccidaḥ
bhaya dam sarva bhūtānām bhuvana akampanam mahat
atha krakaca dhāreṇa vajranābhena bhāsvatā

original: cakre cakreṇa narakaṃ dvidhā cakrāyudhaḥ krudhā // Bhmj_19.1126 //
analyzed: cakre cakreṇa narakam dvidhā cakrāyudhaḥ krudhā
visphāra bhūdhara ākāre patite bhuvi bhūmije
cakra dhārā anala pluṣṭe tasmin sa pura mandire

original: putraśokākulā devī chatraṃ ca pradadau mahī /
analyzed: putra śoka ākulā devī chatram ca pradadau mahī
tad prajā parirakṣāyai kuṇḍale kaiṭabhadviṣaḥ
tasya atha luṇṭhita aśeṣa sura indra dhanada śriyaḥ
ratna saṃcayam āhṛtya tad purāt niryayau hariḥ
narakeṇa mahat chattram hṛtam yat pāthasām pateḥ
dhārā śata sahasra aṅkam dāśārhaḥ tat jahāra ca
niruddhāḥ tena gandharva sura kinnara kanyakāḥ
ratna śaile vinihitāḥ dadarśa madhusūdanaḥ
maṇi parvatam utpādya tārkṣyaketuḥ nināya tāḥ

original: sa dṛṣṭvā divi deveśaṃ pūjitastena sādaram /
analyzed: sa dṛṣṭvā divi deveśam pūjitaḥ tena sādaram
śacyā saṃmānitām satyabhāmām ālokayan mudā
devīm ca deva jananīm aditim dānava antakaḥ

original: praṇamya saha śakreṇa datvāsyai divyakuṇḍale // Bhmj_19.1134 //
analyzed: praṇamya saha śakreṇa da tvā asyai divya kuṇḍale
dadarśa nandana uttaṃsam sarva kāma pradam sadā
pārijātam sudhā jātam abhijātam iva īśvaram
tam dṛṣṭvā nayana ānanda bāndhavam mādhavaḥ svayam
samutpādya jahāra āśu tat ca amanyata bṛtrahā
satyabhāmā sakhaḥ pārijāta yuktaḥ vrajan divi
suparṇa vāhanaḥ saḥ bhūt mūrtaḥ rasaḥ iva adbhutaḥ
vidyādhara vadhū vṛndaiḥ vismaya ānanda nirbharaiḥ

original: muhuḥ sa kautukotkaṇṭhaiḥ pīyamāna ivekṣaṇaiḥ // Bhmj_19.1138 //
analyzed: muhur sa kautuka utkaṇṭhaiḥ pīyamānaḥ iva īkṣaṇaiḥ
dvārakām sa samāsādya visṛjya vihaga īśvaram
bhūyas vicitra saṃskāraiḥ bhūṣitām śakra śāsanāt
ratna antaḥpura saṃbādhām adbhutām viśvakarmaṇā
lola hema latā jālaiḥ maṇi kāñcana śekharaiḥ
bhūdharaiḥ abhitas guptām nirjhara udāra kandaraiḥ
bhūdharaiḥ abhitas purīm vīraḥ pūjitaḥ vṛṣmi yādavaiḥ

original: svasāraṃ madhyagāṃ bhrātrornutvā devīṃ balādhikām // Bhmj_19.1141 //
analyzed: svasāram madhya gām bhrātroḥ nutvā devīm bala adhikām
caritaiḥ vijaya udāraiḥ nāradena stutaḥ svayam
hariṇī hāri netrābhiḥ vijahāra hariḥ ciram
pārijāta haraṇam
pradyumnaḥ yaḥ tu rukmiṇyām ajāyata hareḥ sutaḥ

original: daityena śambarākhyena hṛto yaḥ sūtikālayāt // Bhmj_19.1143 //
analyzed: daityena śambara ākhyena hṛtaḥ yaḥ sūtikālayāt
yaḥ ca ukṣumati daityasya pravṛddhaḥ nagare śiśuḥ
prītyāḥ śanais kṛtaḥ tena sarva māyā astrā pāragaḥ
nijam haraṇa vṛttāntam jñātvā tad vallabhā girā
samam samasta māyā jñam hatvā aṣṭambhām mahā raṇe

original: taṃ kālaśambaraṃ ghoraṃ sābhilāṣāṃ ca tadvadhūm /
analyzed: tam kālaśambaram ghoram sa abhilāṣām ca tad vadhūm

original: vihitaprārthanāṃ kāntaḥ kāntāṃ māyāvatīṃ javāt // Bhmj_19.1146 //
analyzed: vihita prārthanām kāntaḥ kāntām māyāvatīm javāt
hṛtvā gagana mārgeṇa dvārakām abhipatya yaḥ
vavande nirbhara ānandam janakam rukmiṇī sakham
smara avatāraḥ yaḥ śrīmān śambarasya vimohanaḥ

original: sa babhūva paraṃ vīraḥ kārṣṇilokeṣu viśrutaḥ /
analyzed: sa babhūva param vīraḥ kārṣṇi lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
tad tulyāḥ sāmba mukhyāḥ ca vikhyātāḥ mādhava ātmajāḥ
tridaśa spṛhaṇīyām tām āścaryām bhuvi durlabhām
sa putrasya hareḥ bhūpāḥ vibhūtim draṣṭum āyayuḥ
duryodhana pradhānāḥ te nānādeśyāḥ narādhipāḥ
akṣauhiṇībhiḥ vīrāṇām aṣṭādaśabhiḥ āvṛtāḥ
girim raivatakam sarve parivārya sa vismayāḥ
tasthuḥ vivikta ramyāsu dvārakā upānta bhūmiṣu
tatas nirgatya bhagavan sarvaiḥ vṛṣṇi gaṇaiḥ saha
yathākramam hariḥ sarvān pūjayan tān kṣitīśvarān
teṣu siṃhāsana stheṣu bheje ratna āsanam mahat
dhāmnām nidhiḥ iva śrīmān rohaṇa acala śekharam
govindam āliṅgā iva chattra cāmara hāsinī
tam bhūpati sabhā āsīnam draṣṭum abhyetya nāradaḥ
uvāca deva dhanyaḥ tvam āścaryam tridivaukasān
dakṣiṇābhiḥ saha asmi iti pratyukte tena nārade
kim etāt iti papraccha bhūpālāḥ kautuka ākulāḥ
kathyatām iti kṛṣṇena sa ādaram preritaḥ vadat
aham triṣavaṇa snāyī kadācid dyunadī taṭe
avadam kūrmam ālokya dhanyaḥ smi iti adbhuta ākṛtim
saḥ bravīt adbhutā gaṅgā dhanyā vāyā
smadvidhaiḥ śritā

original: dhanyāsīti mayā sāpi pṛṣṭā māṃ pratyabhāṣata // Bhmj_19.1158 //
analyzed: dhanyā asi iti mayā sā api pṛṣṭā mām pratyabhāṣata
dhanyaḥ bdhiḥ adbhutatataraḥ sarvāsām saritā patiḥ

original: pṛṣṭaḥ so 'pi mayā prāha mattaḥ kṣitiriyaṃ varā // Bhmj_19.1159 //
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ saḥ u pi mayā prāha mattaḥ kṣitiḥ iyam varā
sā api uvāca adbhutatarāḥ bhūdharāḥ yaiḥ aham dhṛtā
jagaduḥ te jagatām sraṣṭā padmodbhavaḥ dbhutaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ saḥ u pi avadat vedāḥ sarva āścarya mahattarāḥ

original: de 'pyūcuradbhutā yajñā yeṣāmarthe vayaṃ sthitāḥ // Bhmj_19.1161 //
analyzed: de pi ūcuḥ adbhutāḥ yajñāḥ yeṣām arthe vayam sthitāḥ
te pi ūcire mayā pṛṣṭāḥ gatiḥ naḥ viṣṇuḥ adbhutaḥ

original: satyaḥ sanātanaḥ puṇyo yaḥ sarvahutamaśnute // Bhmj_19.1162 //
analyzed: satyaḥ sanātanaḥ puṇyaḥ yaḥ sarva hutam aśnute
etat śrutvā mayā abhyetya kṛṣṇaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ ati kautukāt
dakṣiṇābhiḥ saha asmi iti vibhuḥ mām etat uktavān
iti uktvā nārade yāte vismite rāja maṇḍale

original: gate saṃprāptasatkāre viveśa svapuraṃ hariḥ // Bhmj_19.1164 //
analyzed: gate saṃprāpta satkāre viveśa sva puram hariḥ
āścaryaparva
kadācid vipūle yajñe dīkṣitaḥ keśavaḥ svayam
trāyasva iti arthitaḥ bhyetya duḥkhitena dvijanmanā

original: brūhi kiṃ te bhayamiti brāhmaṇaḥ śauriṇoditaḥ /
analyzed: brūhi kim te bhayam iti brāhmaṇaḥ śauriṇā uditaḥ

original: uvāca bhāgyahīnasya jātā jātāḥ sutāstrayaḥ // Bhmj_19.1166 //
analyzed: uvāca bhāgya hīnasya jātāḥ jātāḥ sutāḥ trayaḥ

original: hṛtāḥ kenāpi bhūtena caturthaṃ parirakṣa me /
analyzed: hṛtāḥ kena api bhūtena caturtham parirakṣa me
jāyāyāḥ sūti kālaḥ yam mama iti ukte dvijanmanā
tad rakṣāyai dadau viṣṇuḥ vṛṣṇi vīraiḥ saha arjunam
gāṇḍīvadhanvā saṃprāpya brāhmaṇa āvasatham kṣaṇāt
diśaḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ āvṛtya tasthau rakṣā kṛtakṣaṇaḥ
tatas ūrdharātre sūtāyām bāhmaṇyām durnimittavān

original: hṛto hṛtaḥ suta iti prādurāsījjanasvanaḥ // Bhmj_19.1169 //
analyzed: hṛtaḥ hṛtaḥ sutaḥ iti prādurāsīt jana svanaḥ
strīṇām ārta svanam śrutvā bālasya karuma svanam
pārtha sātyaki mukhyāḥ te sāyakaiḥ svam apūrayan
teṣu mogha śrameṣu eva dhikkṛteṣu dvijanmanā
lajjiteṣu prayāteṣu śrutvā tad vṛttam acyutaḥ
śaibya sugrīva yuktena rathena arjuna sārathiḥ
datta vartmā samudreṇa pratasthe garuḍadhvajaḥ
stabdha toyam samuttīrya sāgaram sa manojavaḥ
praṇataiḥ meru kailāsa mukhyaiḥ datta antaraḥ pathi
punar cakreṇa timiram samutpāṭya śilā ghanam

original: āsādya vimalaṃ vyoma tejaḥ puruṣavigraham // Bhmj_19.1174 //
analyzed: āsādya vimalam vyoma tejaḥ puruṣa vigraham

original: avicchinnaṃ jagadvyāpi dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā ca taṃ ratham /
analyzed: avicchinnam jagat vyāpi dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā ca tam ratham
praviśya arka sahasra ābham muhūrtāt niryayau hariḥ
tatas eva samādāya dadau putra catuṣṭayam
sa harṣa vismaya āpūrṇa hṛdayāya dvijanmane
dvārakām atha saṃprāptaḥ kaiṭabhāriḥ kirīṭinā
pṛṣṭaḥ tat adbhūtataram provāca āścarya sāgaraḥ
te śailāḥ tat ca timiram tejaḥ tat ca ati bhāskaram
aham eva jagat janma sthiti saṃhāra kāraṇam
tejaḥ mayena te tena mad samāgama kāṅkṣiṇā

original: brāhmaṇasya hṛtāḥ putrā vitīrṇāśca mahātmanā // Bhmj_19.1179 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya hṛtāḥ putrāḥ vitīrṇāḥ ca mahātmanā
vāsudeva māhātmyam
atra antare baḍeḥ ḍeḥ
sūnuḥ bāṇaḥ nāma mahā asuraḥ

original: jahāra surasaṃghānāṃ tejāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi ca // Bhmj_19.1180 //
analyzed: jahāra sura saṃghānām tejāṃsi ca yaśāṃsi ca
tatas prasannaḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ bhakta jana priyaḥ

original: āsthāne yasya sa gaṇaḥ sabhyatāṃ satataṃ yayau // Bhmj_19.1181 //
analyzed: āsthāne yasya sa gaṇaḥ sabhya tām satatam yayau
yaḥ sahasra bhuja stambha stambhita amara vikramaḥ
trivikramasya api anayat prāptam vāmana tām yaśaḥ
sa vīraḥ samara ākāṅkṣī kadācid tripurāntakam
papraccha vijita aśeṣaḥ praṇaya āvarjita añjaliḥ
cira vismṛta saṃgrāmaḥ prārthaye bhagavan yudhi
amīṣām bhuja daṇḍānām raṇa kaṇḍūti khaṇḍanam
tam vihasya abravīt devaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ bhuja ucitaḥ

original: bhavitā tava saṃgrāmaḥ ketubhaṅgena sūcitaḥ // Bhmj_19.1185 //
analyzed: bhavitā tava saṃgrāmaḥ ketu bhaṅgena sūcitaḥ
śrutvā etat sāhasam harṣa nirbharaḥ bhūri vikramaḥ

original: bāṇaḥ svabhavanaṃ gatvā mantriṇe tannyavedayat // Bhmj_19.1186 //
analyzed: bāṇaḥ sva bhavanam gatvā mantriṇe tat nyavedayat
tam uvāca atha kumbhāṇḍaḥ mantrī matimatām varaḥ
aho nu phala śūnyaḥ yam rājan yuddha ādaraḥ tava
trailokya lakṣmīḥ saṃprāptā jitāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ

original: kiṃ yuddhena pravṛddhānāmapi lolau jayājayau // Bhmj_19.1188 //
analyzed: kim yuddhena pravṛddhānām api lolau jaya ajayau

original: iti vādini kumbhāṇḍe bāṇe ca samarotsuke /
analyzed: iti vādini kumbhāṇḍe bāṇe ca samara utsuke
dhvajaḥ papāta daitya śrī krīḍā śailaḥ iva ucchritaḥ
ketau nipatite tasmin dānava kṣaya śaṃsini
ghoreṣu durnimitteṣu prādurbhūteṣu sarvatas
praharṣa vivaśe bāṇe pāna krīḍā vilāsini
naya cakṣuṣi kumbhāṇḍe cintā saṃtāpita āśaye
kadācid bāṇanagare sarva ṛtu kusume vane
vijahāra acalasutā sakhaḥ candra ṛdha śekharaḥ
gīta nṛtya kalā lola gandharva apsarasām gaṇaiḥ
sevyamānasya saṃbhoga vibhramaḥ śuśubhe vibhoḥ
hāsāya citralekhā ākhyā tatra devavilāsinī
nāṭyam cakāra vidhivat sevitum pārvatīpatim
narma krīḍā vinodena parihāsa viḍambanaiḥ
apsaraḥ vihitaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ jahāsa bhava vallabhā
tatra uṣā nāma bāṇasya kanyā kuvalaya īkṣaṇā
dadarśa śivayoḥ krīḍā vilāsam amara utsavam

original: tāṃ vīkṣya sādarāṃ devī babhāṣe lalitānanām /
analyzed: tām vīkṣya sa ādarām devī babhāṣe lalita ānanām

original: uṣe tvamapi kāntena kelisaktā bhaviṣyasi // Bhmj_19.1197 //
analyzed: uṣe tvam api kāntena keli saktā bhaviṣyasi

original: vaiśākhe harmyasaktāyā dvādaśyāṃ niśi yena te /
analyzed: vaiśākhe harmya saktāyāḥ dvādaśyām niśi yena te

original: bhavitā saṃgamaḥ svapne sa te prāgjātivallabhaḥ // Bhmj_19.1198 //
analyzed: bhavitā saṃgamaḥ svapne sa te prāc jāti vallabhaḥ
iti uktā bāṇa tanayā bhavānyā bhakti śālinī
jagāma antaḥpuram harṣa vyākośa nayana utpalā
kim etat iti pṛṣṭā iva śiñjāna maṇi bhūṣaṇaiḥ
tām sa utkampa kaca nyasta hastām lajjā nata ānanām
papraccha citralekhā ākhyā kumbhāṇḍa duhitā sakhī

original: kutaste bhayamutpannaṃ kiṃ lateva prakampase // Bhmj_19.1201 //
analyzed: kutas te bhayam utpannam kim latā iva prakampase
tanayā hi asi bāṇasya jambhāri bhaya kāriṇaḥ

original: ityuṣā sahasā sakhyā pṛṣṭā tāṃ pratyabhāṣata // Bhmj_19.1202 //
analyzed: iti uṣā sahasā sakhyā pṛṣṭā tām pratyabhāṣata
muka indau lāñchana chāyām kurvāṇām añjana asrubhiḥ

original: kathaṃ nu dūṣitā nāma pūjyāsi janamāninī // Bhmj_19.1203 //
analyzed: katham nu dūṣitā nāma pūjyā asi jana māninī
utsahe jīvitam jātu kalaṅkita kulā satī
iti pralāpa mukharām sakhīm tām avadat mudā
svapna saṅgena dūṣyante na mugdhe kula yoṣitaḥ

original: kiṃ na smarasi yadgauryā sūcitaṃ kelikānane /
analyzed: kim na smarasi yat gauryā sūcitam keli kānane

original: svapne hṛdayacauraste bhavitā bhīru vallabhaḥ // Bhmj_19.1205 //
analyzed: svapne hṛdaya cauraḥ te bhavitā bhīru vallabhaḥ
iti saṃsmāritā svairam sahasā citralekhayā
pradadhyau valalbham harṣāt manasā amṛta dīdhitim
abhilāṣa rasaḥ tasyāḥ navaḥ vyavardhata

original: sahasā yena jajvāla prabalo manmathānalaḥ // Bhmj_19.1207 //
analyzed: sahasā yena jajvāla prabalaḥ manmatha analaḥ
tām vīkṣya saṃtata ucchvāsa dhūsara adhara pallavām
latām iva ātapa klāntām citralekhā vadat sakhīm
sakhi kaḥ yam an ālekhya citratra kautuka vibhramaḥ
svapna dṛṣṭa jane rāgaḥ sva puṣpa uttaṃsa śekharaḥ
darpaṇa pratimā lābhaḥ tārakā candra yācanam

original: hevākaḥ svapnadṛṣṭe ca bāle bālamanorathaḥ // Bhmj_19.1210 //
analyzed: hevākaḥ svapna dṛṣṭe ca bāle bāla manorathaḥ

original: na jānīmaḥ sa kaḥ kvāste kathaṃ vā kena labhyate /
analyzed: na jānīmaḥ sa kaḥ kva āste katham vā kena labhyate

original: avaśyameva bhavitā svayaṃ te tatsamāgamaḥ // Bhmj_19.1211 //
analyzed: avaśyam eva bhavitā svayam te tad samāgamaḥ
athavā sura gandharva kinnara uraga rakṣasām
vapūṃṣi bhūmipānām ca trailokya antara vartinām
paṭa ante nirviśeṣāṇi likhitvā sakhi māyayā

original: darśayāmi tava kṣipraṃ tato jānīhi vallabham // Bhmj_19.1213 //
analyzed: darśayāmi tava kṣipram tatas jānīhi vallabham
iti uktvā sapta rātreṇa likhitvā sakalān paṭe
acitrayat citralekhā sakhyāḥ sarva anukāriṇī
citra paṭṭa gatān vīkṣya sura bhogi nṛ mānuṣān
dadarśa vṛṣṇi vīrāṇām madhye govinda sundaram
aniruddham tam ālokya vismaya ānanda nirbharā

original: uṣā babhāṣe kaumāravratacauro mamaiṣa saḥ // Bhmj_19.1216 //
analyzed: uṣāḥ babhāṣe kaumāra vrata cauraḥ mama eṣa saḥ
sakhi prājya bhujaḥ kāntaḥ kaḥ yam kamala locanaḥ

original: prasahyāpahṛtaṃ yena dhairyaṃ me manasā saha // Bhmj_19.1217 //
analyzed: prasahya apahṛtam yena dhairyam me manasā saha
citralekhā niśamya etat uvāca rucira smitā

original: ayaṃ sakhi murārāteḥ kṛṣṇasya tanayātmajaḥ // Bhmj_19.1218 //
analyzed: ayam sakhi murārāteḥ kṛṣṇasya tanaya ātmajaḥ
vīraḥ niruddhaḥ te devī ādiṣṭaḥ hṛdaya vallabhaḥ

original: svapne tvāṃ ratimanveṣṭuṃ nūnaṃ kāmo 'yamāgataḥ // Bhmj_19.1219 //
analyzed: svapne tvām ratim anveṣṭum nūnam kāmaḥ yam āgataḥ
vismitaiḥ vikrameṇa asya saṃgrāmeṣu sura asuraiḥ
kharvīkriyante su bhaṭāḥ sa bāndhava manorathāḥ
śrutvā etat manmatha āviṣṭā pratimā nyasta locanā
uṣāḥ vadat vinā kāntam na aham jīvitum utsahe

original: yadi ter'tho mama prāṇairyadi te 'haṃ priyā sakhī /
analyzed: yadi mama prāṇaiḥ yadi te ham priyā sakhī

original: tadanena kuru kṣipraṃ kāntena mama saṃgamam // Bhmj_19.1222 //
analyzed: tat anena kuru kṣipram kāntena mama saṃgamam
iti bruvāṇām asakṛt citralekhā jagāda tām
pituḥ te śoṇitapuram yathā su bhaṭa rakṣitam
tathā eva dvārakā vīraiḥ vṛṣṇibiḥ paripālitā
āgamyā ca parasya api vikaṭa aṭṭāla mālinī

original: tataḥ sakhi kathaṃ nāma vīraṃ te jīviteśvaram /
analyzed: tatas sakhi katham nāma vīram te jīvita īśvaram
prasahya āhartum abalā janaḥ jātu pragalbhate
tathā api tvad priyāya eṣām gacchāmi gagane

original: siddhistu devyaivādiṣṭā tvadbhāgyeṣu sakhi sthitā // Bhmj_19.1226 //
analyzed: siddhiḥ tu devyā eva ādiṣṭā tvad bhāgyeṣu sakhi sthitā
iti uktvā kham viveśa āśu sā ratna ābharaṇa aṃśubhiḥ
ghana śrīḥ iva kurvāṇā śakra cāpa citāḥ diśaḥ
muhūrte bāṇa nagarāt tṛtīye sā gatā javāt

original: kṣaṇena dvārakāṃ prāpa kāntyā kailāsahāsinīm // Bhmj_19.1228 //
analyzed: kṣaṇena dvārakām prāpa kāntyā kailāsa hāsinīm
tatra uru ratna valalakṣī prabhā prodbhāsita ambaram
aniruddhasya bhavanam viveśa alakṣita ākṛtiḥ
tatra bāla mṛga akṣībhiḥ kāntābhiḥ parivāritam
aniruddham manaḥ janma līlā lalita ceṣṭitam
dadarśa snigdha lalanā kaṭākṣa śabala dyutim
rati karṇa utpala āghāta lagna chadami vasmaran
aṅganā āliṅgana ālīna stana pattra latā aṅkitam
dhammilla kusumaiḥ vyāptam pārijātam iva aparam
tam vīkṣya vikrama udāram śṛṅgāra lalita ākṛtim
acintayat citralekhā muhūrtam jāta sādhvasā
aho bata mahatī asmin udyātā aham sa saṃśaye

original: kārye priyasakhīprītyā premṇi vā kiṃ vicintyate // Bhmj_19.1234 //
analyzed: kārye priya sakhī prītyā premṇi vā kim vicintyate

original: iti dhyātvā muhurvīrā sā tamovidyayā puraḥ /
analyzed: iti dhyātvā muhur vīrā sā tamaḥ vidyayā puras
ācchādya strī gaṇam sarvam praprā
dyumnamni
manayat kṣaṇāt
saṃkalpa śaktiḥ iva sā māyayā kṣipra gāminī

original: praviśya śoṇitapuraṃ harmyasthāṃ prayayau sakhīm // Bhmj_19.1236 //
analyzed: praviśya śoṇitapuram harmya sthām prayayau sakhīm
uṣā api vallabha avāpti manoratha śata ākulā

original: sahasā dayitaṃ vīkṣya sakhyātītaṃ vihāyasā // Bhmj_19.1237 //
analyzed: sahasā dayitam vīkṣya sakhyā atītam vihāyasā
pīyūṣa plāvitā iva āśu harṣa lajjā bhaya ākulā

original: kiṃ karomīti saṃbhrāntā kampamānā lateva sā // Bhmj_19.1238 //
analyzed: kim karomi iti saṃbhrāntā kampamānā latā iva sā
anirvācya daśām yātā śiñjāna maṇi bhūṣaṇā

original: prahṛṣṭā sā tamādāya dayitaṃ guhyamandiram // Bhmj_19.1239 //
analyzed: prahṛṣṭā sā tam ādāya dayitam guhya mandiram
viveśa jana saṃcāra bhītā tarala locanā

original: srastayā bāṇabhītyeva tyaktā mekhalayā svayam // Bhmj_19.1240 //
analyzed: srastayā bāṇa bhītyā iva tyaktā mekhalayā svayam
tatra su sphāra mandāra śekharam lola kuṇḍalam
tāra tārā āvalī cāru hāram tārādhipa prabham
śṛṅgāra dīkṣā guruṇā tena sa aṅga smara tviṣā
uṣā sasmāra saṃbhoga saubhāgya vibhavam rateḥ
śṛṅgāra dīkṣā guruṇā tena sa aṅga smara tviṣā
uṣā sasmāra saṃbhoga asaubhāgya vibhavam rateḥ

original: aniruddho 'pi tāṃ prāpya vallabhāṃ bhuvi durlabhām /
analyzed: aniruddhaḥ pi tām prāpya vallabhām bhuvi durlabhām
mene bhājanam ātmānam smara sāmrajya saṃpadām
ramamāṇaḥ tayā gūḍham tatra pradyumna saṃbhavaḥ
lakṣaṇaiḥ bahubhiḥ jñātaḥ kanyā antaḥpura rakṣibhiḥ
tanayā dūṣaṇa ruṣā nirdiṣṭā bali sūnunā

original: bāṇena kiṃkarā ghorāḥ prādyumniṃ hantumāyayuḥ // Bhmj_19.1246 //
analyzed: bāṇena kiṃkarāḥ ghorāḥ prādyumnim hantum āyayuḥ
daṃṣṭrā vikaṭa vaktra ugra baddha bhrukuṭi bhīṣaṇān
vīraḥ niruddhaḥ tān dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṭa ghora asi kārmukān
utthāya samara ārambha niḥsaṃrambha parākramaḥ
utthāya dvāra parigham mṛgān siṃhaḥ iva adravat
kāntā kaṭākṣa dṛṣṭasya śaurya nidheḥ vapuḥ
vīra śṛṅgāra rabhasam babhau manmatha rūpiṇaḥ
śastra vṛṣṭim tad utsṛṣṭām puṣpa mālām iva urasā
ādāya dānava bhaṭān jaghāna ghana niḥsvanaḥ
te tad prahāra abhihatāḥ bhagna bhīṣaṇa vigrahāḥ

original: hataśeṣā yayurbhītā yatra bāṇo raṇotkaṭaḥ // Bhmj_19.1251 //
analyzed: hata śeṣāḥ yayuḥ bhītāḥ yatra bāṇaḥ raṇa utkaṭaḥ
puraṃdara pura dhvaṃsa sākṣiṇām kaḥ yam āgataḥ
saṃbhramaḥ kopa saṃmoha janakaḥ kātara ucitaḥ
kriyatām ādara śaurye yaśaḥ kusuma mādhave
trāsaḥ yam abhimāna adri vajra pātaḥ hi duḥsahaḥ

original: vacobhiriti vīrāṇāṃ te bāṇasya ca śāsanāt /
analyzed: vacobhiḥ iti vīrāṇām te bāṇasya ca śāsanāt
aniruddham su mahatā sainyena punar ādravan
āmukta hema kavacaiḥ pradīpta vividha āyudhaiḥ
niśi dīpta oṣadhi vanaiḥ giri indraiḥ iva jaṅgamaiḥ
yuyudhe yudhi saṃrabdhaiḥ cakrāyudha suta ātmajaḥ
sa utkampa kuca vinyasta hastām ālokyan priyām

original: ādāya tatsamutsṛṣṭaṃ khaḍgaṃ carma ca bhāsvaram /
analyzed: ādāya tat samutsṛṣṭam khaḍgam carma ca bhāsvaram

original: maṇḍalāni caranvīraḥ sa cakarta raṇe ripūn // Bhmj_19.1257 //
analyzed: maṇḍalāni caran vīraḥ sa cakarta raṇe ripūn
tena kṛtta śiraḥ skandha bhuja jānu kara udarāḥ
petuḥ mahā ghanāḥ kalpa vātena unmathitāḥ iva
vidrute dānava anīke bhagna syandana kuñjare
nivartita bala ambhodhiḥ bāṇaḥ svayam adṛśyata
kumbhāṇḍa āhita valgena sahasrāśvena bhāsvatā
rathena bhīma nādena sahasra aśvena bhāśvatā
rathena bhīma nādena yuktaḥ tridaśa mardinā
dos sahasra samudbhrānta dīpta āyudha vara utkaṭaḥ
phaṇa ratna ugra bhujaga vyāpta śṛṅgaḥ iva acalaḥ
mukuṭena arka varṇena ratna jvālā jaṭā juṣā
tarjayan iva tejāṃsi sita paṭṭa aṭṭahāsinā
mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala uccaṇḍa kuṇḍala udagra varcasā
bhrū bhaṅga bhīma vaktreṇa saṃtrāsita jagattrayaḥ
visphāra nirjhara udgāre iva nīla dharādharaḥ
uttapta kāñcana chāya śmaśru keśa vibhūṣaṇaḥ
krodha nirghṛṣṭa danta agra jāta jvālaḥ iva āditas
garjantam tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti pralaya ambhoja niḥsvanam
tam āpatantam ālokya prādyumniḥ na vyakampata
bāṇa bāhu vana unmuktaiḥ bāṇa jālaiḥ nirantaraiḥ
chādita ūrkaḥ iva ambhodaiḥ nirvibhāgaiḥ babhūva saḥ
tayoḥ hari haraṇya akṣaraṇa smaraṇa hetu tām
bhuvana ākampana ākampam agamat yuddham uddhatam
aniruddhaḥ tha khaḍgena bāṇa bāṇa paramparām
chittvā asya laghu saṃcārī ciccheda ratha kūbaram
jvālā ākulām tatas śaktim śoṇa paṭṭaṅkitām iva
cikṣepa dānava patiḥ tasmai bhogi vadhūm iva
hastena kāla daṃṣṭra ābhām tām eva ādāya dhairya bhūḥ
prāhiṇot dānava indrāya dāśārhe dbhuta vikramaḥ

original: bāṇasya bhittvā sā dehaṃ viveśa dharaṇītalam /
analyzed: bāṇasya bhittvā sā deham viveśa dharaṇī talam

original: śaktyā vidāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā kumbhāṇḍo bāṇamabravīt // Bhmj_19.1272 //
analyzed: śaktyā vidāritam dṛṣṭvā kumbhāṇḍaḥ bāṇam abravīt
māyām āśritya yudhyasva durjayaḥ yam upekṣitaḥ
niḥsaṃśaya jaya avāptiḥ dyute yuddhe ca māyinām
iti kumbhāṇḍa vacasā bāṇaḥ māyām vimohanīm
ādāya tāmasīm ghorām sahasā antaradhīyata
adṛśyaḥ sa mahābhāgaiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhujaga vigrahaiḥ
nabhaḥ gataḥ tam vidadhe viṣṭita aṅgam viṣa ulbaṇaiḥ
ruphurat phaṇāmaṇi jvālā jvalitaiḥ veṣṭitaḥ hibhiḥ
sa babhau śabala chāyaḥ candana druma vibhramaḥ
nāgapāśa niruddhasya dhairya niṣkampa cetasaḥ
aniruddhasya vidadhe vadhe daitya patiḥ matim
