mahā prabhāvaḥ kaḥ pi eṣa na ajñātaḥ vadham arhati

original: iti kumbhāṇḍavacasā virarāma baḍeḥ(leḥ) sutaḥ // Bhmj_19.1278 //
analyzed: iti kumbhāṇḍa vacasā virarāma sutaḥ
atrā antare dvārakāyām tāram antaḥpura udare
hṛtaḥ niruddhaḥ kena api proccacāra iti niḥsvanaḥ
muhur vimoha vivaśāḥ tatra trastāḥ mṛgī dṛśaḥ
aniruddhasya dayitāḥ śuśucuḥ śoka vihvalāḥ
atha vṛṣṇi pravīrāṇām kaiṭabhāri sabhā antare
bherī nināda hūtānām samājaḥ su mahān abhūt
tatas nivāta niṣkampa sapta sāgara saṃnibham
dadṛśuḥ sa aśru netrāḥ te cintā stimitam acyutam
śoka moha viṣa ākrānte mūke yādava maṇḍale
uvāca vipṛthuḥ dhīmān viṣṇum jiṣṇum suradviṣām
kaḥ yam tava api bhagavan bhuvana abhaya dāyinaḥ
na hi nāma mahā ambhodhi gambhīra udāra cetasām
bhavanti sukha duḥkheṣu harṣa śoka pariplavāḥ
yadi deva tvam api evam cintā saṃtāpito cyutaḥ

original: tadidānāṃ nirālambā dhairyasya skhalitā gatiḥ // Bhmj_19.1286 //
analyzed: tat idānīm nirālambā dhairyasya skhalitā gatiḥ
trailokya rakṣām nikṣipya tvad bhuje jambhasūdanaḥ
śete śacī kuca ābhoga sabhoga ānanda nirvṛtaḥ
iti tena uktam ākarṇya kṛṣṇaḥ gambhīra mantharam
samādadhe giram vairi yaśaḥ haṃsa kula ambudaḥ
para avajñā nikāreṇa karoti hṛdaye padam
cintā abhī māninām satyam avidyā iva śarīriṇām
ayam yadu kulasya adya kena api utsikta cetasā
pātitaḥ caraṇaḥ mūrdhni rathyā paṅka pariplutaḥ
aniruddhe hṛte yātaḥ puromanye mahībhujām
upahāsa kathā mātra pātra tām naḥ parākramaḥ
avijñātena vihite nikāre smin vidāraṇe
kim kurmaḥ kopa tulya ugra daṇḍaiḥ gagana tāḍanam
cārāḥ carantu sarvatra bāhya abhyantara cāriṇaḥ
āhukasya ājñayā tūrṇam aniruddha upalabdhaye
iti ukte kaṃsa ripuṇā devarṣiḥ tatra nāradaḥ
adṛśyata nidhiḥ dhāmnām kali keli viśāradaḥ
sa cintā stimitam dṛṣṭvā jagannātham acintayat
aho nu bāla śaphara utphālena ākulitaḥ mbudhiḥ
iti ākalayataḥ tasya pādya āsana puras sarām
pūjām janārdanaḥ cakre pūjitaḥ saḥ u pi abhāṣata

original: aho bata vimoho vaḥ pratipakṣaḥ parākrame /
analyzed: aho bata vimohaḥ vaḥ pratipakṣaḥ parākrame
lakṣyate yena jānīdhvam aniruddhasya ceṣṭitam
aniruddhasya bāṇena balinā bali sūnunā
vṛttaḥ pravṛtta śastra astra bhairavaḥ samara utsavaḥ
kṛṣṇa pautraḥ niruddhaḥ te hṛtaḥ daitya indra kanyayā

original: manye muhyati yāṃ dṛṣṭvā smaro 'pi smarapīḍitaḥ // Bhmj_19.1299 //
analyzed: manye muhyati yām dṛṣṭvā smaraḥ u pi smara pīḍitaḥ
sahasra bāhoḥ bāṇasya bali sūnoḥ suradviṣaḥ

original: uṣā nāmāmbujākṣī sā lāvaṇyanalinī sutā // Bhmj_19.1300 //
analyzed: uṣā nāma ambuja akṣī sā lāvaṇyanalinī sutā
sa svaira kāmukam putryāḥ jñātvā hṛdaya nandanam

original: dṛṣṭvā ca durjayaṃ yuddhe babandha phaṇimaṇḍalaiḥ // Bhmj_19.1301 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā ca durjayam yuddhe babandha phaṇi maṇḍalaiḥ
tat itas śoṇitapuram bāṇasya gagana agra gam

original: gantavyaṃ bhavatā yoddhuṃ sāmasādhyā na dānavāḥ // Bhmj_19.1302 //
analyzed: gantavyam bhavatā yoddhum sāma sādhyāḥ na dānavāḥ
amartya bhūmiḥ durlaṅghyā tārkṣyam āruhya gamyatām
yasyām tridaśa hṛd bāṇaḥ bāṇaḥ nāma aśaniḥ dviṣām
uktvā iti yāte devarṣau madhusūdanaḥ
harṣa vismaya kopānām tulyām prāpa vidheya tām
tatas pradadhyau bhagavān garuḍam garuḍadhvajaḥ

original: sa ca dhyātor'kalaṃkṣābhaḥ sahasā pratyadṛśyata // Bhmj_19.1305 //
analyzed: sa ca sahasā pratyadṛśyata
tam āruroha viśvātmā harmya ārohaṇa līlayā
sa babhau viṣada śyāmaḥ kaustubha ābharaṇaḥ vibhuḥ
madhya avatīrṇa sūryasya nabhasaḥ bhibhavan prabhām
catur bhujasya vibhabhuḥ tasya prājya bhuja drumāḥ
cakra prabhā pallavitāḥ pāñcajanya aṃśu puṣpitāḥ
vrajan sa pavana uddhūta pīta ambara manoharaḥ
tārkṣya pakṣa prabā cakraiḥ cakre hema prabham nabhaḥ
sarva ābharaṇa ratnoṣu bimbitaiḥ kautuka āgataiḥ
siṣeve vyoma taṭa nīvartita uṣṇīṣa pallavaiḥ
sura vidyādhara vadhū pāṇi padma vana ujjhitaiḥ
mandāra vṛndaiḥ abhavan tasya sragdāma vibhramāḥ
ruddhaḥ niruddhaḥ samare yadā vīraḥ saha uṣayā
bhujaṅga pāśaiḥ sva pure bāṇena bala śālinā

original: durgasaṃtāriṇīṃ durgāṃ tadā sa śaraṇaṃ gataḥ /
analyzed: durga saṃtāriṇīm durgām tadā sa śaraṇam gataḥ
mahendra upendra bhaginīm divyaiḥ tuṣṭāva nāmabhiḥ
naumi kaṃsa asura aiśvarya tamaḥ paṭala candrikām
pūrṇa candra ānanām devīm duṣṭa saṃmohana kṣamām
dīpta śūla prabhā jāla bhīṣaṇām lalita ākṛtim
vellat viṣa ulbaṇa vyālām iva candana vallarīm
mahiṣa nyasta caraṇām śyāmām hāra vibhūṣitām
sa kāliya hradām phena hāsinīm yamunām iva
pāṇi saṃsakta bhujaga ābhoga nīla asi vallarīm
eka padma udara udgacchat ali mālām iva abjinīm
mayūra pakṣa ābharaṇaiḥ śabalaiḥ mecaka prabhaiḥ
sevitām prāvṛṣam iva sphurat indrāyudhaiḥ ghanaiḥ
karāla keśa visphāra śuddha saṃcāra lālasām
himādri śikhara udbhūtām kālāguru latām iva
kavi indra mānasa āvāsa rājahaṃsīm sarasvatīm
vicitra madhura udāra śabdām cāru pada kramām
saṃsāra maru saṃtāpa nirvāpaṇa samudyatām
raṇa saṃrambha saṃbhāra gambhīra ārambha vibhramām
niśumbha śumbha āravaṣṭambha bhīta saṃbhāvita amarām
saṃdhyām avandhyām vindhya adri vāsinīm vāsava anujām
śaśi khaṇḍa śikhaṇḍa aṅkām muṇḍa maṇḍala maṇḍitām
phulla utpala vana śyāmām phulla utpala vilocanām
gambhīra nābhi kuharām ibha kumbha nibha stanīm
dhanyām kātyāyanīm caṇḍām cāmuṇḍām khaṇḍita ahitām
śarvāṇīm śarvarīm śarvām siddha gandharva sevitām
kāla saṃkarṣiṇīm ghorām trijagat grāma lālasām
kamalāsana kaṅkāla mālā kalita śekharām
śivām śiva pradām śāntām śiva kāntām śata ānanām
tri netrām saumya vadanām madana ari mada prabhām
sphīta phena sudhā ambhodhi dukūlām ratna mekhalām
kara ākalita hemādri mātulaṅga aṃśu piṅgalām
akṣasūtra kṛta āvṛtta nakṣatra maṇi mālikām
pāṇi sakta sudhā ambhodhi pūrṇa brahmāṇḍa karparām
śeṣa ādi kula bhogi indra hāra keyūra kaṅkaṇām
tārakā mauktika smera śaśi mārtaṇḍa maṇḍalām
triśṛṅga ratna śailendra viṭaṅka mukuṭa ujjvalām
kallola losvar sindhu dhavala uṣṇīṣa bhūṣitām
sa indrāyudha kṣaya ambhoda māyūra chattra vibhramām
kanda agra kuṇḍalita nābhi mṛṇāla daṇḍa hṛd puṇḍarīka nibiḍa amṛta pāna śauṇḍām
bhṛṅga aṅganām iva sadā udita nāda śakti saṃvedya vedya jananīm jananīm prapadye
durgā stotram
iti stutā bhagavatī bhaktyā pradyumna sūnunā
sāṃnidhyam akarot sākṣāt durga daśa bhujā puras
bhujaṅga pañjaram ghoram pāṇinā kamala tviṣā
durbhedyam sphoṭayitvā asya vajra prākāra saṃnibham
nija tejobhiḥ abhitas sphītaiḥ anusṛtāḥ muhur
āyūṃṣi ditija indrāṇām karṣantī iva āviśat nabhaḥ
atrā antare mahā vegaḥ bhagavān garuḍadhvajaḥ
bāṇasya śoṇitapuram prāpa pāvaka rakṣitam
aṣṭa bāhuḥ abhūt bhīma vigrahaḥ kāliya antakaḥ
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma śara śāṅga usi carma bhṛt
sahasra śikhara sphāra tuṣāra giri saṃnibhaḥ
sahasra kāya vadanaḥ babhūva ca halāyudhaḥ
sanatkumāra kalpaḥ ca pradyumnaḥ samapadyata
teṣu eva pṛthu rūpeṣu pṛthivī samakampata
tārkṣya pakṣa anila ākṣepa kṣumbhat
stabdha abdhi maṇḍalaḥ
udabhūt jagatām kaḥ pi pralaya ārambha saṃbhramaḥ
babhāṣe vismaya āviṣṭaḥ tatas kṛṣṇam halāyudhaḥ
kasmāt akasmāt saṃvṛttāḥ kanaka dyutayaḥ vayam
tam abravīt tārkṣyaketuḥ bāṇasya pura rakṣitā
agniḥ āhavanīyaḥ tra puras sma an udyataḥ krudhā
jagatī akāla saṃdhyā iva tejasā asya vibhāvyate
suparṇa āyattam adhunā kāryam etat bhaviṣyati
iti ukte śauriṇā tārkṣyaḥ pakṣa ākṣepa dhuta ambudhiḥ
gaṅgām ādāya vidadhe praśamam jātavedasaḥ
tatas visphāra śikhara ākāra jvālā jaṭā ākulāḥ
rudrasya anucarāḥ ghorāḥ vahnayaḥ nye samudyayuḥ
teṣām madhye ṅgirāḥ dīpta śūla jvālā vibhūṣaṇaḥ
sumeruḥ iva mārtaṇḍa maṇḍala aṅkaḥ samābabhau
tasya ardhacandreṇa hariḥ prahartuḥ śūlam utkaṭam

original: ciccheda sa prayatnasya vāmo vidhirivepsitam // Bhmj_19.1348 //
analyzed: ciccheda sa prayatnasya vāmaḥ vidhiḥ iva īpsitam
sthūlākarṇena nihataḥ sa mahā astreṇa śauriṇā
papāta pātita ripuḥ nirdagdhaḥ gniḥ iva agninā
tatas bhagne gni gahane bāṇa anīke sa saṃbhrame

original: dadhmau nijayaśaḥ śuddhaṃ pāñcajanyaṃ janārdanaḥ // Bhmj_19.1350 //
analyzed: dadhmau nija yaśaḥ śuddham pāñcajanyam janārdanaḥ
tasya śabdena mahatā vāta skandha vimardinā
babhūva bhuvana ābhoga saṃghaṭṭa viṣamaḥ svanaḥ
tatas praviśya bāṇasya nagaram garuḍadhvajaḥ
avāpa yuddha saṃnaddha kṣubdha daitya mahā arṇavam
tat apāram hariḥ sainyam pāvaka astra śilā śitaiḥ
vyāptam cakāra māñjiṣṭhaiḥ baddhaiḥ vadhya paṭaiḥ iva
tatas tūrṇam raṇa rasāt avatīrya garutmataḥ
vibudha arātibhiḥ vīraḥ yuyudhe lāṅgala āyudhaḥ
śuddhaḥ tamāla maline sa daitya sadane babhau
airāvaṇaḥ iva adabhra nīla abhre nabhasi bhraman
saṃkarṣaṇa hala ākṛṣṭāḥ tatas tad musala ahale
nipetuḥ dānavāḥ sarve vajra bhinnāḥ iva acalāḥ
avatīrya suparṇa agrāt pradyumnena saha acyutaḥ
jahāra śara jālena daitya jīva vihaṅgamān
te caṇḍa cañcu caraṇaiḥ pakṣa ākṣepaiḥ ca pīḍitāḥ

original: kṣapitāḥ pakṣirājena kṣaṇaṃ śarma na lebhire // Bhmj_19.1358 //
analyzed: kṣapitāḥ pakṣirājena kṣaṇam śarma na lebhire
tatas bhasma praharaṇāḥ trimukhaḥ triśikhaḥ tripād
nidrā vyāghūrṇita ātāmra netraḥ jṛmbhā alasaḥ svayam
śīta uddhataiḥ kharataraiḥ lomabhiḥ makara upamaḥ
bhrama glāni parimlāna dhūsaraḥ dṛśyata jvaraḥ
sa rauhiṇeyam āhūya citra maṇḍala cāriṇam
kampamāna tanuḥ kopāt tad kṣaye vidadhe matim
cikṣepa duḥsaham tasmai bhasma apasmāra saṃnibhaḥ
vakṣaḥ valakṣam rāmasya yena vyāptam abhūt kṣaṇāt
tad vakṣasaḥ pradīpta uttham bhasma meru taṭe patat

original: dadāha pṛthuṭāṅkāri śikharaṃ sahasā jvalat // Bhmj_19.1363 //
analyzed: dadāha pṛthu ṭāṅkāri śikharam sahasā jvalat
śeṣeṇa dīpta sarva aṅgaḥ bhasmanā vismṛta smṛtiḥ
skhalat gatiḥ tālaketuḥ param kṣībaḥ iva ābabhau

original: so 'bravītkṛṣṇa kṛṣṇāhaṃ pradīpto na labhe dhṛtim /
analyzed: saḥ bravīt kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aham pradīptaḥ na labhe dhṛtim
kulāla cakra vibhrāntam paśyāmi nikhilam jagat
iti bruvāṇam abhyetya śārṅgadhanvā halāyudham
bhasma śāntyai jagrāha jvaram ojasā

original: sa tena samare ghore samākrāntaḥ krudhā jvalan /
analyzed: sa tena samare ghore samākrāntaḥ krudhā jvalan
jvaraḥ cikṣepe muṣṭibhyām bhasma jvālā jaṭā ākulam
kṣaṇam pradīptaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pi praśānta agniḥ ca tad kṣaṇāt
tulyam tena āhataḥ dorbhiḥ tribhiḥ na akampata acyutaḥ
sa kṛṣṇa jvarayoḥ ghoraḥ saṃgrāmaḥ vajra niḥsvanaḥ
babhūva sarva bhūtānām bhaya kṛt loma harṣaṇaḥ
kāñcana ābharaṇa chāyāḥ babhūvuḥ jra vigrahe
vinirgatāḥ iva jvālāḥ kṛṣṇa dos daṇḍa pīḍanāt

original: nipīḍya nibiḍaṃ dorbhiḥ kṣitau kṣipattaḥ sa śauriṇā /
analyzed: nipīḍya nibiḍam dorbhiḥ kṣitau kṣipattas sa śauriṇā
alakṣitaḥ viśat kṣipram tat śarīram samīra vat
tena āviṣṭaḥ śvasan jṛmbhā bhrama nidrā alasaḥ skhalan
kṣaṇam babhūva bhūtātmā proddhūta adbhuta viplavaḥ
aho bata a pratihatā vastu śaktiḥ garīyasī
jagannāte yat bheje jvara saṃsparśa vikriyām
saḥ sṛjat vaiṣṇavam ghoram jvaram pūrva jvara apaham
kṛṣṇaḥ tena jvareṇa āśu punar pūrvaḥ bhavat jvaraḥ
tam hantum udyataḥ yāvat kāliyāriḥ svayam krudhā
uccacāra vacaḥ tāvat gaganāt hora niḥsvanam
saṃrakṣyaḥ bhagavan eṣa rudrasya anucaraḥ jvaraḥ
śrutvā iti virarāma āśu tad vadhāt madhusūdanaḥ
kṛtāñjaliḥ tam avadat jvaraḥ viṣṇu jvara arditaḥ

original: nijaṃ saṃhara viśveśa jvaraṃ madanukampayā // Bhmj_19.1377 //
analyzed: nijam saṃhara viśveśa jvaram mad anukampayā

original: mādhavena tu tadvākyātsaṃhṛte ca nije jvare /
analyzed: mādhavena tu tad vākyāt saṃhṛte ca nije jvare
praṇanāma harim harṣāt jvaraḥ śarva puraḥsaraḥ

original: kiṃ te priyaṃ karomīti vādinaṃ hṛṣṭamānasam /
analyzed: kim te priyam karomi iti vādinam hṛṣṭa mānasam
tam abravīt madhuripuḥ prasāda madhura akṣaram
bhuja āyudham idam yuddham āvayoḥ praṇipatya mām

original: ye manmayāḥ saṃsmaranti santu te vijvarā narāḥ // Bhmj_19.1380 //
analyzed: ye mad mayāḥ saṃsmaranti santu te vijvarāḥ narāḥ
tripād bhūti praharaṇaḥ tri śirāḥ sa asru locanaḥ
dhyātaḥ prīti sukham dadyāt tvad ākāraḥ śarīriṇām
na adi antāḥ kavayaḥ pūrve śāstāraḥ lpa mahāttamāḥ
ghnantu jvarān ca aniruddha pradyumna bala keśavāḥ

original: ityuktaḥ śauriṇā prītyā tathetyāha hari jvaraḥ /
analyzed: iti uktaḥ śauriṇā prītyā tathā iti āha hari jvaraḥ
abhyadhāt mauli ratna agre praṇaya āvarjita añjaliḥ
aham hareṇa tripurāntakena vinirmitaḥ kāliya sūdanena

original: jitastvāyā dānavakānanāgre prasahya yuddhe tava kiṃ karomi // Bhmj_19.1384 //
analyzed: jitaḥ tvāyāḥ dānava kānana agre prasahya yuddhe tava kim karomi
iti uktvā apasṛte śarva jvare pūrvam raṇa aṅganāt

original: tārkṣyamāruhya yuyudhe sātmajaḥ sāgrajo hariḥ // Bhmj_19.1385 //
analyzed: tārkṣyam āruhya yuyudhe sa ātmajaḥ sa agrajaḥ hariḥ
vidāritāḥ kṛṣṇa śaraiḥ svāmi sanmāna yantritāḥ

original: mānino daityasubhaṭā na tasthurna yayuḥ kṣaṇam // Bhmj_19.1386 //
analyzed: māninaḥ daitya su bhaṭāḥ na tasthuḥ na yayuḥ kṣaṇam
tatas vighaṭita vyūhāḥ bhagna syandana kuñjarāḥ
yayuḥ tya ka tvā raṇam daityāḥ dāmodara vidāritāḥ
vidrāvitāḥ te hariṇāḥ hariṇāḥ hariṇāḥ iva

original: nadīvegā iva gatāḥ pratīpaṃ na samāyayuḥ // Bhmj_19.1388 //
analyzed: nadī vegāḥ iva gatāḥ pratīpam na samāyayuḥ
prāṇaiḥ tṛṇa agra laghubhiḥ kalpa apāya sthiram yaśaḥ

original: vikrīya kiṃ gatā yūyaṃ mṛtyuḥ sarvatra dehinām // Bhmj_19.1389 //
analyzed: vikrīya kim gatāḥ yūyam mṛtyuḥ sarvatra dehinām
māna parvata vajreṇa kīrtivallī dava agninā
aucitya citra dhūmena bhayena abhihatāḥ katham

original: iti bāṇena bahuśaḥ kumbhāṇḍena ca māninā /
analyzed: iti bāṇena bahuśas kumbhāṇḍena ca māninā

original: nivāryamāṇā api te jagmureva diśo daśa // Bhmj_19.1391 //
analyzed: nivāryamāṇāḥ api te jagmuḥ eva diśaḥ daśa
tatas raṇa aṅgane rudraḥ bhagavān bhaga netra hā

original: devaḥ pinākī saguhaḥ svayaṃ yoddhumathāyayau // Bhmj_19.1392 //
analyzed: devaḥ pinākī sa guhaḥ svayam yoddhum atha āyayau
tuṣāra nikara smera sphāraiḥ gātra aṃśu saṃcayaiḥ
kurvan iva jagannāthaḥ bhūri bhūti vibhūṣitam
valat valaya keyūra kuṇḍala vyāla maṇḍalaiḥ
tripura anala dhūma ālī bhaṅgaiḥ iva taraṅgitaḥ
sṛjan kaṇṭha prabhā cakraiḥ diś vadhū nīla kañcukaiḥ
pralaya ārambha sacivān puṣkarāvartakān iva
sphūrjat phena amara nadī racita uṣṇīṣa vibhramaḥ
rathena nandi yuktena siṃha yuktena bhāsvatā
kopa pāvaka puñjena mūrtena iva āvṛta ambaraḥ
tārakā avajaya udāra kumāra anugatam haram

original: harirālokya niṣkampaḥ sajjaṃ cakre nijaṃ dhanuḥ // Bhmj_19.1398 //
analyzed: hariḥ ālokya niṣkampaḥ sajjam cakre nijam dhanuḥ
kruddhasya khaṇḍaparaśoḥ samara āḍambare svayam
abhūt akāṇḍa pralaya ārambha śaṅkā śarīriṇām
tatas kanaka nācaiḥ bhargaḥ kṛṣṇam apūrayat
tṛtīya nayana uddhūta bhūri vahni śikhā upamaiḥ
ugraiḥ ugra bhuja utsṛṣṭaiḥ vega spaṣṭīkṛtaiḥ vṛtaḥ
sa taiḥ tad valaya vyālaiḥ jyā ākṛṣṭi truṭitaiḥ iva
śara dhārā sahasra ugram visphūrjat garjita ūrjitam

original: mumoca bhadraṃ rudrāya parjanyāstraṃ janārdanaḥ // Bhmj_19.1402 //
analyzed: mumoca bhadram rudrāya parjanya astram janārdanaḥ
astreṇa tripurārātiḥ vyāptaḥ tena pramāthinā
āgneyam astram vidadhe vitrāsita jagattrayam
hema pañjara baddhasya bheje kesariṇaḥ śriyam
vāruṇena śamam nīte tasmin astre murāriṇā
paiśāca raudra āṅgirasaiḥ yuyudhe straiḥ trilocanaḥ
nivārya astrāṇi tāni āśu saura vāyavya vāsavaiḥ
saṃdadhe krodha vidhuraḥ tripurānta karam śaram
cirāt cāpa praṇayi tām tasmin nīte ndhaka dviṣā
hariḥ vijṛmbhamāṇa astram tam vijṛmbhā ākulam vyadhāt
ghora ghoṣeṇa śārṅgasya pāñcajanyasya ca asakṛt

original: jṛmbhite bhairave bhīmaṃ bhayaṃ bhūtāni lebhire // Bhmj_19.1408 //
analyzed: jṛmbhite bhairave bhīmam bhayam bhūtāni lebhire
tatas kumbhāṇḍa sūtena rathena pṛthu raṃhasā
pratyudyayau rāma kṛṣṇa pradyumnān kupitaḥ guhaḥ
anila anala parjanyaiḥ astraiḥ abhihataḥ sa taiḥ
dīpta astra jālaiḥ vidadhe jagat saṃkṣobha vibhramam
babhau hema puṅkhaiḥ tad vividhaiḥ vṛtaḥ
janma kṣetram śara varam prītyā punar iva āśritaḥ
astram brahmaśiraḥ raudram asṛjat tārakāntakaḥ

original: jvālābhijvalitā yasya śailāḥ prāpuḥ sumerutām // Bhmj_19.1412 //
analyzed: jvālā abhijvalitāḥ yasya śailāḥ prāpuḥ sumeru tām
tasmin viśva kṣaya ākṣepa dīkṣā vikṣobhita akhile
astra anale pravisṛte hariḥ cakram samādadhe
tat sarva astra haram ghoram mārtaṇḍa uccaṇḍa maṇḍalam
hari dos daṇḍa saṃsaktam jahāra astra anala prabhām
cakra aṃśu krakaca utkṛtte tasmin astra prabhāvane

original: prajagrāha guhaḥ śaktiṃ krūrāṃ krauñcādridāriṇīm // Bhmj_19.1415 //
analyzed: prajagrāha guhaḥ śaktim krūrām krauñca adri dāriṇīm
mṛtyu danta āvalī tāra ratna rāji virājitām
tāraka asṛj kaṇā ākāra śoṇa paṭṭa vibhūṣitām
cikṣepa kārtikeyaḥ tām ghaṇṭā paṭala rāviṇīm
krośantīm trijagat grāsa lālasām kṣudhitām iva
sā dīpta agra prabhāta abhra bhrū keśa śmaśru bhīṣaṇe
cakre vyoma mahākāla vaktre jihvā vijṛmbhitam
svasti svasti acyutāya iti divi devaiḥ udīritam
sā kṛṣṇa abhimukhī śaktiḥ vegāt vidyut iva ābabhau
sā kṛṣṇa huṃkāra hatā tasmāt niṣphala tām yayau

original: āśeva baddhā mugdhena labdhe kuṭilacetasi // Bhmj_19.1420 //
analyzed: āśā iva baddhā mugdhena labdhe kuṭila cetasi
tatas cakrāyudhaḥ cakre kalayan valayam ruṣaḥ

original: guhaṃ vīkṣya kaṭākṣeṇa tadvadhe vidadhe matim // Bhmj_19.1421 //
analyzed: guham vīkṣya kaṭākṣeṇa tad vadhe vidadhe matim
nirambarā muktakeśī śyāmā lohita locanā
tasthau kumāra rakṣāyai mūrtā śaktiḥ iva agratas
apagaccha apagaccha iti sa asūyam kāliyā dviṣā
nivāryamāṇā api asakṛt tatas nā apasasāra sā
atrā antare ghana dhvāna dhīra gambhīra niḥsvanaiḥ
tāra tīra ravaiḥ sainyaiḥ bāṇaḥ svayam adṛśyata
sa kaumāra mayūrasya śuśubhe pṛṣṭham āsthitaḥ
añjana adri taṭam nīla megha saṃghaḥ iva ucchritaḥ
saḥ vadat kṛṣṇam abhyetya bahu bāhu bala ūrjitaḥ
pratyāsanna vināśaḥ dya dīpa vat bata vardhase
hataḥ mayā videśe smin a vijñātaḥ suhṛd janaiḥ

original: dhruvaṃ tyakṣyasi kṛcchreṇa jīvitaṃ mṛtabāndhavaḥ // Bhmj_19.1427 //
analyzed: dhruvam tyakṣyasi kṛcchreṇa jīvitam mṛta bāndhavaḥ
iti bāṇena gadite garvāt garuḍa lāñchanaḥ
katthanena eva śūraḥ si nūnam iti āha sa smitaḥ
tatas śita śara āsāraiḥ pūritaḥ sa murāriṇā
asṛjat dos sahasreṇa ghora āyudha paramparām
tad kṛśānu kaṇā ākāra pūra pūritam ambaram
vikīrṇa svarṇa cūrṇāyāḥ lebhe maṇibhuvaḥ prabhām
astram hiraṇyakaśipoḥ atha bāṇaḥ samādadhe

original: yadbhītyeva diśaḥ kvāpi yayuḥ saṃtamasāvṛtāḥ // Bhmj_19.1431 //
analyzed: yad bhītyā iva diśaḥ kvāpi yayuḥ saṃtamasā āvṛtāḥ
tad udbhūta astra nicayaiḥ pūrite gagana aṅgane
vāyoḥ api gatiḥ nā abhūt kā kathā vyoma cāriṇām
parjanya astreṇa hariṇā tasmin astre nivārite
bāṇa bāhu vana utsṛṣṭā śara vṛṣṭiḥ samudyayau
babhartuḥ barhi garuḍau yuddhe cañcu nakha āyudhau
miśrībhūtau iva muhur nīla śaila sura acalau
tatas tārkṣyeṇa pakṣa agra kṣepa vikṣepa kāriṇā
ākṛṣṇa abhihataḥ mūrdhni mayūraḥ driḥ iva apatat
daitya indre nihate nandī preritaḥ tripurāriṇā

original: raudraṃ rathaṃ samādāya sajjo 'bhūtsamare punaḥ // Bhmj_19.1436 //
analyzed: raudram ratham samādāya sajjaḥ bhūt samare punar
bāṇaḥ tūrṇam samāruhya mānī manyu viṣa ākulaḥ
cakāra brahmaśirasā mahā astreṇa jagat kṣayam
tatas cakram sahasra aram saṃhāram tridaśa dviṣām
udyamya grasta daitya astram hariḥ daitya indram ādravat
punar saṃnyasta vasanā kālī kuvalaya īkṣaṇā

original: puro babhūva rakṣārthaṃ bāṇasya prāṇasaṃśaye // Bhmj_19.1439 //
analyzed: puras babhūva rakṣā artham bāṇasya prāṇa saṃśaye
dṛṣṭvā tām avadat kuṣṇaḥ trāṇam vaḥ katham aṅganā
bāṇa saṃśaya kāleṣu nā idam vīra vrata ucitam
iti uktvā mīlita akṣaḥ tām parivarjya aṅganām hariḥ
utsasarja prabhā cakra duṣprekṣam cakram añjasā
tad alakṣya bhrama udbhrāntam bāṇa bāhu vane muhur
cakram pūrṇa anala āpūra krūram krakaca tām yayau
kṣaṇena mūla nirlūna prabhūta bhujā pādapaḥ
babhūva bāṇaḥ sa āvega sravat rudhira nirjharaḥ
kaṇṭha cheda udyatam dṛṣṭvā bāṇasya madhusūdanam
abhyetya bhagavān bhargaḥ sa guhaḥ praṇataḥ bhyadhāt
kṛṣṇa jāne jagat janam asthiti saṃhāra kāraṇam

original: tvāṃ tathāpyeṣa naḥ ko 'pi daityapakṣaparigrahaḥ // Bhmj_19.1445 //
analyzed: tvām tathā api eṣa naḥ kaḥ pi daitya pakṣa parigrahaḥ
mad bhaktaḥ eva bhaktaḥ te saṃrakṣyaḥ te mahā āśrayaḥ
aham eva bhavān brahma mūrtiḥ traiguṇya saṅgataḥ
mad eka śaraṇaḥ tasmāt rakṣyaḥ bāṇaḥ tvayā adhunā
uktaḥ hareṇa iti hariḥ tathā iti uktvā anurakṣitam
tatas trinetram āmantrya prayāte garuḍadhvaje
paścāt kṛtta bhujam bāṇam nandī cintā ākulaḥ bhyadhāt

original: aho bata na jānīmaḥ kiyatī bhavitavyatā /
analyzed: aho bata na jānīmaḥ kiyatī bhavitavyatā
bāṇaḥ tri akṣe sa pakṣe pi prāptaḥ jīvita saṃśayam
bāṇa chinna bhujaḥ pi atra nṛtyena ārādhaya prabhum
bhavam bhava bhaya uccheda kovidam vara dam sakhe
iti uktaḥ nandinā bāṇaḥ cira cārī padakramaiḥ
nanarta bhagavān yena sya abhavat bhavaḥ
amaraḥ nirvyathaḥ śrīmān jātaḥ pūjya bhuja dvayaḥ
bāṇaḥ bhūt īśvara varāt mahākālaḥ gaṇāgraṇīḥ
antarhite tha sa gaṇe sahasā pārvatīpatau
babhūva śoṇita puram śūnyam daitya jana ujjhitam
uṣā sahāyam ādāya bāṇa antaḥpura mandirāt
aniruddham pramuditaḥ prayayau garuḍadhvajaḥ
vrajan sa tārkṣya pakṣa aṃśu piśaṅgīkṛta diṅmukhaḥ
sasmāra satyabhāmāyāḥ vacanam cāru locanaḥ
santi divya amṛta kṣīrāḥ divyāḥ bāṇasya dhenavaḥ

original: tā madarthaṃ tvayā deva hartavyā iti sasmitaḥ // Bhmj_19.1456 //
analyzed: tāḥ mad artham tvayā deva hartavyāḥ iti sa smitaḥ
tāḥ hartum udyayau yāvat carantīḥ jaladheḥ taṭe

original: tāvattā viviśuḥ sarvā javena varuṇālayam // Bhmj_19.1457 //
analyzed: tāvat tāḥ viviśuḥ sarvāḥ javena varuṇālayam
tatas suparṇa pakṣa ugra vāta saṃkṣobhite mbudhau
ghoram ratha sahasra oghaiḥ udyayau vāruṇam balam
murāri śara saṃbhāra dārite ca bala arṇave
udatiṣṭhat maṇi chatraḥ kupitaḥ varuṇaḥ svayam
divya astra varṣī samare vaiṣṇava astreṇa śauriṇā
nirdahyamānaḥ varuṇaḥ prāñjaliḥ tam abhāṣata
mūrtiḥ ādyā tava eva aham jagat sarge jagatpate

original: kṣantumarhasi me deva jahi kopaṃ tamomayam // Bhmj_19.1461 //
analyzed: kṣantum arhasi me deva jahi kopam tamaḥ mayam

original: nyāsīkṛtaṃ godhanaṃ ca bāṇena parirakṣa me /
analyzed: nyāsīkṛtam go dhanam ca bāṇena parirakṣa me
iti uktaḥ tena bhagavān prītaḥ prāyāt vihāyasā
stūyamānaḥ sura gaṇaiḥ dvārakā upāntam etya saḥ
nikṣipya nija vaktre ca pāñcajanyam apūrayat
tasya gambhīra goṣeṇa su snigdha ghana nādinā
harṣa utsavaḥ vṛṣṇi vīra śikhaṇḍinām
praviśya dvārakām devaḥ pūjitaḥ sarva yādavaiḥ
paścāt avāpta satkṛtyam visṛjya indram saha anugam
garuḍam ca priyatamā praṇaya prema lālasaḥ
vijahāra sura arātiḥ niḥśeṣa kṣaya nirvṛtiḥ
bāṇa yuddham
vaiśampāyanaḥ iti ūce rājānam janamejayam

original: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā punaḥ papraccha śaunakaḥ // Bhmj_19.1467 //
analyzed: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā punar papraccha śaunakaḥ
pūrve vaṃśāḥ śrutāḥ sarve janamejaya bhūpateḥ
saṃtāna vaṃśam icchāmi śrotum sūta tvayā uditam
iti pṛṣṭaḥ bravīt sūtaḥ janamejaya saṃbhavau
candrāpīḍaḥ mahīpālaḥ sūryāpīḍaḥ ca makti bhāj
tad putraḥ śvetakarṇa ākhyaḥ mahāprasthānam āviśat

original: taṃ jāyā mālinī nāma sagarbhānuyayau satī /
analyzed: tam jāyā mālinī nāma sagarbhā anuyayau satī
pratijātaḥ tayā tyaktaḥ kumāraḥ giri kandare
ruroda tasya kāruṇyāt prādurāsan payomucaḥ
gṛhītaḥ muni putrābhyām dhṛṣṭapārśva dvayaḥ girau
ajapārśvaḥ iti khyātaḥ saḥ varaḥ
tad putra pautraiḥ vipulaiḥ pūru vaṃśaḥ vivardhitaḥ
yayāti proktam api arka graha hīnā mahī bhavet
pūru vaṃśa vihīnā tu na kadācid bhaviṣyati
janamejaya vaṃśaḥ
bhārate pūrva pūjāsu janamejaya bhūbhujā
śrutvā dāna vidhim pṛṣṭaḥ vyāsa śiṣyaḥ bravīt punar
ādiparvaṇi viprebhyaḥ pradadyāt madhu pāyasam
apūpa modakaiḥ kuryāt sabhā parvaṇi tarpaṇam
āraṇyake mūla phalaiḥ vairāṭe vastram arpayet
vicitra bhojya pāna annam dadyāt udyoga bhīṣmayoḥ
droṇaparvaṇi āyudhāni śuddha annam karṇaparvaṇi
śalya parvaṇī apūpa ādi samodaka guḍodanam
mudga miśram gadā yuddhe strī parvaṇi vibhūṣaṇam
ghṛtaudanam atha eṣu ūṣī
ke haviṣyam śāntiparvaṇi
aśvamedhe yata akāmam haviṣyam tadvat āśrame
mausale gandha mālya ādi prasthāna ākhye upānahau
svargaparvaṇi bhakṣya ādi harivaṃśe tu pāyasam
bhārata ante sarasvatyāḥ pūjām ādāya pustake

original: parvapūjāṃ niśamyeti punaḥ papraccha śaunakaḥ // Bhmj_19.1482 //
analyzed: parva pūjām niśamya iti punar papraccha śaunakaḥ

original: sarvasatre nivṛtte tu rakṣite takṣake tathā /
analyzed: sarva satre nivṛtte tu rakṣite takṣake tathā

original: tataḥ kimakarotsūta sa rājā janamejayaḥ // Bhmj_19.1483 //
analyzed: tatas kim akarot sūta sa rājā janamejayaḥ
sūtaḥ vadat tatas rājā vidvat mantri purohitaiḥ
cintayitvā aśvamedhāya pūrṇam saṃbhāram ādadhe
atha ājagāma bhagavān divya jñāna mayaḥ muniḥ
tam mahārha āsana āsīnam pūjayitvā nataḥ nṛpaḥ
papraccha bhārata sudhā carvaṇa ānanda nirbharaḥ
bhagavan rājasūyena kṛtaḥ kṣattra kṣayaḥ mahān

original: sa kathaṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ bhavatā na nivāritaḥ // Bhmj_19.1487 //
analyzed: sa katham pāṇḍu putrāṇām bhavatā na nivāritaḥ
pṛṣṭaḥ nṛpeṇa iti avadat muniḥ danta aṃśubhiḥ diśan
mukhe sarasvatī vāsa kamale kesara āvalīm
avaśya bhāvini katham tasmin kṣattra kṣaye vayam

original: prabhavāmo hitaṃ kaśca manyate vidhicoditaḥ // Bhmj_19.1489 //
analyzed: prabhavāmaḥ hitam kaḥ ca manyate vidhi coditaḥ
iyam bhava āsakta jantu yāta āyāta anila āhatiḥ
sarva ātmanā balavatī jṛmbhate
śubha aśubha phalaiḥ prāptiḥ sahajā api agra vartinī

original: bhrūlateva lalāṭasthā svadṛśā kena dṛśyate // Bhmj_19.1491 //
analyzed: bhrū latā iva lalāṭa sthā sva dṛśā kena dṛśyate
teṣām kāla parītānām dhīḥ abhūt dṛḍha niścayā
sarvaṃkaṣaḥ hi bhagavān kālaḥ kavalita akhilaḥ
dehi bhardaiva nirdiṣṭam vacasā yadi laṅghyate

original: tatsattramapyaśvamedhaṃ mā kṛthā vighnado hi saḥ // Bhmj_19.1493 //
analyzed: tat sattram api aśvamedham mā kṛthāḥ vighna daḥ hi saḥ
śrutvā śatakratuḥ dvaiṣāt tava kratu śata trayam

original: patnī praviśya yajñāśvaṃ rāgāndho dharṣayiṣyati // Bhmj_19.1494 //
analyzed: patnī praviśya yajñāśvam rāga andhaḥ dharṣayiṣyati
tatas prabhṛti loke smin pravṛddhe kali kalmaṣe
mahāyajña kathā mātram api dūre bhaviṣyati
senānīḥ kāśyapiḥ kaścid audbhidaḥ kali gocare

original: aśvamedhaṃ kṛtī vipraḥ punaḥ pratyāhariṣyati // Bhmj_19.1496 //
analyzed: aśvamedham kṛtī vipraḥ punar pratyāhariṣyati

original: iti śrutvā viṣṇṇena muniḥ pṛṣṭo mahībhujā /
analyzed: iti śrutvā viṣṇṇena muniḥ pṛṣṭaḥ mahībhujā
uvāca jñānanayanaḥ paryanta yuga lakṣaṇam
varṇa āśrama ācāra carcā viparītā yata īpsitā

original: bhaviṣyati yadā loke tadyugāntasya yauvanam // Bhmj_19.1498 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyati yadā loke tad yuga antasya yauvanam
śithila kṣaṇa sauhārdāḥ satya śīla vivarjitāḥ
keśa veśāḥ bhaviṣyanti niruṣṇīṣa ambarāḥ narāḥ
dasyavaḥ rāja caritāḥ rājāne dastu ceṣṭitāḥ

original: kariṣyanti kaleḥ sarve sāhāyyaṃ dharmasaṃkṣaye // Bhmj_19.1500 //
analyzed: kariṣyanti kaleḥ sarve sāhāyyam dharma saṃkṣaye
pakva anna vikrayaḥ loke veda vikrayiṇaḥ dvijāḥ

original: bhaviṣyanti yuge kṣīṇe gṛhīṇyo bhagavikrayāḥ // Bhmj_19.1501 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti yuge kṣīṇe gṛhīṇyaḥ bhaga vikrayāḥ
upadeśa kṛtaḥ śūdrāḥ brahma dīkṣā vidhāyinaḥ

original: bhoḥśabdena bhaviṣyanti viprā avamatāḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_19.1502 //
analyzed: bhoḥ śabdena bhaviṣyanti viprāḥ avamatāḥ punar
muṇḍāḥ kaṣāya vasanāḥ nānā vrata vikāriṇaḥ
pratigrahān grahīṣyanti śūdrāḥ vidrāvita dvijāḥ
rūpa lāvaṇya mādhurye parikṣīṇe subhūṣaṇe
keśa alāṃkaraṇāḥ nāryaḥ bhaviṣyanti gata trapāḥ
sva śāstra paṇḍitāḥ sarve nirvivekāḥ mumukṣavaḥ
bhaviṣyanti kule jātāḥ niṣprayatna phala īpsavaḥ
vañcanāḥ vañcana jñānām taskarāṇām ca taskarāḥ
kim anyat prabhaviṣyanti rājānaḥ dāra hāriṇaḥ
babu strīkaḥ lpa puruṣaḥ himavat pārśva saṃśrayaḥ
loka skandha arpita apatyaḥ hāhā bhūtaḥ cariṣyati
dambhaḥ śaucam vakra māyā ākṛti tvam hiṃsā śauryam vṛttiḥ anya upaghātaḥ

original: tarkaḥ śāstraṃ nāstikatvaṃ ca bodhaḥ śaucācāratyāga evāśu muktiḥ // Bhmj_19.1508 //
analyzed: tarkaḥ śāstram nāstika tvam ca bodhaḥ śauca ācāra tyāgaḥ eva āśu muktiḥ
iti evam kalinā loke kilbiṣaiḥ ākulīkṛte
punar kāla vipākena kṛtadharmaḥ pravartate
bhaviṣyat
tatas tirohite kṣipram munau jñāna divākare
aśvamedhaḥ narapateḥ kratuḥ śrīmān avartata
tasmin yajñe praviśya aśvam rāja patnīm vapuṣṭamām
akāmām kāma vaśataḥ śatakratuḥ adharṣayat
tad adhvaryu girā prāptaḥ rājā kopa viṣa ulbaṇaḥ
śaśāpa śakram yajñāṃśa niṣedhena ajita indriyam
nirasya sarvān sa asūyam brāhmaṇāt viṣayāt nijāt
praviśya akampita tanuḥ patnīśālām abhāṣata
iyam niṣkāsyatām paṅka kulyā kuṭila cāriṇī
kilbiṣa ālola kallola ākula kūla avapātinī
gṛhe dūṣita ācāritrā na iyam me sthātum arhati
yaśaḥ pūrṇa śaśāṅkasya megha mālāyitam yayā

original: svādu nāśnanti saṃtaptā na ca rātriṣu śerate /
analyzed: svādu na aśnanti saṃtaptāḥ na ca rātriṣu śerate

original: śalyaṃ marmāntare yeṣāṃ gṛhe bhāryā hi dūṣitā // Bhmj_19.1516 //
analyzed: śalyam marma antare yeṣām gṛhe bhāryā hi dūṣitā
iti vādini bhūpāle gandharva adhipatiḥ svayam
viśvāvasuḥ tam abhyetya sauhārdāt idam abravīt
rājan rambhā tava vadhūḥ iyam devavilāsinī
vapuṣṭamā sura indreṇa yajñe smin dharṣitā satī
tvad prabhāva bhayāt vipra bhayāt dveṣāt manobhavāt

original: daivadiṣṭaśca śakreṇa vighnaste vihitaḥ kratau // Bhmj_19.1519 //
analyzed: daiva diṣṭaḥ ca śakreṇa vighnaḥ te vihitaḥ kratau

original: viprebhyo mā krudhaḥ patnīṃ mā tyākṣīḥ śuddhamānasām /
analyzed: viprebhyaḥ mā krudhaḥ patnīm mā tyākṣīḥ śuddha mānasām
guhya sparśaḥ hi akāmāyāḥ dṛśyayā aṅga sparśa saṃnibhaḥ
jana janma mahī randhre puraṃdhrīṇām svabhāvataḥ

original: aśuddhaṃ śuddhimādhatte brāhmaṇānmā mudhā vadhīḥ // Bhmj_19.1521 //
analyzed: aśuddham śuddhim ādhatte brāhmaṇān mā mudhā vadhīḥ
iti gandharva rājena bodhitaḥ janamejayaḥ
praśānta kopaḥ saṃcintya tathā iti pratyapadyata
janamejaya yajña samāptiḥ
niśamya viṣṇu caritam vaiśampāyana kīrtitam

original: punaḥ prapaccha vārāhaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ mahīpatiḥ // Bhmj_19.1523 //
analyzed: punar prapaccha vārāham prādurbhāvam mahīpatiḥ
sa pṛṣṭaḥ tena vinayāt praṇipatya harim muniḥ
viṣṇoḥ ānāyayat divyam prabhāvam kalmaṣa apaham
pūrṇe yuga sahasra ante nivṛtte brahma vāsare
hiraṇyaretāḥ triśirāḥ svayam devaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ
śikhābhiḥ lokam akhilam dagdhvā sa giri sāgaram
ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ śete garbhīkṛta jagattrayaḥ
sa garbhīkṛta viśvaḥ prāk mumoca aṇḍam hiraṇmayam

original: ūrdhvādhastena tadbhinnaṃ vivṛtaṃ dikṣu cāṣṭadhā // Bhmj_19.1527 //
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas tena tat bhinnam vivṛtam dikṣu ca aṣṭadhā
babhūva trijagat kṣetram bhū tala antam kha śekharam
garbham hiraṇyagarbhasya yam āhuḥ brahma vādinaḥ
svaccham yat salilam tatra sumeruḥ kāñcana acalaḥ
mamajja medinī tasmin giri indra śata pīḍitā
aśaktāḥ dhartum akhilam prāṇitam viṣṇu tejasā

original: vaikuṇṭhaṃ śaraṇaṃ prāyānamagnā gauriva medinī // Bhmj_19.1530 //
analyzed: vaikuṇṭham śaraṇam prāyān a magnā gauḥ iva medinī
tatas viśvaṃbharā uddhāra dhīram vapuḥ akalpayat
vārāham duṣṭa saṃhāri hariḥ girim ava ucchritam
bhinnāñjana caya chāyam śubha daṃṣṭra aṃśu saṃcayam
nīla jīmūta saṃghātāt iva niryat niśākaram
babhru bhrū śmaśru keśena
nīla adri śikhareṇa iva hema rāji rajaḥ juṣā
sa pātāla talam tāla tamāla malina udaram
viveśa daṃṣṭrā khaṇḍa indu khaṇḍita dhvānta maṇḍalaḥ

original: mantrātmā veda yajñāṅgaḥ sa varāho mahākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: mantra ātmā veda yajña aṅgaḥ sa varāhaḥ mahā ākṛtiḥ
daṃṣṭra agreṇa ujjahāra kṣmām śevāla latikām iva
sā tasya daṃṣṭrā paryante saktā kuvalaya īkṣaṇā
babhau lāñchana lekhena śyāma śītāṃśu maṇḍale
jagannivāsaḥ vasudhām uddhṛtya jagataḥ sthitim
vidadhe diś vibhāgena bhūdharān ca nyaveśayet
śaṅkha cakra gadā ākārān parvatān viniveśya saḥ
asṛjat puruṣam vaktrāt devam ādyam prajāpatim
kim karomi iti puratas tasmin vadati sādaram
vibhaja ātmānam iti uktvā viśvayoniḥ tirodadhe
tatas cintayataḥ tasya cit ākāśa samudbhavaḥ
om iti udacarat nādaḥ saṃpūrita jagattrayaḥ
tatas bhavat vaṣaṭkāraḥ mahāvyāhṛtayaḥ tathā

original: vedamātā ca sāvitrī vedaiḥ saha sanātanaiḥ // Bhmj_19.1541 //
analyzed: vedamātā ca sāvitrī vedaiḥ saha sanātanaiḥ
viśuddha mānasa āvāsa rājahaṃsāḥ prajāpateḥ

original: ajāyanta jagadvandyāḥ sapta pūrve maharṣayaḥ // Bhmj_19.1542 //
analyzed: ajāyanta jagadvandyāḥ sapta pūrve mahā ṛṣayaḥ
dakṣaḥ tu dakṣima aṅguṣṭhāt udabhūt yaḥ prajāpatiḥ
tad sutāḥ kanyakāḥ prāpuḥ dharmendu manu kaśyapāḥ
tāsām ayam viśva sargaḥ saṃtānaḥ sa sura asuraḥ
asūta devān aditiḥ ditiḥ daityān ca kaśyapāt
hiraṇyākṣam samāśritya kadācid ditija īśvaram
sa pakṣāḥ parvatāḥ cakruḥ gatyā bhuvana viplavam
pakṣa bheda udyate teṣām śakre tad pakṣapātinā
hiraṇyākṣeṇa devānām dāruṇaḥ saṃgaraḥ bhavat
tasmin mahā astra vikṣepa bhūta kṣobha vibhīṣaṇe
hiraṇyākṣaḥ jayat devān bhuvana akampane raṇe
sureṣu dhvasta dhairyeṣu varāhaḥ giri vigrahaḥ
bhagavān svayam abhyetya tasthau daitya vadha utsukaḥ

original: dadhmau daṃṣṭrākarālena śaṅkhaṃ vaktreṇa cakrabhṛt // Bhmj_19.1548 //
analyzed: dadhmau daṃṣṭrā karālena śaṅkham vaktreṇa cakrabhṛt
nādena tasya brahmaṇḍa maṇḍala āvarta kāriṇā
oṅkārāyitam uddarpa daitya kṣaya mahā adhvare
tatas bhyetya hiraṇyākṣaḥ kṣaya dūtikayā dviṣām

original: śaktyā vakṣasi deveśaṃ jaghāna ghananiḥsvanaḥ // Bhmj_19.1550 //
analyzed: śaktyā vakṣasi deveśam jaghāna ghana niḥsvanaḥ
līlayā vīkṣya bhagavān daityam adbhūta vikramam
asṛjat vairi saṃhāram sahasra aram sudarśanam
kṛta uttamāṅga śṛṅge tha tena daitya mahībhṛti

original: patite bhuvi vidhvastāḥ prayayurdānavā diśaḥ // Bhmj_19.1552 //
analyzed: patite bhuvi vidhvastāḥ prayayuḥ dānavāḥ diśaḥ
hiraṇyākṣe hate vīre śekhare tridaśa dviṣām

original: dhṛtā mahāvarāheṇa svapadaṃ bhejire surāḥ // Bhmj_19.1553 //
analyzed: dhṛtāḥ mahāvarāheṇa sva padam bhejire surāḥ

original: pāyānnaḥ śeṣaśīrṣākramaṇasamuditairvyāptakāyaḥ phaṇāgraiḥ kṣubhyatkṣīrābdhiphenairiva maṇiśabalairmandarābho varāhaḥ // Bhmj_19.1554 //
analyzed: pāyāt naḥ śeṣa śīrṣa ākramaṇa samuditaiḥ vyāpta kāyaḥ phaṇa agraiḥ kṣubhyat kṣīrābdhi phenaiḥ iva maṇi śabalaiḥ mandara ābhaḥ varāhaḥ
varāha prādurbhāvaḥ
purā kṛta yuge śrīmān kāśyapaḥ diti nandanaḥ

original: cakre hiraṇyakaśipuḥ sāgraṃ varṣāyutaṃ tapaḥ // Bhmj_19.1555 //
analyzed: cakre hiraṇyakaśipuḥ sāgram varṣa ayutam tapaḥ
avadhyaḥ sura gandharva kinnara uraga rakṣasām

original: āyudhānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ so 'bhavadbrahmaṇo varāt // Bhmj_19.1556 //
analyzed: āyudhānām ca sarveṣām saḥ bhavat brahmaṇaḥ varāt
samam prāpta padaḥ darpāt ākrānta bhuvana trayaḥ
vīraḥ sura aṅganāḥ sarvāḥ cakre proṣita bhartṛkāḥ
tatas saṃtrasta vidhvastāḥ tad pratāpa agni niṣprabhāḥ
brahma vākya āyuḥ devāḥ śaraṇam devam acyutam
sa dattvā vara daḥ teṣām abhayam bhūtabhāvanaḥ
oṅkāra anugatam cakre nārasiṃham mahat vapuḥ
saḥ bhūt jvalita hemādri prabhā saṃbhāra ghasmaraḥ
sa āvega caraṇa ākrānti kharvīkṛta mahīdharaḥ
vidruma agra aṅgurā ākāraiḥ cañcat romāñca kañcukaiḥ
krūra krodha anala udbhūtaiḥ visphuliṅgaiḥ iva āvṛtaḥ
pratāpa mandira āgāra kanaka stambha saṃnibhaiḥ
śaṅkha cakra gadā padma lāñchanaiḥ bhūṣitaḥ bhujaiḥ
kṛtānta dvirada udīrṇa karṇa cāmara vibhramaiḥ
nakhara aṃśu cayaiḥ kurvan sa aṭṭahāsam iva ambaram
meru kūṭa unnata skandha śikhara āsakta kesaraiḥ
ghoraḥ karāla kālāgni jīvana vyajanaiḥ iva
jṛmbhā vispaṣṭa daṃṣṭra aṃśu paṭalaiḥ ādiśan muhur
caṇḍāṃśu puṇḍarīkasya visinī kāṇḍa maṇḍalam
dṛpta daitya śata utpāta śaṃsinīm rudhira aruṇām
akāla saṃdhyām kurvāṇaḥ piṅga ugra nayana ātapaiḥ
babhru bhru bhaṅga vikaṭam lalāṭa taṭam unnatam
adabhram iva saṃdhyā abhram sphurat tāra taḍit gaṇam
sa gatvā daiteya nilayam pralaya anala saṃnibhaḥ
dadarśa arka sahasra ābhām hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sabhām
sthitām jagat trayī mūrdhni hema mālām iva ujjvalām
divya ratna phala udāra sarva ṛtu kusuma drumām
tasyām daitya patiḥ śrīmān virarāja ūrjita dyutiḥ
pṛthu ratna āsana utsaṅge sahasrāṃśuḥ iva udaye
śuśubhe hema padma sraj vipule tasya vakṣasi
kalpānta sūrya mālā iva taṭe kanaka bhūbhṛtaḥ
niṣiddhāḥ lokapālānām sthitiḥ atrā iti śāsanam
kṣaṇam dikṣu lilekha iva ratna kuṇḍala raśmibhiḥ
viṭaṅka ratna mukuṭa uddyotaiḥ indrāyudha prabhaiḥ
muhur vyoma mayūrasya ratna ābhāram iva akarot
sevitaḥ siddha gandharva kinnara apsarasām gaṇaiḥ
viśva aiśvarya abdhi phena ogham babhāra uṣṇīṣam ujjvalam
tasmin svarga aṅga ānāpāṇi manda āndolita cāmaraiḥ
rāja lakṣmīḥ jahāsa iva taraṅgita sita aṃśuke
atha adṛśyata digdāha udgāra dāruṇam ambaram
kena api kṣarat kṣataja nirbharam
prādurāsīt tatas siṃhaḥ śrīmān puruṣa vigrahaḥ
tam vīkṣya hṛdaya utkampana vat īkṣā vidhāyinam
mithomukhāni ditijāḥ vismaya ārtāḥ vyalokayan
kaḥ yam iti ākule kṣipram daitya āsthāna sabhā aṅgaṇe
dhīmān uvāca prahlādaḥ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ
sarva deva mayaḥ kaḥ pi devaḥ yam mahasām nidhiḥ

original: yena naḥ sthagitānīva cetāṃsi ca vacāṃsi ca // Bhmj_19.1580 //
analyzed: yena naḥ sthagitāni iva cetāṃsi ca vacāṃsi ca

original: sa evāyaṃ hiraṇyākṣo yena nītaḥ pramāthinā /
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam hiraṇya akṣaḥ yena nītaḥ pramāthinā
kāla kāpālika uttala skandha valkala ketu tām
iti bruvāṇe prahlāde bhrukuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ daityān gṛhyatām iti abhāṣata
vipraciti prabhṛtayaḥ tatas te dānava ṛṣabhāḥ
pradīpta kaṅkaṭāḥ ghorāḥ tam sarve paryavārayan
śastra vṛṣṭim tad utsṛṣṭām jvālā jāla jaṭā ākulām

original: jagrāha niścalo devaḥ śoṇapuṣpāmiva srajam // Bhmj_19.1584 //
analyzed: jagrāha niścalaḥ devaḥ śoṇa puṣpām iva srajam
sa sva dyotaiḥ iva vyāptaḥ śaraiḥ śikhadi dāruṇaiḥ
dṛś mātreṇa eva tān cakre vāta kṣipta tṛṇa upamān
nadat pralaya jīmūta niḥsvanaḥ tān vidhūya saḥ
sabhām babhañja saṃjāta jana kṣobha virāviṇīm
daitya cakre tha vidhvaste sahasā tasya tejasā
daṣṭa oṣṭhaḥ svayam uttasthau hiraṇyakaśipuḥ krudhā
sa kṣipan astra saṃghātam daṇḍam cikṣepa bhīṣaṇam

original: kālacakraṃ triśūlaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā // Bhmj_19.1588 //
analyzed: kālacakram triśūlam ca kaṅkālam musalam tathā
brahmāstram aśanim tvāṣṭram śaktim pāśupatam halam
kāla mudgaram ati ugram kṛtānta astram sa vigraham
iti etaiḥ chādyamānaḥ pi na cakampe nṛ kesarī
nānā prāṇi mukhaiḥ daityaiḥ ghora amāyā mayaiḥ vṛtaḥ
tatas hiraṇyakaśipuḥ krodha andhaḥ pṛthu vigrahaḥ

original: cakāra jagatāṃ kṣobhaṃ yena lokāścakampire // Bhmj_19.1591 //
analyzed: cakāra jagatām kṣobham yena lokāḥ cakampire
sa pattana purī dvīpa purī nagara śāsanā

original: mahī cacāla taṭinī mālinī śailaśālinī // Bhmj_19.1592 //
analyzed: mahī cacāla taṭinī mālinī śaila śālinī
atha ākṛṣya bāla ddaityam kṛtvā utsaṅge raṇa utkaṭam
vakṣasi adārayat devaḥ vajra ugra nakharaiḥ kharaiḥ
daitya hṛd kamala udīrṇāḥ niryayuḥ śoṇita chaṭāḥ
nakha krakaca niṣpeṣa jāta vahni śikhāḥ iva
hate daitya īśvare vīre pravare darpa śālinām

original: devā nṛharinirdiṣṭāṃ nijāṃ lakṣmīṃ prapedire // Bhmj_19.1595 //
analyzed: devāḥ nṛhari nirdiṣṭām nijām lakṣmīm prapedire
stutaḥ caturmukha mukhaiḥ dhyeyaḥ mokṣa patha arthinām

original: tataḥ kṣīrodadheḥ kūlamuttaraṃ prayayau hariḥ // Bhmj_19.1596 //
analyzed: tatas kṣīrodadheḥ kūlam uttaram prayayau hariḥ
rakta chaṭā churita dāruṇa daitya vaśraḥsaṃdhyā abhra randhra visṛtāḥ nakha śuktayaḥ tāḥ
devasya siṃha vapuṣaḥ sura vairi nārī vaktra abja puñja śiśira aṃśu kalāḥ jayanti
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sūnuḥ prahlādaḥ daitya śekharaḥ

original: pralhādasya suto vīraḥ suravairī virocanaḥ // Bhmj_19.1598 //
analyzed: pralhādasya sutaḥ vīraḥ sura vairī virocanaḥ
virocanasya tanyaḥ trailokya vijayī

original: dhṛtaḥ śakrapade cakravartī daityagaṇaiḥ svayam // Bhmj_19.1599 //
analyzed: dhṛtaḥ śakra pade cakravartī daitya gaṇaiḥ svayam
prayayau tridaśān jetum trijagat vyāpibhiḥ balaiḥ
matta dvipa ghaṭā ghaṇṭā ṭāṅka ārghaṭṭita ambaraḥ
rathaiḥ nagara nisphāraiḥ giri rāja nibhaiḥ gajaiḥ
vāta vegaiḥ ca turagaiḥ tena kham samapūryata
svarbhānu vinda namuci prahlāda bala śambaraiḥ
jambha kumbha udara ugrākṣa tārakākṣa virocanaiḥ
vipracitti hayagrīva maya mukhyaiḥ surāribhiḥ
pradīpta dhvaja saṃnāhaiḥ koṭīnām koṭibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
cakāra dhavala uṣṇīṣa chatra cāmara maṇḍalaiḥ
sphāra phena āvalī sphīta dugdha udadhi nibham nabhaḥ
śakro pi saha lokeśaiḥ dhṛtaḥ tridaśa koṭibhiḥ
cakre kuṭila dīpta aṃśu maṇḍalī kapiśāḥ diśaḥ
atāḍyata tatas caṇḍaḥ tridaśa asura sainyayoḥ
atha śastra astra saṃghaṭṭa jvālā jaṭila vigrahāḥ
kopa anale khaḍga yūpe rudhira ājye dhanuḥ sruve
tasmin raṇa mahā yajñe vibabhau dīkṣitaḥ baliḥ
itas śakra arka dahanaiḥ bāṇa asura mukha oritaḥ
śara andhakāre vihite ghoraḥ bhūt sainyayoḥ kṣayaḥ
tatas daitya astra nistriṃśa dāritāḥ tridaśāḥ diśaḥ
trastāḥ yayuḥ deha mātra paritrāṇa trapā ākulāḥ
bhagna cakre gate śakre dahane gahana eṣaṇi
virate mārute yuddhāt gṛhīta praśame yame
trailokya adhipatiḥ vīraḥ śaśāsa tridaśān baliḥ
sura rājye kathā śeṣe prājye rājye suradviṣām
surāḥ caturmukha girā trāṇām nārāyaṇam yayuḥ
avyakta rūpaḥ bhagavan gīrvāṇaiḥ arthitaḥ vibhuḥ
viveśa yogāt aditeḥ garbham vārṣasahasrikam
sa kāśyapaḥ tatas viṣṇuḥ śyāmaḥ vāmana vigrahaḥ

original: ajāyata jagaccyeṣṭho bālaḥ śreṣṭho divaukasām // Bhmj_19.1614 //
analyzed: ajāyata jagat cyeṣṭhaḥ bālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ divaukasām
atra antare baḍiliḥ
dhīmān aśvamedhāya dīkṣitaḥ
babhūva sarva kāmānām dātā kalpadrumaḥ ṛthiṣu
tasya yajña bhuvam devaḥ bṛhaspati sakhaḥ svayam

original: gatvā viveśa triśikhaḥ kirīṭi chatradaṇḍavat // Bhmj_19.1616 //
analyzed: gatvā viveśa triśikhaḥ kirīṭi chatra daṇḍavat
śyāmam padma palāśa akṣam calat kuṭila kuntalam

original: taṃ lāvaṇyamayaṃ vīkṣaaya yayau niścalatāṃ baḍiḥ(liḥ) // Bhmj_19.1617 //
analyzed: tam lāvaṇya mayam yayau niścala tām
daitya indram sa samabhyetya mahātmā vāmana ākṛtiḥ
uvāca madhura udāra girā varṣan iva amṛtam
mahā indrasya kuberasya candrasya varumasya ca
brahmaṇaḥ ca abhavat yajñaḥ tvad kratuḥ ca virājate
yajñānām aśvamedhaḥ yam varaḥ tvam iva dehinām
śrutvā iti vāmana vacaḥ pūta ātmā baḍili
rabhyadhāt

original: idaṃ te darśanaṃ sādho prīṇāti mama mānasam /
analyzed: idam te darśanam sādho prīṇāti mama mānasam

original: śrotraśuktisudhādhārā vāṇī te kasya na priyā // Bhmj_19.1621 //
analyzed: śrotra śukti sudhā dhārā vāṇī te kasya na priyā

original: dadāni kiṃ te 'bhimataṃ tvādṛśāṃ hi mahātmanām /
analyzed: dadāni kim te bhimatam tvādṛśām hi mahātmanām
śarīram api nā ādeyam kim punar bāhmataḥ ciram
iti ukte baḍili
nā prītyā pratyabhāṣata vāmanaḥ
danta tviṣā muhur kurvan kṣīra kṣālitam ambaram
pada trayam tvayā mahyam guru artham saṃpradīyatām

original: ataḥ paraṃ bhavatprītiṃ bahu manye priyaṃvada // Bhmj_19.1624 //
analyzed: atas param bhavat prītim bahu manye priyaṃvada
śrutvā iti vismita manāḥ
provāca sa smitaḥ
dātā baḍiliḥ
bhavān arthī tripadī dīyatām katham

original: dayitaṃ bahumānaṃ me yatheṣṭaṃ gṛhyatāṃ mune /
analyzed: dayitam bahu mānam me yathā iṣṭam gṛhyatām mune
sa sāgara giri indrā api su alpā te ratna sūḥ mahī
iti ucchamāne pi yadā yayāce na adhikam hariḥ
hasta udakam tadā prādāt baḍiliḥ
lajjā nata ānanaḥ
tatas pravavṛdhe devaḥ sarva deva mayaḥ vibhuḥ

original: vyāpa padbhyāṃ vasumatīṃ śirasā ca divaṃ kṣaṇāt // Bhmj_19.1628 //
analyzed: vyāpa padbhyām vasumatīm śirasā ca divam kṣaṇāt
tasya pravardhamānasya trailokya ākrānti kāriṇaḥ
jagat paryāptam etat me na saṃpūrṇe pada dvaye
iti iva kampa viluṭhat giri śabdaiḥ jagāda saḥ
yaḥ pūrvam abhavat ratnam mukuṭe prāpta mauktike

original: vaktre smitāṃśucakraṃ ca śanaiḥ śaṅkho 'pi vakṣasi // Bhmj_19.1631 //
analyzed: vaktre smita aṃśu cakram ca śanais vakṣasi
vyomni candraḥ saḥ eva asya parama ākranti kāriṇaḥ
ūru māle jagāma āśu sraj dāma sita padma tām
brahmaṇā kṣālite tasya pāda padme iva ambubhiḥ
jātā hara jaṭā jūṭa mālā jagati jāhnavī
iti trailokyam ātkramya hṛtvā daitya pateḥ kṣaṇāt
sutale nāmni pātāla tale tasya ādiśat sthitim
aho mahā udadhi sphītam sattvam balavataḥ baleḥ
yena sva kāya bandhena dāna śeṣaḥ viśodhitaḥ
vismitāḥ ca prahṛṣṭāḥ ca lajjitāḥ kampitāḥ tathā
babhūvuḥ sura gandharva siddha cāraṇa kiṃnarāḥ
hatvā ditija saṃghātam baḍeleḥ
vṛttim akalpayat

original: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ śrāddhamaśrotriyaṃ tathā // Bhmj_19.1637 //
analyzed: aśraddhayā hutam dattam śrāddham aśrotriyam tathā
amantram avratam yaḥ ca yajña ādikam adakṣiṇam

original: vidhihīnaṃ yadanyacca tadasmai pradadau hariḥ // Bhmj_19.1638 //
analyzed: vidhi hīnam yat anyat ca tat asmai pradadau hariḥ
tatas nija pade devān yathāsthānam niveśya saḥ
ādideśa sura indrasya śriyam srajam iva ujjvalām

original: iti te caritaṃ puṇyaṃ devasya kamalāpateḥ /
analyzed: iti te caritam puṇyam devasya kamalāpateḥ
prādurbhāva prasaṅgena kathitam kilbiṣa apaham
trailokya ākrānti līlā udita caraṇa nakha khaccha kānti pravāhaiḥ kurvan brahmāṇḍa mūrdhni prasṛta surasarit vaijayantī vilāsam

original: prodbhūtabrahmapadmapratimaparisarannābhilagnārkabimbaṃ niḥśeṣātaṅkaśāntyai bhavatu bhagavato rūpamatyadbhutaṃ naḥ // Bhmj_19.1641 //
analyzed: prodbhūta brahma padma pratima parisarat nābhi lagna arka bimbam niḥśeṣa ātaṅka śāntyai bhavatu bhagavataḥ rūpam ati adbhutam naḥ
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām paripūrṇaḥ harivaṃśaḥ
kāśmīrikaḥ guṇa ādhāraḥ prakāśendra abhidhaḥ bhavat
saṃpūrṇa dāna saṃtuṣṭāḥ prāhuḥ tam brāhmaṇāḥ sadā

original: indra evāsi kiṃtvekaḥ prakāśaste guṇo 'dhikaḥ // Bhmj_19.*2 //
analyzed: indraḥ evā asi kiṃtu ekaḥ prakāśaḥ te guṇaḥ dhikaḥ
yasya meroḥ iva udārāḥ kalyāṇa pūrṇa saṃpadaḥ
a vāritam abhūt gehe bhojya sattram dvijanmanām
sūrya grahe tribhiḥ lakṣaiḥ dattvā kṛṣṇājina trayam
smi iti abhavat kṣaṇam lajjā nata ānanaḥ
svayaṃbhū śaṃbhu vijaye yaḥ pratiṣṭhāpya devatāḥ
dattvā koṭi catur bhāgam deva dvija maṭha ādiṣu
pūjayitvā svayam śarvam prasarat bāṣpa nirjharaḥ

original: gāḍhaṃ dorbhyāṃ samāliṅgya yastatraiva vyapadyata // Bhmj_19.*6 //
analyzed: gāḍham dorbhyām samāliṅgya yaḥ tatra eva vyapadyata
kṣemendra nāmā tanayaḥ tasya vidvas saparyayā
prayātaḥ kavi goṣṭhīṣu nāma grahaṇa yogya tām
ācārya śekharamaṇeḥ vidyā vivṛti kāriṇaḥ
śrutvā abhinavagupta ākhyāt sāhityam bodha vāridheḥ

original: dhanyatāṃ yaḥ parāṃ prāpto nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ // Bhmj_19.*9 //
analyzed: dhanya tām yaḥ parām prāptaḥ nārāyaṇa parāyaṇaḥ
kadācid brāhmaṇena etya sa rāma yaśasā arthitaḥ
saṃkṣiptām bhārata kathām kuruṣva iti ārya cetasā
sa tam ūce karomi eva prāk etat caritam mama
hṛṣṭaḥ satyavatī sūnuḥ svapne jñāna nidhiḥ dadau
tam namaskṛtya vara dam sajjaḥ haṃ tvad samīhite
iti uktvā svapna dṛṣṭasya muneḥ tuṣṭava tat vapuḥ
namaḥ jñāna anala śikhā puñaja piṅga jaṭā bhṛte
kṛṣṇāya a kṛṣṇa mahase kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāya te
namaḥ tejaḥ maya śmaśru prabhā śabalita tviṣe
vaktra vāgīśvarī padma raja sevā udita śriye
namaḥ saṃdhyā samādhāna niṣpīta ravi tejase
trailokya timira uccheda dīpa pratima cakṣuṣe
namaḥ sahasra śākhāya dharma upavana śākhine
sattva pratiṣṭhā puṣpāya nirvāṇa phala śāline
namaḥ kṛṣṇājina juṣe bodha nandana vāsine
vyāptāya iva ali jālena puṇya saurabha lipsayā
namaḥ śaśi kalā ākāra brahmasūtra aṃśu śobhine
śritāya haṃsa kāntyā iva saṃparka arka mala okasaḥ
namaḥ vidyā nadī pūrṇa śāstra abdhi sakala indave
namaḥ satya nivāsāya sva vikāśa vilāsine
vyāsāya dhāmne tapasām saṃsāra āyāsa hāriṇe
vyāsa aṣṭaka stotram
iti vyāsāṣṭakam kṛtvā mahābhārata mañjarīm
sa cakre vibudha ānanda sudhā syanda taraṅgiṇīm

original: samāpteyaṃ mahābhāratamañjarī kṛtiḥ kavervyāsadāsāpanāmnaḥ prakāśendrasūnoḥ kṣemendrasya //
analyzed: samāptā iyam mahābhāratamañjarī kṛtiḥ kaveḥ vyāsadāsāpa nāmnaḥ prakāśa indra sūnoḥ kṣemendrasya
aho kavi sarasvatyāḥ vicitrā iyam prasanna tā

original: sadyo malinatā vaktre khalānāṃ jāyate yayā // Bhmj_19.**1 //
analyzed: sadyas malina tā vaktre khalānām jāyate yayā
mad vacaḥ darpaṇa tale mahābhārata diś dvipaḥ
samasta avayavaḥ pi eṣa muṣṭi meyaḥ iva īkṣyate

original: ratnodāracatuḥsamudraraśanāṃ bhuktvā bhuvaṃ kauravo bhagnoruḥ patitaḥ sa niṣparijane jīvanvṛkairbhakṣitaḥ /
analyzed: ratna udāra catur samudra raśanām bhuktvā bhuvam kauravaḥ bhagna ūruḥ patitaḥ sa niṣparijane jīvan vṛkaiḥ bhakṣitaḥ

original: gaupairviśvajayī jitaḥ sa vijayaḥ kakṣaiḥ kṣitā vṛṣṇayastasmātsarvamidaṃ vicārya suciraṃ śāntyai mano dīyatām // Bhmj_19.**3 //
analyzed: gaupaiḥ viśva jayī jitaḥ sa vijayaḥ kakṣaiḥ kṣitāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ tasmāt sarvam idam vicārya su ciram śāntyai manaḥ dīyatām
phulla indīvara sundara dyuti muṣaḥ śaureḥ śarīra tviṣaḥ pāyāsuḥ nija nābhi paṅkaja rajaḥ lubdha ali mālā upamāḥ

original: yāḥ kurvanti śaśāṅkabimbaviṣade lakṣmīmukhābje muhuḥ kastūrīrasapattrabhaṅgasubhagā lakṣmīmukhābje muhaḥ kastūrīrasapattrabhaṅgasubhagā lakṣmīprabhāvibhramam
analyzed: yāḥ kurvanti śaśāṅka bimba viṣade lakṣmī mukha abje muhur kastūrī rasa pattra bhaṅga subhagāḥ lakṣmī mukha abje muhar kastūrī rasa pattra bhaṅga subhagāḥ lakṣmī prabhā vibhramam
eṣa viṣṇu kathā tīrtha puṇyavat salila ukṣitaḥ
prāptaḥ kṣemendraḥ kavi indra tām
śubham bhūyat
